original: bya ba de lta bu'i bdag nyid can gyi lha sbyin gyi rang bzhin nyid la 'tshed pa zhes bya bar bstan to //
analyzed: bya ba de lta bu'i bdag nyid can gyi lha sbyin gyi rang bzhin nyid la 'tshed pa zhes bya bar bstan to //
translated: The nature of Devadatta, who has the nature of such activity, is taught to be ‚Äúcooking.‚Äù

original: de bzhin @138b du sta res gcod ces bya ba yang shing la 'jug pa lhur len pa'i sta re'i rang bzhin la bstan to //
analyzed: de bzhin @138b du sta res gcod ces bya ba yang shing la 'jug pa lhur len pa'i sta re'i rang bzhin la bstan to //
translated: Similarly, ‚Äúcutting with an axe‚Äù is taught to be the nature of an axe that is dedicated to cutting wood.

original: 'di snyam du de lta na yang don dam par bya ba dang byed pa dag tha dad pa yang mthong ba nyid yin na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du de lta na yang don dam par bya ba dang byed pa dag tha dad pa yang mthong ba nyid yin na /
translated: In this way, although the difference between action and agent is seen in ultimate reality,

original: khyed kyis ni tha mi dad pa kho na'o snyad du dogs pa la /
analyzed: khyed kyis ni tha mi dad pa kho na'o snyad du dogs pa la /
translated: you suspect that they are not different at all.

original: 'khrul par bstan pa'i phyir rnon du dngos po tha dad pa med kyang zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'khrul par bstan pa'i phyir rnon du dngos po tha dad pa med kyang zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: In order to teach that this is mistaken, it says, ‚ÄúAlthough there is no difference between things‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: ji ltar bud shing dang 'bras chan tshos pa don dam par tha dad par de ltar thams cad du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar bud shing dang 'bras chan tshos pa don dam par tha dad par de ltar thams cad du ni ma yin te /
translated: Just as fuel and cooked rice are different in ultimate reality, but not in every way,

original: 'di ltar dngos po tha dad pa med de gcig kyang nus pa bsgrub par bya ba'i rgyu mtshan gyi bye brag gis te /
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po tha dad pa med de gcig kyang nus pa bsgrub par bya ba'i rgyu mtshan gyi bye brag gis te /
translated: so it is with all things. There is no difference between things, because even a single thing is a cause that is established as a particular effect.

original: tha dad par bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub bar byed pa'i yul gyi rnam par gzhag pa tha dad pa'i gtan tshigs kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad par bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub bar byed pa'i yul gyi rnam par gzhag pa tha dad pa'i gtan tshigs kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the proof and the probandum are established as different objects, and the reason is different from them.

original: dngos po gcig la yang de dang de'i nus pa dang ldan pa las byed pa po dang las dang byed pa po'i dngos po dang bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin rnams rnam par 'jog la /üîΩbsgrub par bya ba de sgrub par byed pa rnams las sam /
analyzed: dngos po gcig la yang de dang de'i nus pa dang ldan pa las byed pa po dang las dang byed pa po'i dngos po dang bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin rnams rnam par 'jog la / bsgrub par bya ba de sgrub par byed pa rnams las sam /
translated: In one thing, the agent, the object, and the nature of the probandum are posited from its possessing the capacity for this and that.üîΩThe probandum is not in the least different from the proofs,

original: sgrub pa por byed pa po rnams phan tshun tha dad pa ni cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: sgrub pa por byed pa po rnams phan tshun tha dad pa ni cung zad kyang med de /
translated: or the agent is not different from the proofs.

original: dper na bdag gis bdag 'tshog go zhes bya ba 'di la las la sogs pa'i nus ba dang ldan pa'i phyir dang / bsgrub bya'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir de nyid la 'tshog pa po dang / brtsog par bya ba dang sgrub par byed par smras pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bdag gis bdag 'tshog go zhes bya ba 'di la las la sogs pa'i nus ba dang ldan pa'i phyir dang / bsgrub bya'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir de nyid la 'tshog pa po dang / brtsog par bya ba dang sgrub par byed par smras pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, in this statement ‚Äúthe self strikes the self,‚Äù the agent, the object, and the nature of the probandum are posited because of possessing the capacity for action, etc., and because of possessing the capacity for the conformity of the nature of the probandum.

original: de'i phyir bud shing dang 'bras chan tshos pa bzhin du thams cad du bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bud shing dang 'bras chan tshos pa bzhin du thams cad du bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, like fuel and cooked rice, the object of the act and the agent are not different in all cases.

original: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa gcig la yang rang bzhin gyi khyad par gyis byed pa dang bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa gcig la yang rang bzhin gyi khyad par gyis byed pa dang bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, in the case of a single consciousness, the agent and the object of the act are distinguished by their intrinsic natures.

original: 'di ni skabs dang rjes su mthun par smras pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni skabs dang rjes su mthun par smras pa yin te /
translated: This is said in accordance with the context.

original: byed pa po yang rnam par shes pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: byed pa po yang rnam par shes pa nyid yin no //
translated: The agent is also consciousness itself.

original: de'i phyir de ltar tha snyad la brten pa'i rnam par gzhag 'jog gi dngos po la don dam par tha dad med kyang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar tha snyad la brten pa'i rnam par gzhag 'jog gi dngos po la don dam par tha dad med kyang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, in this way, in the case of things that are established in dependence on conventions, although ultimately they are not different, there is no contradiction.

original: phrad pa ni don so so la tha dad pa ni snang ba dang 'dra bar bye brag tu byed pa po yin pa des na /
analyzed: phrad pa ni don so so la tha dad pa ni snang ba dang 'dra bar bye brag tu byed pa po yin pa des na /
translated: Contact is the distinction of the individual objects, which is like the appearance that distinguishes the agent.

original: tha na de yang bsal nas snang ba kho na bye brag tu byed pa por nges par gzhag pa'i phyir bstan pa'i rim pa las bzlog nas phrad pa yang zhes smos pas rnam par dpyod par mdzad do //
analyzed: tha na de yang bsal nas snang ba kho na bye brag tu byed pa por nges par gzhag pa'i phyir bstan pa'i rim pa las bzlog nas phrad pa yang zhes smos pas rnam par dpyod par mdzad do //
translated: In order to demonstrate that, the order of the teaching is reversed, and ‚Äúcontact‚Äù is mentioned.üîΩNot only are the eye and so on not valid cognitions,

original: mig la sogs pa 'ba' zhig tshad ma ma yin par ma zad kyi /üîΩsnang ba dang @139a * //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa 'ba' zhig tshad ma ma yin par ma zad kyi / snang ba dang @139a * //
translated: but also

original: 'dra bar don so so la tha dad pa'i phrad pa yang tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dra bar don so so la tha dad pa'i phrad pa yang tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: contact, which is like appearance, is not a valid cognition with regard to individual objects.

original: bdag nyid thams cad kyis don de gang dang gang las ldog pa'i bdag nyid kyi don de dang de las ldog pa'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid kyis phrad pa ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid thams cad kyis don de gang dang gang las ldog pa'i bdag nyid kyi don de dang de las ldog pa'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid kyis phrad pa ste /
translated: Contact is the connection of the object with the sense faculty, by the nature of the object‚Äôs being excluded from everything else and being of the nature of that object.

original: don de dbang po dang 'brel pa'o //üîΩgang gi phyir phrad pa ni dbang po dang don dag 'brel pa yin la /
analyzed: don de dbang po dang 'brel pa'o // gang gi phyir phrad pa ni dbang po dang don dag 'brel pa yin la /
translated: It is the connection of the object with the sense faculty.

original: phrad par gyur pa de'i chos te ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan can 'ga' zhig kho na'i ngo bo rtogs pa ste des pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phrad par gyur pa de'i chos te ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan can 'ga' zhig kho na'i ngo bo rtogs pa ste des pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because contact is the connection of the sense faculty and the object, some nature that is the property of that contact, which is the reason for exclusion, is understood.

original: 'di ltar tshad ma ni don rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //üîΩphrad pa don rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin na ni thams cad las ldog pa'i dngos po dang phrad pa na /
analyzed: 'di ltar tshad ma ni don rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no // phrad pa don rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin na ni thams cad las ldog pa'i dngos po dang phrad pa na /
translated: Thus, valid knowledge is the reason for the realization of an object.üîΩIf contact were the reason for the realization of an object, then when a thing that is the opposite of all of them comes into contact with all of them,

original: ldog pa thams cad kyi yul can gyi rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: ldog pa thams cad kyi yul can gyi rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur na /
translated: a realization that has all of them as its object would arise.

original: de lta yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta yang ma yin no //
translated: But that is not the case.

original: de'i phyir rgyu mtshan gang las phrad pa byed brag med kyang nges pa'i chos nges par 'gyur ba de nyid tshad mar rigs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu mtshan gang las phrad pa byed brag med kyang nges pa'i chos nges par 'gyur ba de nyid tshad mar rigs te /
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that valid knowledge is that reason from which a definite phenomenon is ascertained, even though there is no distinction of contact.

original: ldog par bya ba'i rgyu mtshan gzhan gyis ma chod par bye brag tu byed pa po ni sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir dang / phrad pa de yul gyi bdag nyid thams cad la khyad par med na yang yul nges pa'i bdag nyid rtogs pa'i khyad par 'di ni 'di'o zhes bya ba nyams su myong bas grub pa ni blo'i snang ba don dang 'dra bas byas pa des na rnam par 'jog
analyzed: ldog par bya ba'i rgyu mtshan gzhan gyis ma chod par bye brag tu byed pa po ni sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir dang / phrad pa de yul gyi bdag nyid thams cad la khyad par med na yang yul nges pa'i bdag nyid rtogs pa'i khyad par 'di ni 'di'o zhes bya ba nyams su myong bas grub pa ni blo'i snang ba don dang 'dra bas byas pa des na rnam par 'jog
translated: Even though the contact is not differentiated in terms of all the aspects of the object, the differentiation of the cognition that is the aspect of the ascertainment of the object is established by experience. Since the appearance of the cognition is similar to the object, it is posited by that.

original: bar byed pa gzhan gyi bya bas bar du mchod pa de nyid tshad mar rigs so //
analyzed: bar byed pa gzhan gyi bya bas bar du mchod pa de nyid tshad mar rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that the cognition is valid in terms of that very contact that is not obstructed by the action of another.

original: ji ltar dngos po'i rang bzhin la brten pa'i phrad pa bdag nyid thams cad la khyad par med pa de ltar mngon sum gyi snang ba yang dngos po de la brten pa'i phyir bdag nyid thams cad la thung mong du 'gyur pa ma yin nam //
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po'i rang bzhin la brten pa'i phrad pa bdag nyid thams cad la khyad par med pa de ltar mngon sum gyi snang ba yang dngos po de la brten pa'i phyir bdag nyid thams cad la thung mong du 'gyur pa ma yin nam //
translated: Just as the contact that is based on the nature of the object is not differentiated in terms of all the aspects, in the same way, the appearance of the direct perception is also not differentiated in terms of all the aspects of the object, because it is based on that object.

original: 'di ltar dper na mngon sum don de'i sngon po nyid kyi rjes su byed pa de bzhin du skad cig ma nyid kyi yang yin ba des na thun mong yin pa'i phyir ldog pa'i khyad par nges bar shes pa'i rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir blo'i rnam pas byas
analyzed: 'di ltar dper na mngon sum don de'i sngon po nyid kyi rjes su byed pa de bzhin du skad cig ma nyid kyi yang yin ba des na thun mong yin pa'i phyir ldog pa'i khyad par nges bar shes pa'i rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir blo'i rnam pas byas
translated: Therefore, since it is common to both, it is not the cause of ascertaining the specific difference of the reverse.

original: zhes ci'i phyir brjod ce na /
analyzed: zhes ci'i phyir brjod ce na /
translated: Why is it said that it is produced by the aspect of the mind?

original: bden mod kyi 'on kyang ngas pa ni nyams su myong ba'i yul can yin pa des na /
analyzed: bden mod kyi 'on kyang ngas pa ni nyams su myong ba'i yul can yin pa des na /
translated: Indeed, that is true, but the object of experience is the subject of experience.

original: sngon po nyams su myong ba las ser po nyams su myong ba rang bzhin khyad par med na nyams su myong ba khyad par du nges par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di cig tu nges pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sngon po nyams su myong ba las ser po nyams su myong ba rang bzhin khyad par med na nyams su myong ba khyad par du nges par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di cig tu nges pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, if there is no difference in the nature of the experience of blue and the experience of yellow, the experience cannot be ascertained as different.

original: nyams su myong ba'i khyad par thams cad des pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni cig tu nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i khyad par thams cad des pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni cig tu nges pa ma yin te /
translated: This is certain. But it is not certain that all differences in experience are due to that.

original: rkyen gzhan las nyams su myong @139b ba nges par 'gyur ba'am mi 'gyur ba yang srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rkyen gzhan las nyams su myong @139b ba nges par 'gyur ba'am mi 'gyur ba yang srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is possible that the experience of the object is either certain or not certain, depending on other conditions.

original: de la snang ba nyams su myong ba ni gsal ba la sogs pa'i rkyen la ltos nas bdag nyid la nges pa skyed par byed la /
analyzed: de la snang ba nyams su myong ba ni gsal ba la sogs pa'i rkyen la ltos nas bdag nyid la nges pa skyed par byed la /
translated: In this regard, the experience of the appearance of the object generates certainty in the self, in dependence on the conditions of clarity, etc.

original: snang ba nges pa nyid kyang don gyi khyad par rtogs par rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: snang ba nges pa nyid kyang don gyi khyad par rtogs par rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
translated: And the certainty of the appearance of the object is posited as the understanding of the particular object,

original: mthong ba 'di ni sngon po'o zhes gzung ba'i rnam pa rnam par chad par nges pa gang yin pa 'di nyid sngon po'i don rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba 'di ni sngon po'o zhes gzung ba'i rnam pa rnam par chad par nges pa gang yin pa 'di nyid sngon po'i don rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the ascertainment of the apprehended aspect, ‚ÄúThis is blue,‚Äù is itself the understanding of the object ‚Äúblue.‚Äù

original: des na snang ba nyams su myong ba ni nges pa'i rkyen pa ltos nas nges pa'i don la rtogs pa rnam par gnas pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: des na snang ba nyams su myong ba ni nges pa'i rkyen pa ltos nas nges pa'i don la rtogs pa rnam par gnas pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Therefore, the experience of the appearance of the object is the cause of the ascertainment of the object, in dependence on the condition of certainty.

original: gang gis nges pa'i rkyen dang lhan cig pa'i phrad pa tshad mar 'gyur ba phrad pa nges pa nyid ni de ltar don rtogs par rnam par gzhag pa ma yin no //üîΩphrad pas nges pa ni don nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gis nges pa'i rkyen dang lhan cig pa'i phrad pa tshad mar 'gyur ba phrad pa nges pa nyid ni de ltar don rtogs par rnam par gzhag pa ma yin no // phrad pas nges pa ni don nges pa ma yin te /
translated: The contact that is the condition for ascertaining the object is not posited as the valid knowledge that ascertains the object.

original: phrad pa ni ltan pa yin pas ldan pa po ma bzung na ji ltar 'dzin /
analyzed: phrad pa ni ltan pa yin pas ldan pa po ma bzung na ji ltar 'dzin /
translated: Contact does not ascertain the object because contact is mere conjunction. If the conjoined object is not apprehended, how can contact be apprehended?

original: 'khar ba ma bzung bar 'khar ba can mi 'dzin pa de bzhin du ldan pa pos khyad par du byas pa'i ldan pa ni /
analyzed: 'khar ba ma bzung bar 'khar ba can mi 'dzin pa de bzhin du ldan pa pos khyad par du byas pa'i ldan pa ni /
translated: Just as a stick-holder is not apprehended without apprehending the stick, so too, contact that is distinguished by the conjoined object

original: ldan pa pos med par mi 'dzin pa des na ldan pa nges pa ni ldan pa nges pa ni ldan pa po sngon du bzung ba la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: ldan pa pos med par mi 'dzin pa des na ldan pa nges pa ni ldan pa nges pa ni ldan pa po sngon du bzung ba la ltos pa yin no //
translated: is not apprehended without apprehending the conjoined object. Therefore, the ascertainment of contact depends on the prior ascertainment of the conjoined object.

original: ldan pa po nges pa yang rgyu med par mi 'thad pas de ma des na de'i khyad par can ldan pa nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ldan pa po nges pa yang rgyu med par mi 'thad pas de ma des na de'i khyad par can ldan pa nges pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it is untenable that the ascertainment of the conjoined object is causeless, the contact distinguished by that is not ascertained.

original: don gyi spyi dang phrad pa yod pa de lta na yang spyi'i rang bzhin gyi yul dang phrad par nges pa na /
analyzed: don gyi spyi dang phrad pa yod pa de lta na yang spyi'i rang bzhin gyi yul dang phrad par nges pa na /
translated: Even though there is contact with the universal of the object, when there is ascertainment of contact with the universal nature of the object,

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan 'ga' zhig las khyad par can gyi don dang phrad par nges pa de nyid byed pa yin gyi phrad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan 'ga' zhig las khyad par can gyi don dang phrad par nges pa de nyid byed pa yin gyi phrad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: it is that very ascertainment of contact with the particular object from some other reason, but it is not contact.

original: don rnam par gnas pa phrad pa nges pa nyid ma yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: don rnam par gnas pa phrad pa nges pa nyid ma yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only is it not the case that there is ascertainment of contact with the particular object,

original: phrad pa des pa'i rgyu can du yang 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phrad pa des pa'i rgyu can du yang 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: but it is also not tenable that there is a cause for ascertainment of contact.

original: spyi'i rang bzhin dang phrad par nges pa na khyad par rtogs par mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / khyad par phrad par nges pa yang don gyi khyad par rtogs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir dang / don gyi khyad par rtogs pa yang rgyu mtshan med par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i rang bzhin dang phrad par nges pa na khyad par rtogs par mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / khyad par phrad par nges pa yang don gyi khyad par rtogs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir dang / don gyi khyad par rtogs pa yang rgyu mtshan med par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because when there is ascertainment of contact with the universal nature of the object, it is not tenable that the particular is cognized, because ascertainment of contact with the particular also must be preceded by the realization of the particular object, and because it is not tenable that the realization of the particular object is without a cause.

original: gang zhig nges pas don nges par 'gyur ba de nyid ni nyams su myong bar gyur pa na /
analyzed: gang zhig nges pas don nges par 'gyur ba de nyid ni nyams su myong bar gyur pa na /
translated: That which is ascertained by means of the object is ascertained when it is experienced.

original: nges pa'i rkyen la ltos nas rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyur brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: nges pa'i rkyen la ltos nas rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyur brjod pa yin te /
translated: It is said to be the cause of the determination in dependence on the condition of ascertainment.

original: de'i phyir phrad pa ni nges pa'i rkyen la ltos nas khyad par can gyi don rtogs pa rnam par 'jog pa'i tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir phrad pa ni nges pa'i rkyen la ltos nas khyad par can gyi don rtogs pa rnam par 'jog pa'i tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, contact is not a valid cognition that determines the special object in dependence on the condition of ascertainment.

original: yang ji ltar phrad pa don nges pa la ltos nas rtogs pa de bzhin du snang ba ni don nges pa la ltos nas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma @140a * //
analyzed: yang ji ltar phrad pa don nges pa la ltos nas rtogs pa de bzhin du snang ba ni don nges pa la ltos nas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma @140a * //
translated: Moreover, just as contact is the ascertainment of the object in dependence on the ascertainment of the object, in the same way, appearance is not the ascertainment of the object in dependence on the ascertainment of the object.

original: yin gyi / 'on kyang sngon por snang ba nyid la sngon po nyid du nged par byed do //
analyzed: yin gyi / 'on kyang sngon por snang ba nyid la sngon po nyid du nged par byed do //
translated: However, the appearance as blue itself is ascertained as blue.

original: sngon por snang ba nges pa de nyid ni don rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: sngon por snang ba nges pa de nyid ni don rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
translated: That very ascertainment of the appearance as blue is the determination of the object.

original: des na rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu ni snang ba nyid do //
analyzed: des na rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu ni snang ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, appearance itself is the cause of determination.

original: phrad pa ni rang nyid nges par shes pa'i dbang gis rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i tshad mar pha rol gyis khas blangs pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: phrad pa ni rang nyid nges par shes pa'i dbang gis rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i tshad mar pha rol gyis khas blangs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Contact is not posited by the power of the self-ascertainment valid knowledge that definitely knows it, but

original: 'on kyang shes pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'on kyang shes pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyis so //
translated: it is posited by the power of the other-ascertainment valid knowledge that is the cause of the consciousness.

original: bdag nyid thams cad kyis nye yang chos 'ga' zhig kho na rtogs pas rgyu gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag nyid thams cad kyis nye yang chos 'ga' zhig kho na rtogs pas rgyu gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir /
translated: Even though it is close in all ways, because it is dependent on other causes in that it is realized only through certain attributes,

original: 'dra ba kho na nges pa'i rkyen la ltos nas rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu yin pas des na de kho na tshad mar rigs so //
analyzed: 'dra ba kho na nges pa'i rkyen la ltos nas rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu yin pas des na de kho na tshad mar rigs so //
translated: it is posited as the cause of ascertainment in dependence on a condition that is similar to it. Therefore it is reasonable that it is a valid knowledge in that way.

original: de ltar phyi rol gyi don du smra ba la /
analyzed: de ltar phyi rol gyi don du smra ba la /
translated: Thus, for those who assert external objects,

original: rnam par shes pa don dang 'dra ba tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa don dang 'dra ba tshad ma yin la /
translated: consciousness that is similar to the object is valid knowledge.

original: don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa ni 'bras bu'i zhes tshad ma dang de'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa mdzad nas /
analyzed: don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa ni 'bras bu'i zhes tshad ma dang de'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa mdzad nas /
translated: The object is posited as the nature of the realization of the object. This is the presentation of valid knowledge and its result.

original: de nyid bzlog pa'i phyir dang / rnam par shes par smra ba la tshad ma'i 'bras bu'i tshul gzhan du rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir 'dri ba rtsom mo //
analyzed: de nyid bzlog pa'i phyir dang / rnam par shes par smra ba la tshad ma'i 'bras bu'i tshul gzhan du rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir 'dri ba rtsom mo //
translated: In order to refute that, and in order to present the result of valid knowledge in a different way from the proponents of consciousness, the question is raised.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu ste /
translated: Then means immediately after.

original: tshad ma'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa'i de ma thag tu the tshom 'dir 'gyur te /üîΩgang khyed tshad ma'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyi rol gyi /
analyzed: tshad ma'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa'i de ma thag tu the tshom 'dir 'gyur te / gang khyed tshad ma'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyi rol gyi /
translated: Immediately after the presentation of the result of valid knowledge, this doubt arises.

original: don rig pa de 'di gang zhig ste /
analyzed: don rig pa de 'di gang zhig ste /
translated: What is that awareness of external objects that you assert to be the result of valid knowledge?

original: ngo bo nyid ci zhig / ji ltar nyams su myong bzhin pa nyid 'di'i ngo bo yin nam /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ci zhig / ji ltar nyams su myong bzhin pa nyid 'di'i ngo bo yin nam /
translated: What is its nature? Is its nature that of what is experienced?

original: nyams su myong ba ni 'khrul pa min la rang gi ngo bo gzhan nyid yin /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba ni 'khrul pa min la rang gi ngo bo gzhan nyid yin /
translated: Experience is not mistaken, and its nature is different from that of the other.

original: cig shos kyis ni nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i rig pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni 'dri ba mi 'thad de /
analyzed: cig shos kyis ni nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i rig pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni 'dri ba mi 'thad de /
translated: It is not tenable to ask about the nature of awareness that is to be experienced by the other.

original: rang gi rang bzhin gyi thabs kyis 'di tshad ma 'dri ba yin no snyam nas smras pa /
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin gyi thabs kyis 'di tshad ma 'dri ba yin no snyam nas smras pa /
translated: Thinking that this is a question about valid knowledge by means of its own method, he says:

original: mngon sum du gyur pa mngon du grub pa'i rig pa gang yin pa 'di nyid do //
analyzed: mngon sum du gyur pa mngon du grub pa'i rig pa gang yin pa 'di nyid do //
translated: It is this very awareness that is directly manifest and clearly established.

original: 'di skad du gang kho bo cag gis tshad ma'i 'bras bur rnam par gzhag pa myong ba 'di ni mngon sum gyi tshad mas grub pa des na 'di la tshad ma 'dri bas ci zhig bya zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di skad du gang kho bo cag gis tshad ma'i 'bras bur rnam par gzhag pa myong ba 'di ni mngon sum gyi tshad mas grub pa des na 'di la tshad ma 'dri bas ci zhig bya zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: In other words, we posit the result of valid cognition as experience, and this is established by the valid cognition of direct perception. So what is the point of questioning the validity of that?

original: cig shos kyis ni dngos po rnams kyi yod pa nyid ni tshad ma sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: cig shos kyis ni dngos po rnams kyi yod pa nyid ni tshad ma sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The other party says that the existence of things is preceded by valid cognition.

original: de'i tshad ma dris na ni yod pa nyid dris par 'gyur la 'di zhes bya bas kyang dngos po mngon sum du bstan pa na /
analyzed: de'i tshad ma dris na ni yod pa nyid dris par 'gyur la 'di zhes bya bas kyang dngos po mngon sum du bstan pa na /
translated: So if you question the validity of that, you are questioning its existence. And if you say, ‚ÄúThis is how it is,‚Äù then you are pointing to a thing that is directly perceptible.

original: 'dri ba yod pa'i yul can du ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dri ba yod pa'i yul can du ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: So it is not right to question the object of that.

original: des na tshad ma'i yul can ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: des na tshad ma'i yul can ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is not the object of valid cognition,

original: 'on @140b kyang rnam pa'i khyad par gyi yul can yin no zhes 'chad pa ni mngon sum du gyur ba'i myong ba yod pa 'di'o //
analyzed: 'on @140b kyang rnam pa'i khyad par gyi yul can yin no zhes 'chad pa ni mngon sum du gyur ba'i myong ba yod pa 'di'o //
translated: but rather the object of a specific aspect. This is the experience of what is directly manifest.

original: 'di skad du khyod la yod pa'i tshad ma dris pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di skad du khyod la yod pa'i tshad ma dris pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: He is not asking about the valid cognition that you have,

original: 'on kyang don dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba'i rnam pa'i khyad par dris pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang don dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba'i rnam pa'i khyad par dris pa yin la /
translated: but rather he is asking about the specific aspect called ‚Äúthe connection with the object.‚Äù

original: gal te de ma rtogs na ni yang gsal bar dri bar bya'o zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te de ma rtogs na ni yang gsal bar dri bar bya'o zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: If you do not understand this, then you should ask for clarification.üîΩWhat is the reason for positing this type of experience as the awareness of a different object?

original: nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i rigs pa 'di tha dad par gyur pa'i don de rig pa yin par rgyu gang gis rnam par gzhag / cig shos kyis skyes pa dang 'dra bas dag gis so zhes smras te /
analyzed: nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i rigs pa 'di tha dad par gyur pa'i don de rig pa yin par rgyu gang gis rnam par gzhag / cig shos kyis skyes pa dang 'dra bas dag gis so zhes smras te /
translated: The other says, ‚ÄúBecause it is like what is produced.‚Äù

original: skyes pa dang 'dra bas kyang ngo zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: skyes pa dang 'dra bas kyang ngo zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is like what is produced‚Äù is what is said.

original: 'jig rten pa rnams rnam par shes pa 'di sngon po'i don las skyes so zhes bya bar rtogs par ni mi byed de /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa rnams rnam par shes pa 'di sngon po'i don las skyes so zhes bya bar rtogs par ni mi byed de /
translated: Worldly people do not think that this consciousness is produced from the object blue.

original: de'i phyir skyes pa ni tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir skyes pa ni tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore what is produced is not the reason for the convention.

original: 'on kyang rgyu mtshan ni 'dra ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu mtshan ni 'dra ba yin no //
translated: However, the reason is similarity.

original: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa 'dra bar nyams su myong ba ni don myong bar rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'dra ba tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa 'dra bar nyams su myong ba ni don myong bar rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'dra ba tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: Because the experience of consciousness is posited as the experience of the object, similarity is the reason for the conventional.

original: skyes pa dang 'dra ba dag gis zhes bye brag med par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni gnyi ga yang tha snyad kyi yan lag nyid du bstan pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: skyes pa dang 'dra ba dag gis zhes bye brag med par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni gnyi ga yang tha snyad kyi yan lag nyid du bstan pa'i don du'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúby the similarity of the arising‚Äù without distinction is for the purpose of teaching that both are limbs of the conventional.

original: 'di dag ci zig ji ltar tha snyad la nye bar mkho zhes nges par rtog pa las 'di brjod do //
analyzed: 'di dag ci zig ji ltar tha snyad la nye bar mkho zhes nges par rtog pa las 'di brjod do //
translated: This is stated in response to the question, ‚ÄúHow are these two necessary for the conventional?‚Äù

original: 'dra ba las ni tha snyad grub ba la /
analyzed: 'dra ba las ni tha snyad grub ba la /
translated: The conventional is established from similarity.

original: 'dra ba yang skyes pa las yin no //
analyzed: 'dra ba yang skyes pa las yin no //
translated: Similarity is from arising.

original: da ni rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu ha cang khyab ches par bstan pa'i phyir 'o na ni zhes smos te /
analyzed: da ni rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu ha cang khyab ches par bstan pa'i phyir 'o na ni zhes smos te /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate that the cause of positing is too broad, he says, ‚ÄúBut if the object of the first consciousness is the cause of the arising of the second consciousness, then the second consciousness would be the effect of the first consciousness.‚Äù

original: yul mtshungs pa zhes bya ba ni gal te shes pa phyi ma'i sngon por 'dzin la snga ma yang yin na de'i tshe thal ba 'dir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul mtshungs pa zhes bya ba ni gal te shes pa phyi ma'i sngon por 'dzin la snga ma yang yin na de'i tshe thal ba 'dir 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving a similar object‚Äù means that if the later consciousness apprehends blue and the former one also does, then this consequence would follow.

original: de ma thag pa nyid kyis ni dngos su skyed par byed pa'i don ni yul yin no zhes dngos su skyed par byed pa nyid mtshon to //
analyzed: de ma thag pa nyid kyis ni dngos su skyed par byed pa'i don ni yul yin no zhes dngos su skyed par byed pa nyid mtshon to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúimmediately antecedent‚Äù is that the object is the direct cause of the arising of consciousness.

original: 'di ltar re zhig sngon po 'dzin pa'i shes pa snga ma sngon por snang ba yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar re zhig sngon po 'dzin pa'i shes pa snga ma sngon por snang ba yin la /
translated: Thus, the consciousness that apprehends blue arises from the sense faculty of the eye, the immediately antecedent condition of the prior moment of consciousness, and the blue object.

original: gnyis pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen des bskyed pa gang yin pa de yang sngon po'i don 'dzin pa nyid kyis sngon por snang ba kho na'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen des bskyed pa gang yin pa de yang sngon po'i don 'dzin pa nyid kyis sngon por snang ba kho na'o //
translated: The second moment of consciousness, which is generated by the immediately antecedent condition, also appears as blue because it apprehends the object that is blue.

original: de yang skyed par byed pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon por snang ba yul yin nam /
analyzed: de yang skyed par byed pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon por snang ba yul yin nam /
translated: Is the object of the second moment of consciousness, which is generated by the immediately antecedent condition, the blue appearance of the consciousness that is the immediately antecedent condition?

original: 'on te don sngon po'am de ste gnyi ga zhes mi shes so //üîΩyul nyid du brtags par ni shes pa nyid 'thad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on te don sngon po'am de ste gnyi ga zhes mi shes so // yul nyid du brtags par ni shes pa nyid 'thad pa yin te /
translated: Or is it the blue object? Or is it both?

original: de ni de ma thag pa'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir dang 'dra bar nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //üîΩdon @141a * //
analyzed: de ni de ma thag pa'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir dang 'dra bar nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro // don @141a * //
translated: It is reasonable to say that consciousness itself is the object because it is the immediately antecedent condition and because it is experienced as similar.

original: ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ni ma yin te /
translated: The object is not the object because it is not the immediately antecedent condition and because it is not experienced as similar.

original: de ma mthong ba nyid kyis 'dra bar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma mthong ba nyid kyis 'dra bar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not seen as similar to that.

original: yang ji ltar shes pa phyi ma la bzung ba'i rnam pa phyi rol gyi rang bzhin lta bur rnam par chad par snang ba de bzhin du shes pa snga ma yang phyi rol gyi rang bzhin ltar gzung ba'i rnam pa rnam par chad par snang ste /
analyzed: yang ji ltar shes pa phyi ma la bzung ba'i rnam pa phyi rol gyi rang bzhin lta bur rnam par chad par snang ba de bzhin du shes pa snga ma yang phyi rol gyi rang bzhin ltar gzung ba'i rnam pa rnam par chad par snang ste /
translated: Moreover, just as the aspect of the apprehended that appears in the subsequent consciousness is divided like the nature of the external object, so too the prior consciousness appears as the aspect of the apprehended divided like the nature of the external object.

original: des na de ji ltar phyi rol gyi yul dang 'dra ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa snga ma'i rnam pa dang yang 'dra ba yin no //
analyzed: des na de ji ltar phyi rol gyi yul dang 'dra ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa snga ma'i rnam pa dang yang 'dra ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as it is similar to the external object, it is also similar to the aspect of the prior consciousness.

original: de'i phyir 'dra ba yod pa tsam gyis ni ma yin gyi gzung ba'i rnam pa la yang ltos pa yin na de ma thag pa'i shes pa na shes pa la gzung ba nyid du snang ba ma yin no zhes gang brjod pa de spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dra ba yod pa tsam gyis ni ma yin gyi gzung ba'i rnam pa la yang ltos pa yin na de ma thag pa'i shes pa na shes pa la gzung ba nyid du snang ba ma yin no zhes gang brjod pa de spangs pa yin te /
translated: Thus, it is not merely the existence of similarity, but it also depends on the aspect of the apprehended. Therefore, what was said, namely, that in the subsequent consciousness, the object does not appear as the apprehended, is refuted.

original: gang gi phyir de ma thag pa'i shes pa 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid du ni snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ma thag pa'i shes pa 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid du ni snang ba ma yin te /
translated: Because the subsequent consciousness does not appear as the aspect of the apprehender.

original: snang ba de de'i rang bzhin du ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba de de'i rang bzhin du ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the appearance is not ascertained as the nature of that.

original: gzung ba'i rnam par ni snang ba kho na ste /
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam par ni snang ba kho na ste /
translated: It appears as the apprehended aspect,

original: snang ba de shes pa snga ma'i snang ba dang 'dra bar nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba de shes pa snga ma'i snang ba dang 'dra bar nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the appearance is ascertained as similar to the appearance of the prior cognition.

original: bdag nyid thams cad nges pa na gzung ba nyid du rnam par 'jog pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag nyid thams cad nges pa na gzung ba nyid du rnam par 'jog pa ni ma yin te /
translated: When the entire nature is ascertained, it is not posited as the apprehended,üîΩbecause even though the appearance of cognition is not ascertained as the nature of blue, it is still imagined to be similar to the blue of the moment.

original: gang gi phyir shes pa'i snang ba skad cig ma sngon po'i rang bzhin du nges pa ma yin pa de lta na yang skad cig ma'i sngon po dang 'dra bar brtags pa de bzhin du sngon por snang ba shes pa nyid du ni nges pa ma yin mod
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa'i snang ba skad cig ma sngon po'i rang bzhin du nges pa ma yin pa de lta na yang skad cig ma'i sngon po dang 'dra bar brtags pa de bzhin du sngon por snang ba shes pa nyid du ni nges pa ma yin mod
translated: In the same way, the appearance of blue is not ascertained as cognition itself,

original: kyi / 'on kyang rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i snang ba shes pa snga ma'i snang ba dang 'dra bar nges pa yin pa'i phyir yul nges pa med par thal lo //
analyzed: kyi / 'on kyang rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i snang ba shes pa snga ma'i snang ba dang 'dra bar nges pa yin pa'i phyir yul nges pa med par thal lo //
translated: but the appearance of the later cognition is ascertained as similar to the appearance of the prior cognition. Therefore it follows that the object is not ascertained.

original: gal te shes pa 'di'i nyams su myong bar bya ba'i don 'ga' yang med na /
analyzed: gal te shes pa 'di'i nyams su myong bar bya ba'i don 'ga' yang med na /
translated: If the object that is the experience of this cognition does not exist at all,üîΩthen how is it that the cognition of blue is ascertained as the experience of blue?

original: 'o na ni de la ltos pa'i phyir nyams su myong bar yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ni de la ltos pa'i phyir nyams su myong bar yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: But if that is so, then it would not be experienced because it would depend on that.

original: gcad par bya ba med na ni 'ga' zhig gcod par byed pa ma yin no zhes zhe la bzhag nas /
analyzed: gcad par bya ba med na ni 'ga' zhig gcod par byed pa ma yin no zhes zhe la bzhag nas /
translated: If there is no object to be cut, then it is not the case that something is the cutter.

original: 'o na da 'dis zhes smras so //
analyzed: 'o na da 'dis zhes smras so //
translated: But if you say, ‚ÄúNow, this,‚Äù

original: da ltar yul nges pa khyod kyis bshig pa na 'dis yul gang zhig nyams su myong bas grub pa 'di ni bzlog par nus pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: da ltar yul nges pa khyod kyis bshig pa na 'dis yul gang zhig nyams su myong bas grub pa 'di ni bzlog par nus pa yang ma yin no //
translated: then when you destroy the ascertainment of the object, it is not possible to reverse the establishment of the experience of this object.

original: rigs pa med par bzlog na rtog pa sngon du gtong ba nyid du yang ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: rigs pa med par bzlog na rtog pa sngon du gtong ba nyid du yang ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: If you reverse it without reason, then how could you posit a prior conception?

original: de mi bzlogs na yang nyams su myong ba'i don nges par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: de mi bzlogs na yang nyams su myong ba'i don nges par 'gyur bas /
translated: If you do not reverse it, then the ascertainment of the object of experience would occur.

original: khyod kyis kyang yul rnam par gzhag dgos pa des na kho bo cag gis yul rnam par gzhag pa yang de nyid kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: khyod kyis kyang yul rnam par gzhag dgos pa des na kho bo cag gis yul rnam par gzhag pa yang de nyid kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, you also must posit an object. Thus, we also establish our position of the object by that.

original: cig shos kyis ni nyams su myong ba yod kyang nyams su myong bar bya ba bzlog pa na 'dzin par byed pa'i rang bzhin 'ga' zhig yod @141b pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: cig shos kyis ni nyams su myong ba yod kyang nyams su myong bar bya ba bzlog pa na 'dzin par byed pa'i rang bzhin 'ga' zhig yod @141b pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: The other, although it has experience, does not have any nature that apprehends when the object of experience is stopped.

original: 'on kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa 'di ni nye bar bslad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa 'di ni nye bar bslad pa yin no //
translated: However, this aspect of object and aspect of subject is a superimposition.

original: 'di gnyis bkag kyang nyams su myong ba grub pa dga' ba dang zhum pa la sogs pa myong ba'i rnam par bkag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di gnyis bkag kyang nyams su myong ba grub pa dga' ba dang zhum pa la sogs pa myong ba'i rnam par bkag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Although these two are stopped, the experience that is established by experience is not stopped in the aspect of experience such as joy and depression.

original: de'i phyir gzung ba'i rnam pa dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nye bar slad pa yin pas kho bo cag la yul rnam par gzhag pa 'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzung ba'i rnam pa dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nye bar slad pa yin pas kho bo cag la yul rnam par gzhag pa 'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, since the aspect of object and the aspect of subject are superimpositions, we do not have any object-as-representation at all.

original: nyams su myong bas grub pa'i myong ba'i 'gog pa yang ma yin no zhes kho bo cag kyang smos so //
analyzed: nyams su myong bas grub pa'i myong ba'i 'gog pa yang ma yin no zhes kho bo cag kyang smos so //
translated: We also say that the stopping of experience that is established by experience is not stopped.

original: kho bo cag kyang nyams su myong ba'i tshul gzhan la ltos nas nyams su myong bar byed pa po zhes bya ba 'di nyid rjes su zhes bya ba'i phyi nas te /
analyzed: kho bo cag kyang nyams su myong ba'i tshul gzhan la ltos nas nyams su myong bar byed pa po zhes bya ba 'di nyid rjes su zhes bya ba'i phyi nas te /
translated: We also say that the experiencer is in dependence on another mode of experience.üîΩThis is what we mean by ‚Äúafter.‚Äù

original: sngar gzhan gyis rnam par gzhag pa las phyis kho bo cag rtogs par 'dod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sngar gzhan gyis rnam par gzhag pa las phyis kho bo cag rtogs par 'dod pa yin gyi /
translated: We assert that we understand this after it has been presented by others previously.

original: kho bo cag gis rnam par gzhag par bya ba ni ma yin la /
analyzed: kho bo cag gis rnam par gzhag par bya ba ni ma yin la /
translated: It is not something that we ourselves present.

original: rigs pas kyang rnam par gzhag par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs pas kyang rnam par gzhag par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: And it cannot be presented by reasoning.

original: des na kho bo cag shes par 'dod pa yin na rigs pa med pa'i phyir shes par nus pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na kho bo cag shes par 'dod pa yin na rigs pa med pa'i phyir shes par nus pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, if we are to understand it, it is not possible to do so without reason.

original: da ni sngon po 'di bltas pa'am skye bo ngan pa'i sgra mnyan no zhes 'dis ni nges pa'i rnam pa bstan to //
analyzed: da ni sngon po 'di bltas pa'am skye bo ngan pa'i sgra mnyan no zhes 'dis ni nges pa'i rnam pa bstan to //
translated: Now, when we say, ‚ÄúI see this blue object‚Äù or ‚ÄúI hear the sound of a bad person,‚Äù this indicates a definite cognition.

original: gang las te 'dra bar byed pa po'i skyed byed gang la nges pa'i shes pa ste /
analyzed: gang las te 'dra bar byed pa po'i skyed byed gang la nges pa'i shes pa ste /
translated: From what? From the producer of the similar effect.

original: zhen pa'i rtogs pa sngar bshad pa'i rnam pa can skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ba dang thos pa nges pa'i rgyur gyur pa de dag ni nges pa'i yul gyi don de'i nyams su myong ba yin no //
analyzed: zhen pa'i rtogs pa sngar bshad pa'i rnam pa can skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ba dang thos pa nges pa'i rgyur gyur pa de dag ni nges pa'i yul gyi don de'i nyams su myong ba yin no //
translated: The object of the ascertainment is the experience of that object.

original: bsam pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa 'di yin te /
translated: The idea is this:

original: skyes pa dang 'dra ba dag las ni de 'brel par gyur la /
analyzed: skyes pa dang 'dra ba dag las ni de 'brel par gyur la /
translated: From those that are similar to the produced, it becomes related to that.

original: de nges pas kyang shes pa don gyi 'dzin pa por rnam par 'jog pa des na skyes pa'i phyir dang 'dra ba'i phyir dang de dang 'brel pa nges pa'i phyir de 'dzin pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nges pas kyang shes pa don gyi 'dzin pa por rnam par 'jog pa des na skyes pa'i phyir dang 'dra ba'i phyir dang de dang 'brel pa nges pa'i phyir de 'dzin pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And by the ascertainment of that, the cognition is posited as the apprehender of the object. Therefore, because it is produced, because it is similar, and because it is ascertained as related to that, it is said to be the apprehender of that.

original: zhe na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhe na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dogs pa'o //
translated: If one says no, that is the other's doubt.

original: bzlog pa'i phyir 'dra bar byed de /
analyzed: bzlog pa'i phyir 'dra bar byed de /
translated: To refute that, it is made similar.

original: kye yul dang shes pa gang gis nye ba de nyid de 'brel pa de nyid nges pas yul du byas pa de dpyod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: kye yul dang shes pa gang gis nye ba de nyid de 'brel pa de nyid nges pas yul du byas pa de dpyod pa ma yin nam /
translated: Oh! Is it not that by the object and cognition that are proximate, that very connection is ascertained, and the object is made definite?

original: ji ltar gang gis de ni de'i mthong ba yin zhes bya ba 'di ni dpyod pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gang gis de ni de'i mthong ba yin zhes bya ba 'di ni dpyod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHow is it that this is the seeing of that?‚Äù This is the analysis.

original: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The intended meaning is as follows:

original: 'di mthong ba'am thos pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni nyams su myong ba'i yul nges par rnam par gzhag pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di mthong ba'am thos pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni nyams su myong ba'i yul nges par rnam par gzhag pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúThis is seen or heard‚Äù is the ascertainment of the object of experience, and nothing else.

original: rnam par 'jog par byed pa yang nges pa nyid de gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par 'jog par byed pa yang nges pa nyid de gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: And the one who ascertains is also ascertained, and no one else.

original: rnam par gzhag pa dang rnam par 'jog par byed @142a * //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa dang rnam par 'jog par byed @142a * //
translated: The ascertainment and the one who ascertains

original: las rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu ni gzhan du rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: las rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu ni gzhan du rigs pa yin te /
translated: are the cause of ascertainment, and nothing else.

original: de nyid ni de nyid kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni de nyid kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
translated: And that is not the reason for that.

original: de yang nyams su myong bar gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang nyams su myong bar gyur pa yin te /
translated: And that is the experience,

original: nges pa rnams ni nyams su myang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa rnams ni nyams su myang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the ascertained ones follow the experience.

original: des na mthong ba'i yul nges par nyams su myong ba nyid 'di ltar nges pa'i rgyu mtshan du brjod par bya'i /
analyzed: des na mthong ba'i yul nges par nyams su myong ba nyid 'di ltar nges pa'i rgyu mtshan du brjod par bya'i /
translated: Therefore, the ascertainment of the object of seeing is the experience itself, and it should be stated as the reason for the ascertainment.

original: nges pa 'di nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pa 'di nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: But this is not the case.

original: 'di snyam du nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i yul dang lhan cig tu 'brel ba 'ga' zhig la ltos nas nges pa skyed par byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di snyam du nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i yul dang lhan cig tu 'brel ba 'ga' zhig la ltos nas nges pa skyed par byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that ascertainment arises in dependence on some connection with the object of experience.

original: 'on kyang nyams su myong ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par kho na las 'di lta bu'i nges pa skye bar 'gyur na /üîΩde ci'i phyir shes pa'i yul dang lhan cig nye ba nyams su myong pa gang zhig la brten nas nges pa nye bar skyed par byed ces brjod ces dogs pa la /
analyzed: 'on kyang nyams su myong ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par kho na las 'di lta bu'i nges pa skye bar 'gyur na / de ci'i phyir shes pa'i yul dang lhan cig nye ba nyams su myong pa gang zhig la brten nas nges pa nye bar skyed par byed ces brjod ces dogs pa la /
translated: Rather, ascertainment arises in this way from the nature of the consciousness that experiences the object.üîΩWhy is it that ascertainment arises in dependence on the experience of the object of consciousness?

original: bshad pa / lta ba po ste nyams su myong pa po'i nges pa 'di yul dang shes pa de dag gi 'brel pa nyams su myong ba la brten nas te /
analyzed: bshad pa / lta ba po ste nyams su myong pa po'i nges pa 'di yul dang shes pa de dag gi 'brel pa nyams su myong ba la brten nas te /
translated: In response to this qualm, the text says, ‚ÄúThis ascertainment of the seer, that is, the experiencer, arises in dependence on the experience of the connection between the object and consciousness.‚Äù

original: yul du byas nas skye bar 'gyur ba yin te'o //
analyzed: yul du byas nas skye bar 'gyur ba yin te'o //
translated: It arises in dependence on the object.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: nges pa skye ba na skyed par byed pa la ni 'dri ba 'di ma yin gyi 'on kyang yul 'dri ba yin no //
analyzed: nges pa skye ba na skyed par byed pa la ni 'dri ba 'di ma yin gyi 'on kyang yul 'dri ba yin no //
translated: When ascertainment arises, it is not this questioner that is the producer, but rather the object.

original: de la gal te nyams su ma myong ba'i yul la nges pa skye na ni 'gro ba'i tshad mas rtogs pa'i nyams su myong ba'i tha snyad nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gal te nyams su ma myong ba'i yul la nges pa skye na ni 'gro ba'i tshad mas rtogs pa'i nyams su myong ba'i tha snyad nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: If ascertainment arises with respect to an object not experienced, then the convention of ‚Äúexperience‚Äù understood by the valid knowledge of the world would be undermined.

original: don nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba yang de'i yul can gyi shes pa nyams su myong ba yin la shes pa de nyams su myong ba na yang gnyis las skyes pa yin zhing gnyi ga yang 'dra ba yin te /
analyzed: don nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba yang de'i yul can gyi shes pa nyams su myong ba yin la shes pa de nyams su myong ba na yang gnyis las skyes pa yin zhing gnyi ga yang 'dra ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, ‚Äúexperience of an object‚Äù is the experience of the consciousness that has that as its object. And when that consciousness is experienced, it is also arisen from two, and both are similar.

original: de'i phyir khyad par gang gis nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas nges pa skye ban sngon po'i yul du nges par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par gang gis nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas nges pa skye ban sngon po'i yul du nges par 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by what difference would ascertainment arise in the wake of experience and be ascertained as the object blue?

original: de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the immediately preceding condition.

original: de'i phyir 'dra ba'i don ni nyams su myong ba'i don gyi yul can nges pa tha dad ma mthong bar ji ltar rnam par shes pa nges par byed ces bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dra ba'i don ni nyams su myong ba'i don gyi yul can nges pa tha dad ma mthong bar ji ltar rnam par shes pa nges par byed ces bya ba yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of ‚Äúsimilarity‚Äù is that the consciousness is ascertained by the experience of the object, not by seeing a different subjective ascertainment.

original: gang gis rnam par shes pa snga ma de skyed pa la ngo bo nyid kyi nus par brjod pa ji ltar skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis rnam par shes pa snga ma de skyed pa la ngo bo nyid kyi nus par brjod pa ji ltar skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It does not mean, ‚ÄúHow could consciousness be ascertained by the prior consciousness that generates it, which is said to be intrinsically capable of producing it?‚Äù

original: de'i phyir 'brel pa nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba nges pa'i yul nges par rtogs pa yin gyi skye ba'i rgyu ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'brel pa nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba nges pa'i yul nges par rtogs pa yin gyi skye ba'i rgyu ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas so //
translated: Therefore, the statement, ‚ÄúThe experience of the relation . . . ascertains the object,‚Äù is correct, but it is not the cause of the arising of the later consciousness.

original: phyis 'byung ba de'i dus na yod pa ma yin pa dang nyams su myong ba ma yin pa'i nges pa @142b rang nyid zhugs pa tsam gyis ni khyad par can gyi yul nyams su myong bar nges pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: phyis 'byung ba de'i dus na yod pa ma yin pa dang nyams su myong ba ma yin pa'i nges pa @142b rang nyid zhugs pa tsam gyis ni khyad par can gyi yul nyams su myong bar nges pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The mere engagement of the later consciousness, which does not exist at the time of the prior consciousness and is not experienced, does not ascertain the experience of the object that has the special feature.

original: 'on kyang nyams su myong ba nyid kyi khyad par nyams su myong ba las yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang nyams su myong ba nyid kyi khyad par nyams su myong ba las yin la /
translated: However, the experience of the special feature is due to the experience of the object.

original: khyad par can nyams su myong ba de yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar nges pa yin /
analyzed: khyad par can nyams su myong ba de yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar nges pa yin /
translated: And since that special experience does not exist, how can there be ascertainment?

original: de bshad pa ni de zhes bya ba 'brel pa'i rang bzhin nyams su myong ba med na ni nges pa der mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni de zhes bya ba 'brel pa'i rang bzhin nyams su myong ba med na ni nges pa der mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The explanation of that is as follows: If there is no experience of the nature of the relation, then there is no ascertainment of that.

original: des na de ltar mtshan nyid srid pa la brten nas ha cang khyab ches pa'i nyes pa brjod nas da ni bsdu ba'i sgo nas mtshan nyid mi srid pa nyid ston par byed do //
analyzed: des na de ltar mtshan nyid srid pa la brten nas ha cang khyab ches pa'i nyes pa brjod nas da ni bsdu ba'i sgo nas mtshan nyid mi srid pa nyid ston par byed do //
translated: Thus, having stated the error of overextension based on the possibility of a definition, now he shows that the definition is impossible in terms of inclusion.

original: re zhig srid kyang nyes ba 'dir 'gyur la de ni srid pa yang ma yin no zhes gang brjod pa ni /
analyzed: re zhig srid kyang nyes ba 'dir 'gyur la de ni srid pa yang ma yin no zhes gang brjod pa ni /
translated: First, even if it were possible, this error would occur, but it is not possible.

original: rnam par shes pa la ni yul dang 'dra ba srid pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la ni yul dang 'dra ba srid pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not possible for consciousness to be like the object,

original: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa de la snang ba'i dang tshul gang yin pa rags pa'i rnam ba cha shas dang bcas pa ni rdul phra rab so so ste gcig la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa de la snang ba'i dang tshul gang yin pa rags pa'i rnam ba cha shas dang bcas pa ni rdul phra rab so so ste gcig la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the mode of appearance in that sense consciousness is a gross aspect with parts, and that does not exist for each atom.

original: dgongs pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: dgongs pa 'di yin te /
translated: This is the intention.

original: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni cha shas dang bcas pa dang / rdul phra rab gcig la ni cha shas yod pa ma yin pa des na rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin dang / shes pa la gnas pa'i snang ba 'di 'gal ba'i phyir rnam pa 'di de'i yin no zhes brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni cha shas dang bcas pa dang / rdul phra rab gcig la ni cha shas yod pa ma yin pa des na rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin dang / shes pa la gnas pa'i snang ba 'di 'gal ba'i phyir rnam pa 'di de'i yin no zhes brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: The aspect that is present in the sensory consciousness is with parts, and the single atom does not have parts. Therefore, since the nature of the atom and the appearance present in consciousness are contradictory, it is not possible to say that this aspect is that.

original: gang la rang bzhin dang des skyed pa'i rnam pa mi 'gal ba gcig tu zhen pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa'i rnam pa de nyid des skyed pa dang / phyi rol gyi rang bzhin der tha snyad du 'dogs pa pos tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang la rang bzhin dang des skyed pa'i rnam pa mi 'gal ba gcig tu zhen pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa'i rnam pa de nyid des skyed pa dang / phyi rol gyi rang bzhin der tha snyad du 'dogs pa pos tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
translated: The aspect that has a reason for being conceived as one, where the nature and the aspect generated by it are not contradictory, is generated by that, and the one who imputes the external nature conventionally imputes it conventionally.

original: 'dra ba dang 'dra bar byed pa po dag 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa la ni 'gal ba dag bzhin du tha mi dad par zhen par mi 'thad pa des na rnam pa 'di des bskyed pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dra ba dang 'dra bar byed pa po dag 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa la ni 'gal ba dag bzhin du tha mi dad par zhen par mi 'thad pa des na rnam pa 'di des bskyed pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of the similar and the one who makes it similar, who have a contradictory attribute, it is not tenable to conceive them as undifferentiated, as if they were contradictions. Therefore, this aspect is not generated by that.

original: ci ste yang rnam pa 'di des bskyed par nan kho nas rtog na /
analyzed: ci ste yang rnam pa 'di des bskyed par nan kho nas rtog na /
translated: But if you insist that this aspect is produced by that,

original: 'o na ni 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan par khyad par med pas thams cad thams cad kyi rnam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na ni 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan par khyad par med pas thams cad thams cad kyi rnam par 'gyur ro //
translated: then, since there would be no difference between things that have contradictory properties, everything would become the aspect of everything.

original: yang ci ste 'di rdul phra rab gcig gi rnam pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang rnam pa 'di ni rdul phra rab kyi lus mang po phan tshun rang bzhin dang yul yongs su spangs par skyes pa rnams kyi yin no //
analyzed: yang ci ste 'di rdul phra rab gcig gi rnam pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang rnam pa 'di ni rdul phra rab kyi lus mang po phan tshun rang bzhin dang yul yongs su spangs par skyes pa rnams kyi yin no //
translated: But if you say that this aspect is not of a single atom, but rather of many atomic bodies that are mutually exclusive in terms of their nature and location,

original: cha shas med pa mang po rnams kyi snang ba tshogs pa'i yul can ni cha shas su snang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: cha shas med pa mang po rnams kyi snang ba tshogs pa'i yul can ni cha shas su snang bar 'gyur te /
translated: then the object that is the collection of the appearances of many partless things would appear as parts.

original: 'di ltar rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin gcig cha shas med pa yin gyi @143a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin gcig cha shas med pa yin gyi @143a * //
translated: For in this way, the nature of a single atom is partless,

original: du ma ni ma yin no //
analyzed: du ma ni ma yin no //
translated: but not multiple.

original: yul la bkram pa nyid du snang bar 'gyur ba mang po rnams kyi shes pa gcig la gnas pa'i snang ba yul la bkra ma pa nyid ni cha shas dang bcas par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'gal lo zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: yul la bkram pa nyid du snang bar 'gyur ba mang po rnams kyi shes pa gcig la gnas pa'i snang ba yul la bkra ma pa nyid ni cha shas dang bcas par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'gal lo zhes dogs pa la /
translated: The appearance of many things spread out in a place is not inconsistent with the cognition of one thing, because it is a cognition with parts.

original: rang bzhin mang po tshogs pa rnams la yang zhes smos te /üîΩrdul phra rab gcig gi rnam pa ma yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: rang bzhin mang po tshogs pa rnams la yang zhes smos te / rdul phra rab gcig gi rnam pa ma yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: To anticipate this objection, the root text states, ‚ÄúNor is it tenable that many things are perceived as one.‚Äù

original: mang po rnams kyi yang 'thad pa ma yin no zhes bsdu ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: mang po rnams kyi yang 'thad pa ma yin no zhes bsdu ba'i don du'o //
translated: The meaning of this line is that it is not tenable that the aspect of one subtle particle is perceived, nor is it tenable that the aspects of many subtle particles are perceived.üîΩThe root text states, ‚ÄúIt is not tenable that a collection of subtle particles is perceived as a coarse object.‚Äù

original: rdul phra rab kyi rdzas tshogs pa zhes bya ba rigs mi mthun pas ma chod pa rnams la de ltar rags pa'i rnam par snang ba yin no zhes bya bar rigs pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: rdul phra rab kyi rdzas tshogs pa zhes bya ba rigs mi mthun pas ma chod pa rnams la de ltar rags pa'i rnam par snang ba yin no zhes bya bar rigs pa ma yin no ;
translated: It is not tenable to say that a collection of subtle particles, which are not obstructed by other objects of a different type, appear as a coarse object.

original: / ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: / ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: gcig yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gcig yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is one.

original: gang 'di shes pa la bkod pa byas pa rags pa'i rnam par nyams su myong ba de 'di ni gcig yin no //
analyzed: gang 'di shes pa la bkod pa byas pa rags pa'i rnam par nyams su myong ba de 'di ni gcig yin no //
translated: The object that is arranged in the cognition and experienced as a coarse object is one.

original: phyogs kyi cha la sogs pas don gyi snang ba 'di tha dad par rtogs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: phyogs kyi cha la sogs pas don gyi snang ba 'di tha dad par rtogs pa ma yin nam /
translated: But is not the appearance of an object understood as different because of its directional parts and so on?

original: 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa 'di lta bu ni gcig lam yin nam /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa 'di lta bu ni gcig lam yin nam /
translated: How can something that has contradictory properties be one?

original: de'i phyir shes pa'i gnas pa 'di yang zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa'i gnas pa 'di yang zhes brjod ce na /
translated: Therefore, how can this abiding of consciousness be said to be one?

original: shes pa'i snang ba mtha' dag gcig tu ni mi brjod kyi /
analyzed: shes pa'i snang ba mtha' dag gcig tu ni mi brjod kyi /
translated: We do not say that all the appearances of consciousness are one.

original: 'on kyang dus 'dzin pa la ni gcig tu 'dzin pa gdon mi za bar 'dod par bya dgos te /
analyzed: 'on kyang dus 'dzin pa la ni gcig tu 'dzin pa gdon mi za bar 'dod par bya dgos te /
translated: But we must admit that the apprehension of time is definitely the apprehension of one.

original: gzhan du na du mar 'dzin pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gzhan du na du mar 'dzin pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir te /
translated: Otherwise, the apprehension of many is not tenable.

original: cha shas med pa'i gcig pa ma bzung bar ni /
analyzed: cha shas med pa'i gcig pa ma bzung bar ni /
translated: Because without apprehending a partless one,

original: de ltar nges pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar nges pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is not tenable to ascertain it.

original: des na mthar thug pa'i gcig pa ni gdon mi za bar gzung bar bya dgos so //
analyzed: des na mthar thug pa'i gcig pa ni gdon mi za bar gzung bar bya dgos so //
translated: Therefore, one must definitely apprehend an ultimate one.

original: cha shas med pa gzung ba'i phyir rdul phra rab du ma'i rang bzhin gyi don ma bzung bar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: cha shas med pa gzung ba'i phyir rdul phra rab du ma'i rang bzhin gyi don ma bzung bar brjod pa yin no //
translated: Because it is apprehended without parts, it is said that an object whose nature is many subtle particles is not apprehended.

original: gal te 'di 'dra ba'i gcig bzung ba yin du chug pa de lta na yang ji ltar mi rigs she na /
analyzed: gal te 'di 'dra ba'i gcig bzung ba yin du chug pa de lta na yang ji ltar mi rigs she na /
translated: But even if one were to allow that such a single entity is apprehended, how could it be reasonable?

original: bshad pa / gcig ni du ma dang ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / gcig ni du ma dang ste /
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: A single entity is inconsistent

original: mang po dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mang po dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: With many entities.

original: 'gal ba gang yin pa dag ni sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa bzhin du rnam par 'jog par byed pa dang / gzhag par bya bar mi 'thad de ha cang thal pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba gang yin pa dag ni sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa bzhin du rnam par 'jog par byed pa dang / gzhag par bya bar mi 'thad de ha cang thal pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are inconsistent, it is untenable that they are the object that is posited and the means by which it is posited, like blue and not blue, because that would be a logical absurdity.

original: gang gi phyir 'gal ba dag kyang 'jog par byed pa dang / gzhag par bya ba nyid yin na ni khyad par med pa'i phyir snang ba thams cad kyis byas par thal ba'i phyir yul nges pa nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'gal ba dag kyang 'jog par byed pa dang / gzhag par bya ba nyid yin na ni khyad par med pa'i phyir snang ba thams cad kyis byas par thal ba'i phyir yul nges pa nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: If blue and not blue were both the object that is posited and the means by which it is posited, then because there would be no distinction, it would follow that everything would be produced by light. Therefore the ascertainment of the object would be undermined.

original: 'di snyam du rags pa'i rang bzhin gcig mang po rnams la thun mong du yod pa des na 'dra bar 'gyur @143b ro snyam na bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di snyam du rags pa'i rang bzhin gcig mang po rnams la thun mong du yod pa des na 'dra bar 'gyur @143b ro snyam na bshad pa /
translated: If you think that a single coarse nature is shared in common by many, and because of that it is similar, then NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds:

original: rdul phra rab mang po rnams la yang rnam pa de lta bur rags pa gcig gi ngo bo yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rdul phra rab mang po rnams la yang rnam pa de lta bur rags pa gcig gi ngo bo yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And the many subtle particles also do not have the nature of a single gross object.

original: ji ltar phyogs kyi gos can rnams kyis rdul phra rab tha dad pa rnams la yang thun mong gi rang bzhin cig yod par brtags pa de lta bu ni cung zad kyang med na gang gis rnam pa 'di skyed par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar phyogs kyi gos can rnams kyis rdul phra rab tha dad pa rnams la yang thun mong gi rang bzhin cig yod par brtags pa de lta bu ni cung zad kyang med na gang gis rnam pa 'di skyed par 'gyur /
translated: Just as the VaibhƒÅ·π£ikas imagine that the different subtle particles have a single shared nature, that does not exist in the least. What produces this aspect?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: yan lag can 'gog pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de nyid ni du ma'i thun mong gcig gi rang bzhin gyi nyes par yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: yan lag can 'gog pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de nyid ni du ma'i thun mong gcig gi rang bzhin gyi nyes par yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: The fault of refuting the possessor of parts is also the fault of the single shared nature of the many.

original: 'di snyam du kho bo cag gi ltar na ni rdul phra rab yul ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di snyam du kho bo cag gi ltar na ni rdul phra rab yul ma yin la /
translated: In our system, the subtle particles are not objects.

original: gang zhig yul du 'gyur ba de dag gi rags pa'i rang bzhin gzhan ma yin pa yang med de /
analyzed: gang zhig yul du 'gyur ba de dag gi rags pa'i rang bzhin gzhan ma yin pa yang med de /
translated: And that which is an object does not have a different gross nature.

original: 'on kyang rdul phra rab rnams nyid kyis rdul phra rab gnyis la sogs pa'i rim pas brtsams pa'i yan lag can gyi rdzas rags pa gcig po gang yin pa de yul yin no zhes dogs pa la yul zhes smos te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rdul phra rab rnams nyid kyis rdul phra rab gnyis la sogs pa'i rim pas brtsams pa'i yan lag can gyi rdzas rags pa gcig po gang yin pa de yul yin no zhes dogs pa la yul zhes smos te /
translated: But if you think that the object is the one coarse substance composed of atoms, etc.,

original: yul rags pa gcig ni mi 'thad do //
analyzed: yul rags pa gcig ni mi 'thad do //
translated: then the object is not a single coarse substance.

original: ji ltar zhe na bshad pa lag pa la sogs pa gang yin pa'i cha shas gcig g-yo ba ste bskyod na yang lus thams cad g-yo bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na bshad pa lag pa la sogs pa gang yin pa'i cha shas gcig g-yo ba ste bskyod na yang lus thams cad g-yo bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: How so? Because if one part of the body, such as the hand, moves, then the whole body would move.

original: 'di ltar gang zhig lag pa la sogs pa la 'du ba'i yan lag can gyi rdzas g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i yan lag can gyi rdzas de nyid ni lag pa gzhan la 'du ba yin pa des na g-yo ba de'i rang bzhin las mi g-yo ba'i rang bzhinüîΩtha mi dad pa'i phyir g-yo bar thal lo //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang zhig lag pa la sogs pa la 'du ba'i yan lag can gyi rdzas g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i yan lag can gyi rdzas de nyid ni lag pa gzhan la 'du ba yin pa des na g-yo ba de'i rang bzhin las mi g-yo ba'i rang bzhinüîΩtha mi dad pa'i phyir g-yo bar thal lo //
translated: Thus, the substance that is the collection of the hand, etc., is the substance that moves. That very substance is the collection of the other hand, etc. Therefore, because it is not different from the nature of that which moves, it follows that it moves.

original: 'di ltar gcig yin na ni g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin de nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir g-yo bar snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar gcig yin na ni g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin de nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir g-yo bar snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were like that, then because it would be the very nature of that which is moving, it would appear to be moving.

original: snang ba'i g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin yan lag gnyis pa la ma dmigs pa ni yod pa nyid ma yin zhing /
analyzed: snang ba'i g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin yan lag gnyis pa la ma dmigs pa ni yod pa nyid ma yin zhing /
translated: The nature of that which is moving and appears is not observed in the second part.

original: gang las gang med pa de nyid 'di yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi nus so //
analyzed: gang las gang med pa de nyid 'di yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi nus so //
translated: And it cannot be said that that which does not exist in one part is that very thing.

original: yod pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan ni don bya ba byed pa yin la /
analyzed: yod pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan ni don bya ba byed pa yin la /
translated: The reason for existence is the performance of a function.

original: don bya ba byed pa'i rang bzhin yang gang la mngon sum gyis rab tu grub pa de la de kho nang yod pa yin te /
analyzed: don bya ba byed pa'i rang bzhin yang gang la mngon sum gyis rab tu grub pa de la de kho nang yod pa yin te /
translated: And the nature of the performance of a function is that which is well established by direct perception. That very thing exists.

original: de nyid 'di yin na mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid du tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid 'di yin na mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid du tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
translated: If it is that very thing, it is designated as having the same characteristic.

original: yang gang gi tshe g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin don bya ba byed pa de nyid go skabs gzhan du med na don bya ba byed pa'i rang bzhin yang gang la de med pa'i phyir go skabs gzhan du yod pa nyid ma yin la /üîΩyod pa ma yin pa'i phyir yang @144a * //
analyzed: yang gang gi tshe g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin don bya ba byed pa de nyid go skabs gzhan du med na don bya ba byed pa'i rang bzhin yang gang la de med pa'i phyir go skabs gzhan du yod pa nyid ma yin la / yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir yang @144a * //
translated: Moreover, when the nature of something that is moving performs a function, if it does not exist in another opportunity, then the nature of performing a function does not exist in another opportunity, because it does not exist.

original: de'i rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / de'i rang bzhin tha dad par rigs pa yin no zhes 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / de'i rang bzhin tha dad par rigs pa yin no zhes 'chad pa ni /
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that it is devoid of that nature and that it is different from that nature.

original: mig g-yo na yang g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba bskyed pa dag gcig la gcig med pa'i phyir gzhan dag dang gzhan du yang tha dad par thal te /
analyzed: mig g-yo na yang g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba bskyed pa dag gcig la gcig med pa'i phyir gzhan dag dang gzhan du yang tha dad par thal te /
translated: If the eye moves, then that which produces movement and that which produces nonmovement are different from each other, because one does not exist in the other, and it follows that they are different from each other.

original: tha dad pa'i tha snyad kyi yul ni de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i tha snyad kyi yul ni de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the domain of the convention of difference is just that.

original: dper na chu tshags zhes bya ba'i ngas dbyi gu gsum la dbyangs pa mi g-yo la chu ni g-yo ba des na tha dad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang tha dad par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: dper na chu tshags zhes bya ba'i ngas dbyi gu gsum la dbyangs pa mi g-yo la chu ni g-yo ba des na tha dad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang tha dad par blta bar bya'o //
translated: For example, in the case of a water strainer, the three holes are not moving, but the water is moving. Therefore, they are different. In the same way, here they should be seen as different.

original: 'dir yan lag bya ba dang ldan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yan lag bya ba dang ldan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, the parts do not possess activity.
