analyzed: de'i phyir te tha dad pa med kyang de dag gis srog chags kyi bye brag rnams kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bde ba dang mi bde ba'i skyed pa'i rgyu'i phyir don rtogs pa ni rang rig pa'i ngo bo kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, although they are not different, the understanding of objects is only the nature of self-awareness, because they are the causes that generate the happiness and suffering that are concomitant with the faculties of the various living beings.

original: gzhan dag ni dper na sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa dag 'gal ba'i phyir /üîΩdon gcig sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni dper na sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa dag 'gal ba'i phyir / don gcig sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
translated: Others say: For example, because blue and non-blue are mutually exclusive,üîΩa single object cannot have the nature of both blue and non-blue.

original: don gcig 'dod pa dang mi 'dod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: don gcig 'dod pa dang mi 'dod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Similarly, a single object cannot be both desired and undesired,

original: de dag 'gal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag 'gal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because those are mutually exclusive.

original: don gcig la rtogs par byed pa mang po rnams kyi 'dod pa la sogs par snang ba'i shes pa gcig car skye ba yin te /
analyzed: don gcig la rtogs par byed pa mang po rnams kyi 'dod pa la sogs par snang ba'i shes pa gcig car skye ba yin te /
translated: In a single object, many cognitions of desire and so on arise simultaneously.

original: de'i phyir myong ba ji lta ba bzhin du don rnam par gnas pa yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir myong ba ji lta ba bzhin du don rnam par gnas pa yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Therefore, objects are established just as they are experienced.

original: de ni de ltar mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni de ltar mi rigs te /
translated: That is not reasonable.

original: gang gi phyir 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid sim pa dang sim pa ma yin pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar rig gi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid sim pa dang sim pa ma yin pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar rig gi /
translated: Because the aspect of grasping itself is known as pleasure and pain, as satisfaction and dissatisfaction.

original: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the conceptualization of the apprehended object.

original: de la yang dga' ba dang yongs su gzung ba'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin du gcig tu na myong ba nyid du mthong ngo //
analyzed: de la yang dga' ba dang yongs su gzung ba'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin du gcig tu na myong ba nyid du mthong ngo //
translated: And in that, the nature of the aspect of delight and appropriation is seen as experience alone.

original: 'di'i bdag nyid ni 'jog par byed pa gzhan yin par ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i bdag nyid ni 'jog par byed pa gzhan yin par ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin pa yin no //
translated: And it is not reasonable that the nature of this is something else that is the placer.

original: de lta na yang gal te bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i rnam par gyur pa ni phyi rol gyis byas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang gal te bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i rnam par gyur pa ni phyi rol gyis byas pa ma yin te /
translated: Even so, if the transformation of the aspect of grasping that has the nature of pleasure, etc. is not produced by external things,

original: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin de nyid phyi rol gyis byas pa yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin de nyid phyi rol gyis byas pa yin no //
translated: then that very nature of the conceptualization of the apprehended object is produced by external things.

original: 'di la tshad ma ni nyams su myong ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di la tshad ma ni nyams su myong ba yin te /
translated: The valid cognition in this regard is experience.

original: gang gi phyir gzung ba'i rnam pa bde ba'am sdug bsngal bar nges pa ni 'ga' yang med kyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzung ba'i rnam pa bde ba'am sdug bsngal bar nges pa ni 'ga' yang med kyi /
translated: Because there is no certainty whatsoever that the aspect of the apprehended object is pleasure or pain.

original: 'on kyang gzung ba'i rnam pa las rnam par chad pa nyid du gzung ba'i rnam pa'i 'dzin pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhi nyid bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang gzung ba'i rnam pa las rnam par chad pa nyid du gzung ba'i rnam pa'i 'dzin pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhi nyid bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar mthong ngo //
translated: But the grasping of the aspect of the object as a self, which is a separate entity from the aspect of the object, is the basis of the self-habit, and is seen as pleasure and pain.

original: 'di yang skabs ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu byed pa 'di nyid du 'chad par 'gyur @150a * //
analyzed: 'di yang skabs ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu byed pa 'di nyid du 'chad par 'gyur @150a * //
translated: This will be explained in this chapter, according to the occasion.

original: ro ; / des na ji ltar slob dpon gyis bde ba la sogs pa phyi rol gyis byas pa ma yin par dgongs nas bshad pa dang / ji ltar nyams su myong ba bzhin du 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin gyi gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ro ; / des na ji ltar slob dpon gyis bde ba la sogs pa phyi rol gyis byas pa ma yin par dgongs nas bshad pa dang / ji ltar nyams su myong ba bzhin du 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin gyi gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the Master, intending that pleasure, etc. are not produced by an external person, explained that pleasure and pain are the conceptualization of the grasper, and not the conceptualization of the grasped, as is experienced.

original: 'dir 'dod par bya ba 'dod par bzhed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir 'dod par bya ba 'dod par bzhed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, it is not intended that pleasure is to be desired.

original: 'dod pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / dbang po'i shes par rtogs pa'i 'dod pa la sogs pa sems pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'dod pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / dbang po'i shes par rtogs pa'i 'dod pa la sogs pa sems pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because desire is of the nature of conceptualization, and because desire, etc. are conceptualized in the perception of sense consciousness.

original: ji ltar dbang po ba nyid kyi bde ba zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: ji ltar dbang po ba nyid kyi bde ba zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the so-called pleasure of the sense faculties.

original: sim par bya ba nyams su myong ba yang dbang po'i rnam par shes par gyur pa nyid yin gyi mngon par 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sim par bya ba nyams su myong ba yang dbang po'i rnam par shes par gyur pa nyid yin gyi mngon par 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The experience of comfort is also the transformation of the sense consciousness, not the desired object.

original: gang gi phyir dngos po tha dad pa med kyang de tha dad pa'i phyir myong ba ji lta ba bzhin tha dad par rnam par gzhag pa 'dzin pa'i rnam par gyur pa'i rang bzhin ni don dang 'dra ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po tha dad pa med kyang de tha dad pa'i phyir myong ba ji lta ba bzhin tha dad par rnam par gzhag pa 'dzin pa'i rnam par gyur pa'i rang bzhin ni don dang 'dra ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Because, although the thing is not different, it is established as different according to the experience, due to the difference in the transformation of the apprehender. The nature of the transformation is not like the object.

original: 'on kyang don dang 'dra ba ni gzung ba'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin yin pas /
analyzed: 'on kyang don dang 'dra ba ni gzung ba'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin yin pas /
translated: However, what is like the object is the nature of the apprehended aspect.

original: gal te de nyid dngos po tha dad pa med pa la yang tha dad pa ma 'gyur na ni don rnam par gzhag pa myong myong ba la rag las kyi dngos po la ltos pa ni ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de nyid dngos po tha dad pa med pa la yang tha dad pa ma 'gyur na ni don rnam par gzhag pa myong myong ba la rag las kyi dngos po la ltos pa ni ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were not different even when the thing is not different, then the establishment of the object would depend on the experience, and not on the thing.

original: 'di skad du 'dzin pa'i rnam pas bsdus pa'i 'dod pa'am mi 'dod pa dang 'dra ba dngos po ma yin du chug kyang dngos po'i rgyu can du ni 'gyur ba kho nas so //
analyzed: 'di skad du 'dzin pa'i rnam pas bsdus pa'i 'dod pa'am mi 'dod pa dang 'dra ba dngos po ma yin du chug kyang dngos po'i rgyu can du ni 'gyur ba kho nas so //
translated: It is like the desire or non-desire included in the aspect of grasping, and although it is not a thing, it is only the cause of a thing.

original: dngos po gcig las ni grang ba dang tsha ba bzhin du phan tshun 'gal ba'i rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po gcig las ni grang ba dang tsha ba bzhin du phan tshun 'gal ba'i rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes tha dad pa yin no //
translated: Because from one thing, a result with a mutually contradictory nature does not arise, like cold and hot.üîΩTherefore, it is different.

original: gang gi phyir rang rig pa ji lta ba bzhin don rnam pa bar len pa las byung ba tha dad pa 'gal ba yin gyi ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang rig pa ji lta ba bzhin don rnam pa bar len pa las byung ba tha dad pa 'gal ba yin gyi ;
translated: Because self-awareness arises from the appropriation of the aspect of the object, it is contradictory.

original: lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu 'bras bu du ma byed pa ni /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu 'bras bu du ma byed pa ni /
translated: The cause that is a co-originator does not produce many results.

original: 'gal ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gal ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Because there is no contradiction.

original: rnam 'grel las /üîΩnyer len shes pa nang na ni //üîΩyod kyang sdug bsngal la sogs 'byung //
analyzed: rnam 'grel las / nyer len shes pa nang na ni // yod kyang sdug bsngal la sogs 'byung //
translated: As it is explained in the PramaÃÑnÔ¨Å avaÃÑrtika:üîΩAlthough the appropriating consciousness exists internally,

original: zhes bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bshad do //
translated: Suffering and so forth arise.

original: 'dis ni bde ba la sogs pa ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i nang du gtogs pa sngon goms pa la sogs pa'i rgyu can du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni bde ba la sogs pa ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i nang du gtogs pa sngon goms pa la sogs pa'i rgyu can du brjod pa yin no //
translated: This states that pleasure and so on are included among equivalent immediately preceding conditions, and that they arise from causes such as prior habituation.

original: de las kyang bde ba la sogs pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen sngon goms pa la sogs pa sad par byed pa'i rkyen la ltos pa can rgyu tha dad pa las skye ba na lhan cig byed pa gcig la ltos pa mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: de las kyang bde ba la sogs pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen sngon goms pa la sogs pa sad par byed pa'i rkyen la ltos pa can rgyu tha dad pa las skye ba na lhan cig byed pa gcig la ltos pa mi 'gal lo //
translated: And since they arise from different causes, they do not contradict the requirement that they rely on a single coemergent cause.

original: 'di ltar skye ba de nyid la ma goms pa'i @150b khar ro kha mo bcug ma thag tu bzhin gyi rnam par 'gyur ba las rjes su dpag pas dbang po'i sdug bsngal bskyed par mthong la /
analyzed: 'di ltar skye ba de nyid la ma goms pa'i @150b khar ro kha mo bcug ma thag tu bzhin gyi rnam par 'gyur ba las rjes su dpag pas dbang po'i sdug bsngal bskyed par mthong la /
translated: For example, when a person is not habituated to a certain smell, as soon as it is smelled, the face changes color, and from this change in the face, one infers that the person is experiencing the suffering of a sense faculty.

original: phyis goms pa las bzhin gsal ba las rjes su dpag pas sdug bsngal log nas bde ba nyid byed par mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: phyis goms pa las bzhin gsal ba las rjes su dpag pas sdug bsngal log nas bde ba nyid byed par mthong ba yin no //
translated: But later, through habituation, one infers from the clear face that the suffering has ceased and that the person is experiencing pleasure.

original: de bzhin du skye ba gzhan du goms pa'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du skye ba gzhan du goms pa'am /
translated: In the same way, one habituates to the smell in another life.

original: skye ba 'di la goms pa las kyang bde ba la sogs pa rgyud so so la tha dad pa skye ba na don gcig nye bar len pa'i rgyu'i lhan cig byed par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: skye ba 'di la goms pa las kyang bde ba la sogs pa rgyud so so la tha dad pa skye ba na don gcig nye bar len pa'i rgyu'i lhan cig byed par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: And even when pleasure and so on arise separately in different mindstreams due to habituation in this life, they become co-operating conditions for the cause of taking up the same object.

original: de'i phyir bshad pa 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa 'di nyid yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the explanation:

original: gang gi phyir phyi rol gyi don rtogs par byed pa mang po rnams kyis rang gi rnam pa'i dbang gis bde ba'i rgyu dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyur nges par 'gyur ba dang / don de yang ma nges pa'i phyir myong ba ji lta ba bzhin don rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyi rol gyi don rtogs par byed pa mang po rnams kyis rang gi rnam pa'i dbang gis bde ba'i rgyu dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyur nges par 'gyur ba dang / don de yang ma nges pa'i phyir myong ba ji lta ba bzhin don rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: Because many realizers of external objects become ascertained as the cause of pleasure and the cause of pain by the power of their own aspects, and because that object is also uncertain, the object is just as it is experienced, abiding in its own aspect.

original: 'dir 'thad pa 'dis phyi rol gyi don bzlog par 'dod pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir 'thad pa 'dis phyi rol gyi don bzlog par 'dod pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Here, this reasoning is not intended to refute external objects.

original: 'on kyang phyi rol gyi don yod kyang rang rig pa nyid 'bras bur rigs kyi don rig pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang phyi rol gyi don yod kyang rang rig pa nyid 'bras bur rigs kyi don rig pa ni ma yin no //
translated: However, even if external objects exist, self-awareness itself is reasonable as the result, but object-awareness is not.

original: 'di ltar phyi rol gyi don tshul la don ni gzhal bya /
analyzed: 'di ltar phyi rol gyi don tshul la don ni gzhal bya /
translated: Thus, in the system of external objects, the object is the object of comprehension,

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa tshad ma /
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa tshad ma /
translated: and the aspect of the apprehended is the valid cognition.

original: don rig pa ni 'bras bu yin la /üîΩrnam par shes par smra ba la ni bdag nyid gzhal bya /
analyzed: don rig pa ni 'bras bu yin la / rnam par shes par smra ba la ni bdag nyid gzhal bya /
translated: The result is the awareness of the object.üîΩFor the Proponents of Consciousness, the object is the object of evaluation.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni tshad ma /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni tshad ma /
translated: The aspect of the apprehender is the valid knowledge.

original: bdag nyid rig pa ni 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid rig pa ni 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The awareness of itself is the result.

original: yang phyi rol gyi don gyi tshul la 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa gnyis pa don ni gzhal bya /
analyzed: yang phyi rol gyi don gyi tshul la 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa gnyis pa don ni gzhal bya /
translated: In the system of external objects, the second presentation of the result is that the object is the object of evaluation.

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa tshad ma /
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa tshad ma /
translated: The aspect of the apprehended is the valid knowledge.

original: rang rig pa ni 'bras bu'o zhes 'di na 'bras bu 'di ltar rnam par gzhag pa'i 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: rang rig pa ni 'bras bu'o zhes 'di na 'bras bu 'di ltar rnam par gzhag pa'i 'thad pa yin no //
translated: The awareness of itself is the result. This is the justification for positing the result in this way.

original: gang gi phyir rang rig pa ji lta ba bzhin don rnam par 'jog pa de'i phyir rol gyi don yod kyang 'bras bu ni rang rig pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang rig pa ji lta ba bzhin don rnam par 'jog pa de'i phyir rol gyi don yod kyang 'bras bu ni rang rig pa yin no //
translated: Because the result is posited as the awareness of itself, the result is the awareness of itself, even though external objects exist.

original: gal te 'o na rang rig pa 'bras bu yin la de ltar na tshad ma 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'o na rang rig pa 'bras bu yin la de ltar na tshad ma 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIn that case, the awareness of itself is the result, and in that case, the aspect of the apprehender is the valid knowledge,‚Äù

original: bshad pa / rang rig pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa don rtogs pa 'di'i sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / rang rig pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa don rtogs pa 'di'i sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: we reply, the proof of this realization of the object that is the nature of the awareness of itselfüîΩis as follows.

original: tshad ma ni 'di'i yul lta bu'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: tshad ma ni 'di'i yul lta bu'i rnam pa ste /
translated: The valid cognition is the aspect that is like the object of that.

original: yul gyi rnam pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa nyid yin no //
translated: It is the aspect of the object.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ji ltar nyams su myong ba de ltar don nyams su myong bar rnam par 'jog pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ji ltar nyams su myong ba de ltar don nyams su myong bar rnam par 'jog pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it the case that the object is posited as experienced in accordance with the experience of the aspect of the apprehender?

original: des na 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid tshad mar rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: des na 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid tshad mar rigs so zhe na /
translated: Therefore it is reasonable that the aspect of the apprehender is the valid cognition.

original: bden te rang nyid kyi yul la 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i rjes su 'brangs te yul rnam par 'jog na ni 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bden te rang nyid kyi yul la 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i rjes su 'brangs te yul rnam par 'jog na ni 'gyur ro //
translated: That is true, but if the object is posited in dependence on the aspect of the apprehender of its own object, that would be the case.

original: @151a * // yang gang gi tsha phyi rol gyi don yul yin pa de'i tshe phyi rol gyi don khong du chud pa'i rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de nyid tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: @151a * // yang gang gi tsha phyi rol gyi don yul yin pa de'i tshe phyi rol gyi don khong du chud pa'i rgyu mtshan gang yin pa de nyid tshad ma yin la /
translated: Moreover, when the external object is the object, at that time, the reason for understanding the external object is the valid cognition.

original: rgyu mtshan yang sngon po'i rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan yang sngon po'i rnam pa yin no //
translated: And the reason is the aspect of blue.

original: 'di nyid bshad pa'i phyir gsungs pa ni rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa las ma 'das par rang rig pa 'di snang ba bsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid bshad pa'i phyir gsungs pa ni rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa las ma 'das par rang rig pa 'di snang ba bsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to explain this, it is said: ‚ÄúBecause it is not beyond the aspect in accordance with the aspect, autocognition is eliminated.‚Äù

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: gal te sngon po'i rnam pa snang na ni de'i tshe 'dod pa'i rnam pa can gyi myong ba 'di sngon po'i yul can du brtags pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te sngon po'i rnam pa snang na ni de'i tshe 'dod pa'i rnam pa can gyi myong ba 'di sngon po'i yul can du brtags pa yin te /
translated: If the aspect of blue appears, then at that time this experience having the aspect of desire is considered to be the subject of the object blue.

original: de bzhin du rnam pa gzhan la yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa gzhan la yang sbyar ro //
translated: The same is to be applied in the same way to the other aspects.

original: de'i phyir shes pa rnam pa dang bcas pa la 'dod pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyams su myong ba'i gzung ba'i rnam pa'i dbang gis don gyi yul can du rnam par 'jog pa yin pa des na de nyid tshad ma yin no //üîΩgal te 'o na phyi rol la rang rig pa nyid 'bras bu yin na'o na ji ltar 'bras bu rnam par gzhag par don rig par 'bras bu yin par brjod ce na /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa rnam pa dang bcas pa la 'dod pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyams su myong ba'i gzung ba'i rnam pa'i dbang gis don gyi yul can du rnam par 'jog pa yin pa des na de nyid tshad ma yin no // gal te 'o na phyi rol la rang rig pa nyid 'bras bu yin na'o na ji ltar 'bras bu rnam par gzhag par don rig par 'bras bu yin par brjod ce na /
translated: Therefore, consciousness together with its aspect is posited as the subject of the object by the power of the apprehended aspect that is the experience of the nature of desire and so on. Therefore that alone is valid knowledge.üîΩIf reflexive awareness is the result, then how is it that the result is posited as the awareness of the object?

original: bshad pa / rang rig pa yin yang 'bras bu las te /
analyzed: bshad pa / rang rig pa yin yang 'bras bu las te /
translated: Although it is reflexive awareness, it is the result in terms of clinging.

original: zhen pa las 'di ni don rig pa yin par blta'o //üîΩrig pa ni ji ltar lhag par zhen pa /
analyzed: zhen pa las 'di ni don rig pa yin par blta'o // rig pa ni ji ltar lhag par zhen pa /
translated: This is seen as the awareness of the object.

original: de ltar 'bras bu brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: de ltar 'bras bu brjod pa yin la /
translated: Awareness is the result in accordance with how it is conceived.

original: don dang 'brel par yang zhen pa de'i phyir don rig pa nyid 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: don dang 'brel par yang zhen pa de'i phyir don rig pa nyid 'bras bu yin no //
translated: Because it is also attached to the object, the awareness of the object is the result.

original: 'o na ji ltar rang rig pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar rang rig pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it reflexive awareness?

original: bshad pa / don gnas pa yul rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa ni rang rig pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa / don gnas pa yul rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa ni rang rig pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
translated: It is said: The object-abiding, the arrangement of the object, is the nature of reflexive awareness.

original: don rnam par gnas pa ni myong ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don rnam par gnas pa ni myong ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object-abiding is the nature of experience.

original: 'di ltar ji ltar gzung ba'i rnam pa dkar po dang dkar po ma yin pa la sogs pa nyams su myong ba dang / de bzhin du 'dzin pa'i rnam pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba ci 'dra ba yang dag par rig pa de ltar sngon po'am sngon po ma yin pa bde ba la sogs pa'i rgyur rnam par 'jog cing rig pa de'i phyir don rig pa ni rang rig pa'iüîΩngo bo yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar ji ltar gzung ba'i rnam pa dkar po dang dkar po ma yin pa la sogs pa nyams su myong ba dang / de bzhin du 'dzin pa'i rnam pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba ci 'dra ba yang dag par rig pa de ltar sngon po'am sngon po ma yin pa bde ba la sogs pa'i rgyur rnam par 'jog cing rig pa de'i phyir don rig pa ni rang rig pa'iüîΩngo bo yin no //
translated: Thus, just as the aspect of the apprehended, such as white and not white, is experienced, and likewise, the aspect of the apprehender, such as happiness and suffering, is correctly known, in that way, blue or not blue, happiness and so on, are arranged and known as the cause. Therefore, the awareness of the object is the nature of reflexive awareness.

original: de'i phyir de ltar tha snyad kyi 'bras bu'i dbang gis rang rig pa yin yang don rig par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar tha snyad kyi 'bras bu'i dbang gis rang rig pa yin yang don rig par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, although it is reflexive awareness in terms of the power of the result of convention, it is called awareness of objects.

original: de nyid kyi phyir te yul nyid tshad ma'i bya ba yin pa dang / de nyid kyi rig pa 'bras bu yin pa de'i phyir tshad ma dang 'bras bu dag yul tha dad pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir te yul nyid tshad ma'i bya ba yin pa dang / de nyid kyi rig pa 'bras bu yin pa de'i phyir tshad ma dang 'bras bu dag yul tha dad pa yang ma yin no //
translated: For that very reason, the object itself is the function of valid knowledge, and that very awareness is the result. Therefore, valid knowledge and its result are not different objects.

original: gal te bdag rig pa 'bras bu dang yul gzhal bya yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te bdag rig pa 'bras bu dang yul gzhal bya yin na ni /
translated: If reflexive awareness were the result and the object of comprehension,

original: de'i tshe tshad ma dang @151b 'bras bu yul tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur ba na /
analyzed: de'i tshe tshad ma dang @151b 'bras bu yul tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur ba na /
translated: then at that time valid knowledge and its result would definitely be different objects.

original: da ltar ni cung zhig kyang tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: da ltar ni cung zhig kyang tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But at present, they are not different in the least.

original: 'o na ji ltar rang rig pa 'bras bur brjod ci na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar rang rig pa 'bras bur brjod ci na /
translated: Well then, how is reflexive awareness said to be the result?

original: bshad pa / don rig pa'i rang bzhin gang zhig ces rang bzhin sems pa na ni /
analyzed: bshad pa / don rig pa'i rang bzhin gang zhig ces rang bzhin sems pa na ni /
translated: In response, it is said: When one thinks of the nature of awareness of objects,

original: rang nyid rig pa 'bras bur bshad de /
analyzed: rang nyid rig pa 'bras bur bshad de /
translated: reflexive awareness is explained to be the result.

original: don rig pa ni de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: don rig pa ni de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because awareness of objects is its nature.

original: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the nature of reflexive awareness.

original: de la skabs kyi don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la skabs kyi don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The point of the present context is as follows.

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa yongs su gcod par snang ba'i 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni bdag nyid kyi yul can yin pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi don la tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa yongs su gcod par snang ba'i 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni bdag nyid kyi yul can yin pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi don la tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: The aspect of the apprehender that appears to ascertain the aspect of the apprehended is not a valid cognition in regard to external objects because it is subjective.

original: rnam 'grel las /
analyzed: rnam 'grel las /
translated: The Pramii(laviirttikam) says:

original: 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid ni yongs su zin kyang don gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid ni yongs su zin kyang don gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Even though it is grasped, it is not another object,

original: phyi rol gyi don rnams la ltos pa ma yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don rnams la ltos pa ma yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: and so it does not depend on external objects.

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa ni phyi rol tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa ni phyi rol tshad ma yin te /
translated: The aspect of the apprehended is a valid cognition in regard to external objects.

original: de nyid ni ji ltar rigs pa de ltar don rig par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni ji ltar rigs pa de ltar don rig par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: It is that which cognizes the object in whatever way it is.

original: phyi rol gyi don rig pa ni gzhan la gzung ba'i rnam pa rig pa yang gzhan nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don rig pa ni gzhan la gzung ba'i rnam pa rig pa yang gzhan nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: The cognition of external objects is not different from the cognition of the aspect of the apprehended.

original: phyi rol gyi don ni rang gi ngo bos mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don ni rang gi ngo bos mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because external objects are not seen by their own nature.

original: de'i phyir bdag rig pa don rig par ston pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pa de nyid don la tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag rig pa don rig par ston pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pa de nyid don la tshad ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, the aspect of the object that is taught to be self-awareness is valid knowledge in regard to the object.

original: rang rig pa yin yang don rig pa'i rang bzhin du lhag par zhen pa na zhen pa'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis don rig par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: rang rig pa yin yang don rig pa'i rang bzhin du lhag par zhen pa na zhen pa'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis don rig par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Even though it is self-awareness, when it is conceived to be the nature of awareness of the object, it is called awareness of the object by the power of the result of conception.

original: des na tshad ma dang 'bras bu dag yul tha mi dad do //
analyzed: des na tshad ma dang 'bras bu dag yul tha mi dad do //
translated: Therefore valid knowledge and its result do not have different objects.

original: gang gi phyir gzung ba'i rnam pa'i dbang gis de dang de'i rig par gnas pa des na yul tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzung ba'i rnam pa'i dbang gis de dang de'i rig par gnas pa des na yul tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is posited as awareness of this or that by the power of the aspect of the object, they do not have different objects.

original: gal te don yod kyang rnam pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs la rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis phyi rol gyi don la snang ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te don yod kyang rnam pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs la rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis phyi rol gyi don la snang ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Even though the object exists, in the position that asserts aspects, the appearance of an external object is not by its own nature.

original: 'on kyang nyams su myong ba'i dbang gis sngon po la sogs pa mthong ba dang / bde ba la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid rnam par gnas pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on kyang nyams su myong ba'i dbang gis sngon po la sogs pa mthong ba dang / bde ba la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid rnam par gnas pa yin na /
translated: However, by the power of experience, the cause of seeing blue and so on and the cause of pleasure and so on are posited.

original: 'o na ni phyi rol gyi don du smra ba rnams 'dra ba'i skyed par byed pa gzhal byar 'dod par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'o na ni phyi rol gyi don du smra ba rnams 'dra ba'i skyed par byed pa gzhal byar 'dod par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: Well, then, those who advocate external objects would not accept a similar cause to be an object of comprehension.

original: 'on kyang de dang 'bras bu'am gzhan 'dra yang rung sta /
analyzed: 'on kyang de dang 'bras bu'am gzhan 'dra yang rung sta /
translated: However, it is similar to its effect or to something else.

original: 'dra ba'am mi 'dra yang bla /
analyzed: 'dra ba'am mi 'dra yang bla /
translated: It is similar or dissimilar.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba sngon po la sogs pa gzung ba'i rnam pa dang / bde ba la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i rnam par rab tu snang ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba sngon po la sogs pa gzung ba'i rnam pa dang / bde ba la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i rnam par rab tu snang ba ste /
translated: In that way, the aspect of the apprehended, such as blue, and the aspect of the apprehender, such as pleasure, appear.

original: gsal ba'i shes pa'i rgyu gang gi phyir don yang yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba'i shes pa'i rgyu gang gi phyir don yang yin no //
translated: Since it is the cause of the clear consciousness, it is an object.

original: yin pas @152a * //
analyzed: yin pas @152a * //
translated: Since it is an object,üîΩit is an object of comprehension.

original: na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äútherefore‚Äù is ‚Äúbecause of that.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir don rgyu yin pa de'i phyir don de gzhal bya yin par 'dod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don rgyu yin pa de'i phyir don de gzhal bya yin par 'dod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since the object is the cause, it is asserted to be an object of comprehension.

original: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The intention is as follows.

original: 'dra bar nges pa ni gnyi ga mthong ba la rag las ba yin la /
analyzed: 'dra bar nges pa ni gnyi ga mthong ba la rag las ba yin la /
translated: The ascertainment of similarity depends on seeing both.

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs la don ni sngar gang gis kyang mthong ba ma yin na /
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs la don ni sngar gang gis kyang mthong ba ma yin na /
translated: In the system that possesses aspects, since the object has not been seen by anyone previously,

original: de ci 'dra bar brtag / rang nyid kyis kyang ji ltar nyams su myong ba de'i bdag nyid ma yin yang bde ba la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid du nges par 'dod pa des na 'dra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de ci 'dra bar brtag / rang nyid kyis kyang ji ltar nyams su myong ba de'i bdag nyid ma yin yang bde ba la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid du nges par 'dod pa des na 'dra ba ma yin no //
translated: Even though it is not of the nature of the experience of the person, it is definitely asserted to be the cause of pleasure and so on. Therefore it is not like that.

original: cig shos logs na gnas pas phyi rol gyi don du smra ba la yul 'di lta bu nyid yin na ha cang thal bar mthong nas slob dpon la smras pa /
analyzed: cig shos logs na gnas pas phyi rol gyi don du smra ba la yul 'di lta bu nyid yin na ha cang thal bar mthong nas slob dpon la smras pa /
translated: The opponent, who asserts external objects, sees that if the object were like that, it would be absurd, and so he says to the master:

original: ji ltar rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar te /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar te /
translated: How is it like some aspect?

original: rgyu 'ga' zhig las don dngos te 'dra ba spangs nas sngon po'i rnam par snang na ji ltar don 'dzin /
analyzed: rgyu 'ga' zhig las don dngos te 'dra ba spangs nas sngon po'i rnam par snang na ji ltar don 'dzin /
translated: If the object is a thing that is a cause, but it is excluded from being like that and appears as the aspect of blue, how does it apprehend the object?

original: shes pa de las skyes pa dang de dang 'dra ba las ni don 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin na /üîΩskyed par byed pa tsam ni yul du srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa de las skyes pa dang de dang 'dra ba las ni don 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin na / skyed par byed pa tsam ni yul du srid pa ma yin te /
translated: It is from that consciousness that it arises and from that which is like that that the object is apprehended.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Mere production is not possible as an object because that would be absurd.

original: de nyid slob dpon gyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid slob dpon gyis gsungs pa /
translated: The master himself says that:

original: ngas kyang de 'dra ba'i yul ni mi shes so //
analyzed: ngas kyang de 'dra ba'i yul ni mi shes so //
translated: I do not know such a country.

original: phyi'i don du smra ba nyid la 'dri bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: phyi'i don du smra ba nyid la 'dri bar bya ba yin te /
translated: It is the external object advocates who are to be questioned.

original: gang zhig phyi'i don khas len pa de thal ba 'dir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang zhig phyi'i don khas len pa de thal ba 'dir 'gyur ro //
translated: This reductio applies to those who accept external objects.

original: gang mi snang ba dang bde ba la sogs pa'i rgyur nges pa'i don dang dbang po'i yul du 'dod pa la yin gyi /
analyzed: gang mi snang ba dang bde ba la sogs pa'i rgyur nges pa'i don dang dbang po'i yul du 'dod pa la yin gyi /
translated: It is the object which is ascertained as the cause of the non-appearance of pleasure, etc., and is accepted as the object of the sense faculties.

original: kho bo ni da ltar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: kho bo ni da ltar mi 'dod do //
translated: But I do not accept it now.

original: tshig le'ur byas par ma brjod pa'i don 'grel pa las bar skabs su tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas par ma brjod pa'i don 'grel pa las bar skabs su tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This verse is an interpolation in the commentary, not found in the verse text.

original: gal te phyi rol gyi don med na 'o na tshad ma dang gzhal bya dang 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa de'i kho na nyid du mi 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas /
analyzed: gal te phyi rol gyi don med na 'o na tshad ma dang gzhal bya dang 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa de'i kho na nyid du mi 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas /
translated: If external objects do not exist, then the establishment of valid cognition, the object of valid cognition, and the result will not be tenable.

original: phyi rol gyi don med na'o na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don med na'o na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Thinking this, he says, ‚ÄúIf external objects do not exist, etc.‚Äù

original: 'di la bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di la bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Here he says, ‚ÄúThis has already been explained.‚ÄùüîΩAs it is said:

original: de ltar 'khrul pas mthong 'gyur ba //
analyzed: de ltar 'khrul pas mthong 'gyur ba //
translated: Thus, it is seen through delusion.

original: zhes bya ba 'di'i nang du de kho na nyid las ma 'das par rnam par gzhag pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di'i nang du de kho na nyid las ma 'das par rnam par gzhag pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: The meaning of this is not that the presentation is not in accordance with reality,

original: 'on kyang 'khrul pa las so zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'khrul pa las so zhes bya bar ro //
translated: but rather that it is in accordance with error.

original: 'di ltar yul lta bu'i rnam pa gang yin pa dang / nang du zhes bya ba bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhi ma yin par rnam par chad pa las bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhir rnam par chad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar yul lta bu'i rnam pa gang yin pa dang / nang du zhes bya ba bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhi ma yin par rnam par chad pa las bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhir rnam par chad pa'o //
translated: Thus, the aspect that is like an object and the basis of the apprehension of an inner self are distinguished from what is not the basis of the apprehension of an inner self.

original: 'di'i nang du yongs su gcod pa ni yul gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: 'di'i nang du yongs su gcod pa ni yul gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The determination of this is the apprehension of the aspect of an object.

original: 'dis @152b yongs su gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dis @152b yongs su gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is so called because it determines that.

original: de ni rang rig par bya ba'i rang bzhin du skye ba nyid na de ltar mtshon par 'gyur te 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang rig par bya ba'i rang bzhin du skye ba nyid na de ltar mtshon par 'gyur te 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When it arises in the nature of self-awareness, it is characterized in that way, because it is in error.

original: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes pa de nyid ni mi bden pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa rang la med pa kun du ston pa skye'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes pa de nyid ni mi bden pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa rang la med pa kun du ston pa skye'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement is that the self-awareness arises to reveal the unrealized and apprehending aspects that do not exist in itself.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par shes pa de la gzhal bya la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ni ji ltar 'khrul pas mtshon pa ltar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par shes pa de la gzhal bya la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ni ji ltar 'khrul pas mtshon pa ltar byed pa yin no //
translated: The presentation of the object of comprehension and so forth in that consciousness of the nature of such an error is just as it is imputed by error.

original: yongs su gcod pa 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid gzung ba'i cha yongs su gcod par lhag par zhen pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: yongs su gcod pa 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid gzung ba'i cha yongs su gcod par lhag par zhen pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the nature of the apprehending aspect that determines the object of comprehension the aspect of the apprehended object?

original: gzung ba'i cha ni nye bar bslad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gzung ba'i cha ni nye bar bslad pa yin gyi /
translated: The aspect of the apprehended object is the superimposed object.

original: bdag nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the nature of the consciousness itself.

original: des na 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni de rtogs pa'i tshad ma yin gyi /
analyzed: des na 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni de rtogs pa'i tshad ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore the apprehending aspect is the valid knowledge that understands that object,

original: bdag nyid la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid la ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not the nature of the consciousness itself.

original: gang gi phyir des bdag nyid yongs su bcad par nges pa ni med kyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir des bdag nyid yongs su bcad par nges pa ni med kyi /
translated: Because it is not certain that it determines the nature of the consciousness itself.

original: 'on kyang gzung ba'i cha nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang gzung ba'i cha nyid do //
translated: However, it is the aspect of the apprehended object.

original: de bzhin du 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yang brtag pa yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yang brtag pa yin la /
translated: In the same way, the apprehending aspect is also a superimposition.

original: bdag nyid yongs su gcod par rung ba'i tshad ma ni dngos por 'dod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bdag nyid yongs su gcod par rung ba'i tshad ma ni dngos por 'dod pa yin gyi /
translated: The valid knowledge that is suitable to determine the nature of the consciousness itself is asserted to be a real entity,

original: brtag pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: brtag pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: but a superimposition is not.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here someone says:

original: rnam par shes pa ni bden pa gsal bar nus pa ma rig pa'i bdag nyid can ni dngos po yin gyi brtag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni bden pa gsal bar nus pa ma rig pa'i bdag nyid can ni dngos po yin gyi brtag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Consciousness, which is capable of manifesting the truth, is a thing, not an imputation.

original: rnam par shes pa bdag ma gsal bar ni mi bden pa gsal bar nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bdag ma gsal bar ni mi bden pa gsal bar nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Consciousness, which is not capable of manifesting the self, is not capable of manifesting the untrue.

original: des na mi bden pa gsal bar nus pa 'dzin pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni bden pa gsal bar nus pa dang tha mi dad pa yin pa des na /
analyzed: des na mi bden pa gsal bar nus pa 'dzin pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni bden pa gsal bar nus pa dang tha mi dad pa yin pa des na /
translated: Therefore, the so-called aspect of apprehending that is capable of manifesting the untrue is not different from that which is capable of manifesting the truth.

original: bdag dang bdag ma yin pa gsal bar nus pa /
analyzed: bdag dang bdag ma yin pa gsal bar nus pa /
translated: Thus, that which is capable of manifesting the self and the non-self

original: dga' ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshad ma ni dngos po nyid yin no //
analyzed: dga' ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshad ma ni dngos po nyid yin no //
translated: is the valid cognition whose nature is joy, etc., and is a thing.

original: gang yang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa mi bden pa gnyis brjod pa de ni tha dad pa'i don shes pa las snang bar chad nas med pa'i phyir tha dad pa'i don na 'dzin pa la ltos nas mi bden pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: gang yang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa mi bden pa gnyis brjod pa de ni tha dad pa'i don shes pa las snang bar chad nas med pa'i phyir tha dad pa'i don na 'dzin pa la ltos nas mi bden pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: As for the expression of the two unreal aspects of apprehending, since they appear as if interrupted from the cognition of different objects, they are unreal in dependence on the apprehension of different objects.

original: mi bden pa gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin yang brdzun pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mi bden pa gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin yang brdzun pa ni ma yin no //
translated: However, the nature that manifests the unreal is not false.

original: ji ltar mi bden pa gsal bar byed bar nus pa gdon mi za ba nyid du khas blang bar bya ba de ltar ni mdun nyid du ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar mi bden pa gsal bar byed bar nus pa gdon mi za ba nyid du khas blang bar bya ba de ltar ni mdun nyid du ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: We will show how it is possible to clarify what is not true, and how it is necessary to accept that.

original: gzhal bya ni sgro btags pa'i don dang lhan cig pa'i sgro ma btags pa'i rang bzhin yin no //üîΩbdag nyid du gyur ba ma yin pa sgro btags pa gzhal bya yin @153a * //
analyzed: gzhal bya ni sgro btags pa'i don dang lhan cig pa'i sgro ma btags pa'i rang bzhin yin no // bdag nyid du gyur ba ma yin pa sgro btags pa gzhal bya yin @153a * //
translated: The object of comprehension is the nature of the superimposed object together with the superimposed object.

original: par gyur na bdag nyid gzhal bya zhes bya ba dang 'gal ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: par gyur na bdag nyid gzhal bya zhes bya ba dang 'gal ba ma yin nam /
translated: The superimposed object is the object of comprehension, but is it not contradictory to say that the nature of the superimposed object is the object of comprehension?

original: 'gal ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gal ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no contradiction,

original: gang gi phyir bdag gi sgras ni rang bzhin gzhan 'gog par 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag gi sgras ni rang bzhin gzhan 'gog par 'dod pa yin te /
translated: because the word ‚Äúitself‚Äù is intended to exclude other natures.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin de las tha dad pa med pa'i rang bzhin lhan cig tu rig par gyur pa na bdag nyid gzhal byar brjod pa yin no //üîΩrang bzhin tha dad pa ni rnam pa dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin de las tha dad pa med pa'i rang bzhin lhan cig tu rig par gyur pa na bdag nyid gzhal byar brjod pa yin no // rang bzhin tha dad pa ni rnam pa dang bcas pa'am /
translated: When the nature of the apprehended aspect is known to be inseparable from that nature, it is said that the nature itself is the object of comprehension.

original: rnam pa med pa'i shes par rig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa med pa'i shes par rig pa ma yin te /
translated: A different nature is not known to be a cognition that has an aspect or is without an aspect.

original: nges par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no definite action.

original: ma rig pa'i nus pas yongs su zin pa'i shes pa mi bden pa gsal bar byed pa skye ba'i phyir 'gal ba ci yod /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i nus pas yongs su zin pa'i shes pa mi bden pa gsal bar byed pa skye ba'i phyir 'gal ba ci yod /
translated: Because a consciousness that is taken hold of by the power of ignorance and that is a clarifier of the unreal arises, what contradiction is there?

original: yongs su gcod pa'i nus pa de nyid las bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nang du gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: yongs su gcod pa'i nus pa de nyid las bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nang du gsal ba yin te /
translated: The very capacity to determine is the inner clarity of the nature of pleasure, etc.

original: gsal bar byed pa'i cha gsal bar nyid ni gsal bar bya ba'i rang bzhin gsal ba yin pa des na rang rig pa'i cha gsal ba nyid 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa'i cha gsal bar nyid ni gsal bar bya ba'i rang bzhin gsal ba yin pa des na rang rig pa'i cha gsal ba nyid 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The aspect of the clarifier is itself the clarity of the nature of the clarified. Therefore, the clarity of the aspect of reflexive awareness is the effect.

original: de bshad pa ni rang nyid 'ba' zhig rig pa'i rang bzhin du gsal ba ste /
analyzed: de bshad pa ni rang nyid 'ba' zhig rig pa'i rang bzhin du gsal ba ste /
translated: The explanation of that is as follows: It is the clarity of the nature of reflexive awareness alone.

original: yongs su gcod pa yin no //
analyzed: yongs su gcod pa yin no //
translated: It is the determination.

original: de'i phyir de ltar shes pa'i cha gsum du snang ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar shes pa'i cha gsum du snang ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, the aspect of consciousness appears as threefold in that way.

original: gzung ba'i cha dang / 'dzin pa'i cha dang / 'dzin pa'i rang rig pa'o //
analyzed: gzung ba'i cha dang / 'dzin pa'i cha dang / 'dzin pa'i rang rig pa'o //
translated: There is the aspect of the object of apprehension, the aspect of the apprehender, and the reflexive awareness of the apprehender.

original: de la gzhal bya don tha dad pa yin na ni /
analyzed: de la gzhal bya don tha dad pa yin na ni /
translated: If the object of comprehension is a different object,

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa tshad ma 'dzin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa tshad ma 'dzin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The aspect of the object is the result of valid knowledge.

original: yongs su gcad par bya ba gzhan med na ni //
analyzed: yongs su gcad par bya ba gzhan med na ni //
translated: If there is no other object to be eliminated,

original: ji ltar snang bzhin pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pa ni gzhal bya /
analyzed: ji ltar snang bzhin pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pa ni gzhal bya /
translated: the aspect of the object that appears as it is is the object of comprehension.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i 'dzin pa nyid ni tshad ma sim pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du myong ba ni 'bras bu yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i 'dzin pa nyid ni tshad ma sim pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du myong ba ni 'bras bu yin gyi /
translated: The apprehension of the aspect of the apprehender is valid knowledge. The experience of the nature of satisfaction and so on is the result.

original: de'i dbang gis don rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: de'i dbang gis don rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: Because the object is posited by the power of that, it has been explained.

original: sngon por snang ba rags pa gcig pu'i rnam par rtogs la /
analyzed: sngon por snang ba rags pa gcig pu'i rnam par rtogs la /
translated: In the realization of a single coarse appearance of blue,

original: sngon po'i rnam pa nyams su myong ba de la ldog pa'i dbye bas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang rig ba'i char brtags pa yin te /
analyzed: sngon po'i rnam pa nyams su myong ba de la ldog pa'i dbye bas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang rig ba'i char brtags pa yin te /
translated: the experience of the aspect of blue is imputed as the part of the apprehended, the apprehender, and the awareness through the division of negation.

original: dper na sngon po de nyid kyi skad cig ma nyid dang / bdag nyid med pa nyid dang / dngos po nyid ldog pa'i dbye bas brtags pa lta bu ma yin nam /
analyzed: dper na sngon po de nyid kyi skad cig ma nyid dang / bdag nyid med pa nyid dang / dngos po nyid ldog pa'i dbye bas brtags pa lta bu ma yin nam /
translated: For example, is it not like the negation of the momentariness of that blue itself, its lack of self, and its substantiality through the division of negation?

original: de'i phyir rnam pa gsum snang ba yin te zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa gsum snang ba yin te zhes brjod ce na /
translated: Therefore, it is said that the three appear.

original: 'di la bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di la bshad pa /
translated: In response to this, we ask:

original: ci snang ba'i dngos po yod pa na sim bar rig pa dus mtshungs par nyams su myong ba yod dam /
analyzed: ci snang ba'i dngos po yod pa na sim bar rig pa dus mtshungs par nyams su myong ba yod dam /
translated: When an existent thing appears, is there a simultaneous experience of the cognition that is the experience of the object?

original: 'on te med /
analyzed: 'on te med /
translated: Or is there not?

original: de bsnyon na ni mi bsnyon pa zhes bya ba @153b de 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bsnyon na ni mi bsnyon pa zhes bya ba @153b de 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: If you deny that, then there is nothing at all that is not denied.

original: dus tha dad pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dus tha dad pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it different,

original: cig car nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cig car nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is experienced simultaneously.

original: myur du 'jug pa las cig car snang bar 'khrul pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: myur du 'jug pa las cig car snang bar 'khrul pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it a confusion of simultaneous appearance due to rapid engagement,

original: shes pa thams cad skad cig ma nyid kyis myur bar khyad par med pa'i phyir rim gyis snang ba med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa thams cad skad cig ma nyid kyis myur bar khyad par med pa'i phyir rim gyis snang ba med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because all cognitions are not different in being rapid due to being momentary, and therefore it follows that there is no gradual appearance.üîΩNor can it be said that the experience of the object that appears simultaneously with the object is the pleasure that is based on the sense faculty, because

original: snang ba'i don dang lhan cig dus gcig tu nyams su myong ba dbang po la brten pa'i bde ba de yang snang ba'i sngon po nyid yin no zhes bya bar ni brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: snang ba'i don dang lhan cig dus gcig tu nyams su myong ba dbang po la brten pa'i bde ba de yang snang ba'i sngon po nyid yin no zhes bya bar ni brjod par mi nus te /
translated: it is not possible to say that the pleasure that is based on the sense faculty is the blue that appears.

original: snang ba rnams ni mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba rnams ni mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the appearances are not seen.

original: mthong ba tha dad pa med par snang na ni bde ba'i rnam pa nyid du snang bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: mthong ba tha dad pa med par snang na ni bde ba'i rnam pa nyid du snang bar 'gyur na /
translated: If the appearance were not different from the seeing, it would appear in the aspect of pleasure.

original: snang ba ni ma yin no ;
analyzed: snang ba ni ma yin no ;
translated: But it is not seen.

original: /'di bde ba'i bdag nyid du snang ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de ga las she na /
analyzed: /'di bde ba'i bdag nyid du snang ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de ga las she na /
translated: How do you know that it does not appear as pleasure?

original: mthong ba'i sngon po'i bde ba'i bdag nyid du ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba'i sngon po'i bde ba'i bdag nyid du ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the blue that is seen is not ascertained as having the nature of pleasure.

original: rnam par chad pa'i rang bzhin 'di nyid bde ba'am sdug bsngal bar gyur ro zhes snang ba bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du nges pa 'di ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa des na /
analyzed: rnam par chad pa'i rang bzhin 'di nyid bde ba'am sdug bsngal bar gyur ro zhes snang ba bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du nges pa 'di ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa des na /
translated: And it is not the case that there is any ascertainment of the nature of pleasure, etc., in the appearance of this very divided nature as pleasure or pain.

original: mthong ba bde ba la sogs par gsal bar snang ba nyid du zhen pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba bde ba la sogs par gsal bar snang ba nyid du zhen pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the appearance of pleasure, etc. is not ascertained as the clear appearance of pleasure, etc.

original: 'di ltar 'di ni 'di ltar snang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 'di'i rgyu ni snang ba nyid du nges pa kho na yin par mthong gi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di ni 'di ltar snang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 'di'i rgyu ni snang ba nyid du nges pa kho na yin par mthong gi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: For, the cause of the expression ‚Äúit appears thus‚Äù is only the ascertainment of the appearance, and not anything else.

original: 'di ni kho bo'i mngon sum yin no zhes khas len pa 'di'i rgyu mngon sum nyid du nges pa de las gzhan gang yang yin bar khyed kyis mthong /
analyzed: 'di ni kho bo'i mngon sum yin no zhes khas len pa 'di'i rgyu mngon sum nyid du nges pa de las gzhan gang yang yin bar khyed kyis mthong /
translated: You see, the reason why one accepts ‚ÄúI directly perceive this‚Äù is that one is certain that it is direct perception. What else could it be?

original: de nyid kyi phyir mngon sum gyi tshad ma ni nges pa la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mngon sum gyi tshad ma ni nges pa la ltos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, direct perception is dependent on certainty.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi byed pa'i rjes su 'brang bas ni zhen pa nyid rgyu yin par khas blang ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi byed pa'i rjes su 'brang bas ni zhen pa nyid rgyu yin par khas blang ngo //
translated: Therefore, because it follows the activity of direct perception, one accepts that ascertainment is the cause.

original: mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can gyi zhen pas yul du ma byas pa la mngon sum ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes te 'di tshad ma gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can gyi zhen pas yul du ma byas pa la mngon sum ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes te 'di tshad ma gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Because that which is not engaged by ascertainment that is preceded by direct perception is not direct perception, it is not another valid cognition.

original: de'i phyir snang ba ni bde ba'i rnam par snang ba ma yin no zhes bya bar nges pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir snang ba ni bde ba'i rnam par snang ba ma yin no zhes bya bar nges pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, it is ascertained that the appearance is not an appearance of pleasure.

original: de ltar nges pas kyang sngon po bde ba'i rnam pas stong bas mngon sum gyis mthong ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar nges pas kyang sngon po bde ba'i rnam pas stong bas mngon sum gyis mthong ba ste /
translated: And because of that ascertainment, one sees with direct perception that blue is empty of the aspect of pleasure.

original: rjes su dpag pas ni tha snyad du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas ni tha snyad du byed pa yin no //
translated: But one makes a convention with inference.

original: snang ba'i sngon po las tha dad pa med par yod pa la ni snang ba nyid kyis khyab pa yin na /
analyzed: snang ba'i sngon po las tha dad pa med par yod pa la ni snang ba nyid kyis khyab pa yin na /
translated: If something exists without being different from the blue that is seen, it must be pervaded by the blue that is seen.

original: 'di la ni khyab par byed pa snang ba nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la ni khyab par byed pa snang ba nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But the pervader, the blue that is seen, does not exist here.

original: mi dmigs pa tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba la ni rang bzhin gyi rtags yin no zhes rgya cher gtan la phab zin to //üîΩsnang ba gang zhig gang du @154a * //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba la ni rang bzhin gyi rtags yin no zhes rgya cher gtan la phab zin to // snang ba gang zhig gang du @154a * //
translated: We have already extensively determined that nonapprehension is a logical proof that establishes a linguistic convention, and it is an inference based on the nature of things.

original: ma dmigs pa de ni de na med de /
analyzed: ma dmigs pa de ni de na med de /
translated: Whatever is not apprehended in a given appearance does not exist in that appearance.

original: dper na sa phyogs la bum ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sa phyogs la bum ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, a pot does not exist in a place where there is no pot.

original: snang ba'i sngon po la yang snang ba'i bde ba'i rang bzhin ma dmigs so //
analyzed: snang ba'i sngon po la yang snang ba'i bde ba'i rang bzhin ma dmigs so //
translated: And the nature of pleasure, which is seen in the blue that is seen, is not apprehended.

original: gang gi phyir snang ba las tha dad pa 'ga' zhig ni snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir snang ba las tha dad pa 'ga' zhig ni snang ba ma yin te /
translated: Because nothing that is different from the appearance is not an appearance,

original: bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like a pot, etc.

original: sha za la sogs pa 'ga' zhig ni mi snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ltar brtag par nus pa snang ba nyid ni ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: sha za la sogs pa 'ga' zhig ni mi snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ltar brtag par nus pa snang ba nyid ni ma grub pa yin no //
translated: It is not possible to imagine that something like a demon is not an appearance, as in the case of someone who says, ‚ÄúI do not see a demon.‚ÄùüîΩThe appearance itself is not established.

original: de nyid kyi phyir tha dad pa'i yul can gyi mi dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa zhes khyad par du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir tha dad pa'i yul can gyi mi dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa zhes khyad par du byas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is qualified as ‚Äúhaving the nature of the non-apprehension of a different object.‚Äù

original: snang ba las tha dad pa med par brtags pa gang yin pa de ni snang ba kho na ste ;
analyzed: snang ba las tha dad pa med par brtags pa gang yin pa de ni snang ba kho na ste ;
translated: That which is imagined to be non-different from the appearance is just the appearance.

original: des na khyad par du ma brjod do zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des na khyad par du ma brjod do zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is not mentioned as a separate [type of non-apprehension].

original: snang ba las tha mi dad pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni snang bar brjod mi nus pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: snang ba las tha mi dad pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni snang bar brjod mi nus pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt everything that is non-different from the appearance incapable of being expressed as an appearance?

original: dper na skad cig ma bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: dper na skad cig ma bzhin no zhe na /
translated: For example, like a moment.

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is unreasonable.

original: gang gi phyir skad cig ma nyid kyi rnam pa ni snang ba kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir skad cig ma nyid kyi rnam pa ni snang ba kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Because the aspect of momentariness is just the appearance, not something else.

original: sngon po'i skad cig ma nyid ni snang ba'i sngon po las rnam pa gzhan 'dzin pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sngon po'i skad cig ma nyid ni snang ba'i sngon po las rnam pa gzhan 'dzin pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The momentariness of blue is not the apprehension of an aspect different from the blue appearance.

original: 'on kyang 'khrul pa'i dbang gis rnam pa de skad cig ma nyid du ma nges pa 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'khrul pa'i dbang gis rnam pa de skad cig ma nyid du ma nges pa 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
translated: However, due to delusion, that aspect is merely not ascertained as momentary.

original: des na rjes su dpag pas nges pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag pas nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is ascertained by inference.

original: bde bar myong ba lan cig ma yin par nyams su myong bar nges pa'i rnam pa ni gang du mthong ba der de rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis snang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: bde bar myong ba lan cig ma yin par nyams su myong bar nges pa'i rnam pa ni gang du mthong ba der de rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis snang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The aspect of the definite experience of pleasure is seen in the appearance of that aspect in its own nature.

original: de'i phyir 'ga' zhig bde ba la sogs pa bzhin du snang ba'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'ga' zhig bde ba la sogs pa bzhin du snang ba'am /
translated: Therefore, some say that it appears like pleasure, etc.,

original: sha za la sogs pa bzhin du brtags pa'i sgo nas rnam pa nges pa gang yin pa de ni snang ba gzhan la de'i bdag nyid du khas blangs na snang bar khas blangs par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: sha za la sogs pa bzhin du brtags pa'i sgo nas rnam pa nges pa gang yin pa de ni snang ba gzhan la de'i bdag nyid du khas blangs na snang bar khas blangs par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: or that the ascertainment of the aspect is by imputation, like a flesh-eater, etc. If one accepts that it is the nature of another appearance, then one accepts an appearance.

original: de ma dmigs na snang ba mi dmigs pa yin no //üîΩskad cig ma nyid ni bde ba la sogs pa ltar tha dad par snang ba'am /
analyzed: de ma dmigs na snang ba mi dmigs pa yin no // skad cig ma nyid ni bde ba la sogs pa ltar tha dad par snang ba'am /
translated: If that is not observed, the appearance is not observed.üîΩMomentariness is not like pleasure, etc., appearing separately,

original: sha za la sogs pa bzhin du brtags pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sha za la sogs pa bzhin du brtags pa ma yin gyi /
translated: or like a flesh-eater, etc., imputed.

original: 'on kyang dngos po thams cad kyi nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin mi gnas pa nyid du skad cig mar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang dngos po thams cad kyi nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin mi gnas pa nyid du skad cig mar brjod pa yin no //
translated: However, the nature of all things is not to endure, and so they are said to be momentary.

original: de'i phyir de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid skad cig ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid skad cig ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, whatever is seen in that way is momentary.

original: skad cig ma zhes bya ba nges pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te mtha' dag skad cig ma nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma zhes bya ba nges pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te mtha' dag skad cig ma nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no certainty whatsoever that something is momentary, because everything is momentary.

original: des na kha cig na re gal te bde ba'i rang bzhin du snang ba med pas @154b sngon po bde ba ma yin na /
analyzed: des na kha cig na re gal te bde ba'i rang bzhin du snang ba med pas @154b sngon po bde ba ma yin na /
translated: In that case, if blue is not pleasure because the appearance of the nature of pleasure does not exist,üîΩthen the appearance of momentariness would not be momentary because of the certainty of non-momentariness.

original: de lta na ni 'o na skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid du nges pa'i phyir skad cig ma yin par snang ba ni skad cig ma ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes gang smras pa de yang gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid du nges pa'i phyir skad cig ma yin par snang ba ni skad cig ma ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes gang smras pa de yang gsal ba yin te /
translated: This is clear.

original: gang gi phyir sngon po skad cig ma ma yin par ni 'ga' zhig gis kyang nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngon po skad cig ma ma yin par ni 'ga' zhig gis kyang nges pa ma yin te /
translated: Because no one ascertains that blue is not momentary.

original: skad cig ma nyid ni rang bzhin nges pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid ni rang bzhin nges pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because momentariness is not ascertained by nature.

original: gal te bde ba la sogs pa bzhin du skad cig ma nyid la rnam par nges pa cung zad cig yod na ni blta bar bya ba de yongs su spangs par snang ba na skad cig ma ma yin par nges par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te bde ba la sogs pa bzhin du skad cig ma nyid la rnam par nges pa cung zad cig yod na ni blta bar bya ba de yongs su spangs par snang ba na skad cig ma ma yin par nges par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If momentariness were ascertained in some way, like pleasure, etc., then when the object is abandoned, it would be ascertained as not momentary.

original: skad cig ma nyid la ni rnam par nges pa 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid la ni rnam par nges pa 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But momentariness is not ascertained in any way.

original: des na sngon po de nyid snang ba na skad cig ma nyid yin nam 'on te ma yin zhes snang ba'i rang bzhin skad cig ma nyid dam skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid du the tshom za'o //
analyzed: des na sngon po de nyid snang ba na skad cig ma nyid yin nam 'on te ma yin zhes snang ba'i rang bzhin skad cig ma nyid dam skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid du the tshom za'o //
translated: Therefore, when that blue appears, there is doubt about its nature as momentary or non-momentary, wondering whether it is momentary or not.

original: 'khrul pa'i rgyu 'ga' las ni gnyi ga'i thun mong gi rang bzhin de nyid la skad cig ma ma yin par sgro 'dogs so //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i rgyu 'ga' las ni gnyi ga'i thun mong gi rang bzhin de nyid la skad cig ma ma yin par sgro 'dogs so //
translated: From some cause of error, there is superimposition of non-momentariness onto that nature common to both.

original: de'i phyir gang dag rnam par gnas pa de dag nyid gcig snang ba na rang bzhin gzhan gyis stong par nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang dag rnam par gnas pa de dag nyid gcig snang ba na rang bzhin gzhan gyis stong par nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, those that are established are definitely empty of other natures when one of them appears.

original: skad cig ma nyid la ni rnam pa 'ga' zhig gi yod pa ma yin pa des na de yongs su spangs pa dang ldan par snang bar nges ba ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid la ni rnam pa 'ga' zhig gi yod pa ma yin pa des na de yongs su spangs pa dang ldan par snang bar nges ba ma yin no //
translated: But in the case of momentariness, it is not the case that one of them exists and the other does not, so it is not certain that one is eliminated and the other appears.

original: sngon po'i snang ba ni shes pas bde ba'i rnam pa yongs su spangs par shes kyi /
analyzed: sngon po'i snang ba ni shes pas bde ba'i rnam pa yongs su spangs par shes kyi /
translated: The appearance of blue is known by consciousness to be the elimination of the aspect of pleasure.

original: bde ba'i rnam pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bde ba'i rnam pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But pleasure is not.

original: rang bzhin gang zhig shes pas rang bzhin gang spangs par nyams su myong ba de ni phan tshun spangs pas de las gzhan yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gang zhig shes pas rang bzhin gang spangs par nyams su myong ba de ni phan tshun spangs pas de las gzhan yin no //
translated: The nature that is experienced by consciousness as the elimination of another nature is different from it, because they are mutually exclusive.

original: des na gzung ba'i rnam pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhi las phyi rol du gyur pa las gzhan du nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i bde ba gang yin pa de ni sngon po nyid dang dbyibs dang bdag tu 'dzin pa las phyi rol du gyur pa'i gzung ba'iüîΩrnam pas stong pa yin no //
analyzed: des na gzung ba'i rnam pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhi las phyi rol du gyur pa las gzhan du nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i bde ba gang yin pa de ni sngon po nyid dang dbyibs dang bdag tu 'dzin pa las phyi rol du gyur pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pas stong pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the pleasure that is experienced as different from the basis of the conception of self, which is the aspect of the object, is empty of the aspect of the object that is different from blue, shape, and the conception of self.

original: de ltar na yang bde ba ni nang gi bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gnas dbyibs med pa der gyur pa'i sngon pos stong par nyams su myong ngo zhes bya bar nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na yang bde ba ni nang gi bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gnas dbyibs med pa der gyur pa'i sngon pos stong par nyams su myong ngo zhes bya bar nges pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is ascertained that pleasure is experienced as the absence of shape, which is the basis of the conception of inner self, and as empty of blue, which is the absence of shape.

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa las gzhan du nyams su myong ba'i bde ba ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa las gzhan du mi 'thad de /
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa las gzhan du nyams su myong ba'i bde ba ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa las gzhan du mi 'thad de /
translated: The pleasure that is experienced as different from the aspect of the object is not tenable as different from the aspect of the subject.

original: gzung ba'am yang na 'dzin par gsal ba las de ni gzung ba ma yin pa des na 'dzin pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba'am yang na 'dzin par gsal ba las de ni gzung ba ma yin pa des na 'dzin pa nyid yin no //
translated: Since it is not clear as the object or the subject, it is the subject.

original: des na 'di ltar bde ba'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni @155a * //
analyzed: des na 'di ltar bde ba'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni @155a * //
translated: Therefore, the aspect of pleasure is not the aspect of the object.

original: gzung ba de'i 'dzin par byed par nges pa yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba de'i 'dzin par byed par nges pa yin no //
translated: The cognition of the object is definitely the apprehender of that object.

original: de'i phyir gang dag 'gal ba'i rang bzhin gyi yul can gyi myong ba de dag ni rang bzhin gcig la brten pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang dag 'gal ba'i rang bzhin gyi yul can gyi myong ba de dag ni rang bzhin gcig la brten pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, those experiences that have objects of contradictory natures cannot be based on a single nature.

original: dper na bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi yul can bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi yul can bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the objects of pleasure and pain.

original: sngon po dang bde ba dag kyang phan tshun spangs nas dus gcig tu 'gal bar nyams su myong ba yin no //
analyzed: sngon po dang bde ba dag kyang phan tshun spangs nas dus gcig tu 'gal bar nyams su myong ba yin no //
translated: Blue and pleasure are also mutually exclusive and experienced at the same time.

original: gcig gi yul can gyi nyams su myong ba'i tha snyad ni 'gal ba'i chos 'du ba dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyi yul can tsam gyi rgyu can des khyab pa yin la /
analyzed: gcig gi yul can gyi nyams su myong ba'i tha snyad ni 'gal ba'i chos 'du ba dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyi yul can tsam gyi rgyu can des khyab pa yin la /
translated: The convention of experience of a single object is pervaded by the mere subject that has a nature free from the combination of contradictory properties.

original: 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i yul can ni khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i yul can ni khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: The subject that has contradictory properties is contradictory with the pervader.

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gzung ba'i rnam pa las tha dad par ni nyams su myong ba nyid kyi dbang gis grub pas tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gzung ba'i rnam pa las tha dad par ni nyams su myong ba nyid kyi dbang gis grub pas tha snyad bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: The aspect that apprehends pleasure, etc. is established as a convention because it is experienced as different from the aspect of the object.

original: gal te de gnyi ga dngos po yin pa de lta na ni du ma nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: gal te de gnyi ga dngos po yin pa de lta na ni du ma nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
translated: If both are entities, then plurality is established.

original: ci ste gcig dngos po ma yin pa de lta na ni gcig med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: ci ste gcig dngos po ma yin pa de lta na ni gcig med pa nyid yin no //
translated: But if one is not an entity, then one does not exist.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa de'i gzung ba'i rnam pa 'dzin pa bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rig pa rnam par shes par smra bas 'bras bur brjod pa gang yin pa de yang snang ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa de'i gzung ba'i rnam pa 'dzin pa bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rig pa rnam par shes par smra bas 'bras bur brjod pa gang yin pa de yang snang ba yin te /
translated: The aspect of the object that is apprehended by the aspect of the apprehender is the awareness of the nature of pleasure, etc. The Vijfiaptimatrins call this the result. But that is also an appearance.

original: des na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rig pa ni gsum pa yin no //
analyzed: des na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rig pa ni gsum pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the awareness of the aspect of the object, the aspect of the apprehender, and the nature of pleasure, etc. is the third.

original: ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan can ni snang ba gang yin pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin gyi rnam pa gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan can ni snang ba gang yin pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin gyi rnam pa gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: The reason for the reversal is the nature of whatever appears, but it is not another aspect,

original: skad cig ma bzhin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma bzhin no //
translated: like a moment.

original: yang gang zhig gang yongs su spangs nas rig par gyur pa de don dam par de las tha dad pa yin la /
analyzed: yang gang zhig gang yongs su spangs nas rig par gyur pa de don dam par de las tha dad pa yin la /
