analyzed: yul ni rang gi 'bras bu shes pa'i dus na yin no //
translated: The object is at the time of the result, the consciousness.

original: dus tha dad na yang myong ba tha dad par nges par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dus tha dad na yang myong ba tha dad par nges par 'gyur te /
translated: If they were different times, then the experience would definitely be different.

original: dus tha dad pa yang dngos po tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus tha dad pa yang dngos po tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because being different times is the reason for being different things.

original: slob dpon gyis shes pa dang shes bya dag gi myong ba dus tha dad pa dgag pa'i phyir gzhi 'dings  par mdzad pa ni /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis shes pa dang shes bya dag gi myong ba dus tha dad pa dgag pa'i phyir gzhi 'dings  par mdzad pa ni /
translated: The Master has made a basis for refuting the difference in time of the experience of consciousness and the object of consciousness.

original: dmigs pa mngon sum ma yin pa gang yin pa de'i don mthong ba lta ba'i mthong ba nyid rab tu grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa mngon sum ma yin pa gang yin pa de'i don mthong ba lta ba'i mthong ba nyid rab tu grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the object is not directly perceived, then the seeing of the object by seeing is not established.

original: 'di snyam du dmigs pa mngon sum yin nam ma yin yang bla ste /
analyzed: 'di snyam du dmigs pa mngon sum yin nam ma yin yang bla ste /
translated: It is irrelevant whether or not the object is directly perceived.

original: des yul yod pa mngon sum du byas pa des na /
analyzed: des yul yod pa mngon sum du byas pa des na /
translated: Because the object is directly perceived by it,

original: don mthong rab tu 'grub mi 'gyur//
analyzed: don mthong rab tu 'grub mi 'gyur//
translated: the seeing of the object is not established.

original: zhes ci'i phyir brjod ce na ni zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: zhes ci'i phyir brjod ce na ni zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúwhy is this?‚Äù is the reason.

original: yul yod pas ni yul dmigs pa rnam par gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yul yod pas ni yul dmigs pa rnam par gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the object is not directly perceived, the object of the object is not directly perceived.üîΩIf that is so, then how is it?

original: 'o na ji ltar zhe na smras pa /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar zhe na smras pa /
translated: It is said:

original: yul de'i dmigs pa de yod pas so //
analyzed: yul de'i dmigs pa de yod pas so //
translated: Because the object of that object exists.

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin te shes pas yul du byas pa'i don bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni myong ba ma yin gyi ;
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin te shes pas yul du byas pa'i don bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni myong ba ma yin gyi ;
translated: The idea is this: the object that is made into an object by consciousness is not the nature of the self, nor is it an experience.

original: 'on kyang shes pa nyid yin na de yang ma grub po //
analyzed: 'on kyang shes pa nyid yin na de yang ma grub po //
translated: But if it is consciousness itself, that is not established.

original: 'di snyam du shes pas don nyams su myong ba des na shes pa nyams su myong ci dgos snyam na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du shes pas don nyams su myong ba des na shes pa nyams su myong ci dgos snyam na /
translated: If you think that since consciousness experiences the object, what need is there to experience consciousness?

original: gal te don nyams su myong ba shes pa nyams su myong ba las gzhan yin na ni de ltar 'gyur na gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te don nyams su myong ba shes pa nyams su myong ba las gzhan yin na ni de ltar 'gyur na gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: If the experience of the object were different from the experience of consciousness, that would be so, but it is not different.

original: 'di ltar bdag nyid gsal zhing nyams su myong ba na shes pa don rig bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag nyid gsal zhing nyams su myong ba na shes pa don rig bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: Thus, when it is clear and experienced by itself, consciousness is aware of the object.

original: gsal ba ma rig na ni gsal ba'i khyad par can gyi gsal bar bya ba'i don rig par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gsal ba ma rig na ni gsal ba'i khyad par can gyi gsal bar bya ba'i don rig par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the clear [consciousness] is not aware, then the object to be made clear, which has the attribute of clarity, is not aware.

original: dbyig pa ma rtogs par dbyig pa can du mi rtogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dbyig pa ma rtogs par dbyig pa can du mi rtogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as without understanding the stick, one does not understand the stick-holder.

original: de na don bzhin du don rig pa nyams su myong ba ni yod do //
analyzed: de na don bzhin du don rig pa nyams su myong ba ni yod do //
translated: Therefore, like the object, the experience of the awareness of the object exists.

original: don gyi rang bzhin nyid ni gsal ba ma yin gyi @161b 'on kyang shes pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: don gyi rang bzhin nyid ni gsal ba ma yin gyi @161b 'on kyang shes pa kho na yin no //
translated: The nature of the object is not manifest, but rather it is consciousness.

original: de'i phyir bdag nyid don gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid du mthong na ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag nyid don gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid du mthong na ni /
translated: Therefore, when one sees the object as having the nature of manifesting itself,

original: shes pas don nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: shes pas don nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: then consciousness experiences the object.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: des na shes pa nyams su myong ba nyid don myong ba yin pa de'i phyir te /
analyzed: des na shes pa nyams su myong ba nyid don myong ba yin pa de'i phyir te /
translated: Thus, the experience of consciousness itself is the experience of the object.

original: de shes pa yod par ma grub par gzung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de shes pa yod par ma grub par gzung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the object is not established as something apprehended that is not consciousness.

original: shes pa med par don gyi rang bzhin 'ba' zhig nyams su myong bar nges na ni yul yongs su rdzogs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa med par don gyi rang bzhin 'ba' zhig nyams su myong bar nges na ni yul yongs su rdzogs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: If it were certain that one experiences the nature of the object alone, without consciousness, then the object would not be complete.

original: 'di ltar rang gi ngo bo bdag nyid so so la khyad par med pa'i phyir bdag gis rig go zhes khyad par gyi tha snyad med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar rang gi ngo bo bdag nyid so so la khyad par med pa'i phyir bdag gis rig go zhes khyad par gyi tha snyad med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, since there is no difference in the individual natures of the object, it would follow, absurdly, that one could not make the distinction, I am aware of it.

original: gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de nyid nyams su myong ba las tha snyad du bya ba zhes bya ba yin na ni /
analyzed: gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de nyid nyams su myong ba las tha snyad du bya ba zhes bya ba yin na ni /
translated: If that which is experienced is called ‚Äúexperience,‚Äù

original: don gyi rang bzhin 'ba' zhig nyams su myong la /
analyzed: don gyi rang bzhin 'ba' zhig nyams su myong la /
translated: then only the nature of the object is experienced.

original: de yang khyad par med pa yin pa'i phyir khyad par gyi tha snyad gang las 'gyur /
analyzed: de yang khyad par med pa yin pa'i phyir khyad par gyi tha snyad gang las 'gyur /
translated: And since that is undifferentiated, how could there be a conventional expression of a difference?

original: don nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i tha snyad thams cad ni myong ba bo'i khyad par nges pa la brten pa yin te /
analyzed: don nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i tha snyad thams cad ni myong ba bo'i khyad par nges pa la brten pa yin te /
translated: All conventional expressions of the experience of an object are based on the ascertainment of the difference of the experience.

original: de'i phyir gang zhig rgyur gyur bas don rig pa'i tha snyad 'di khyad par la brten par gsal bar 'gyur ba rig pa de yang nyams su myong ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zhig rgyur gyur bas don rig pa'i tha snyad 'di khyad par la brten par gsal bar 'gyur ba rig pa de yang nyams su myong ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, that cognition which is the cause of the conventional expression ‚ÄúI know the object‚Äù is clearly based on a difference, and that cognition is also experienced.

original: bya ba'i khyad par 'ga' zhig rig pa byed pa po la mi brten par 'gyur ba myong ba'i tha snyad gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bya ba'i khyad par 'ga' zhig rig pa byed pa po la mi brten par 'gyur ba myong ba'i tha snyad gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no other conventional expression of experience that is not based on the difference of the cognition that is the agent of the action.

original: dmigs pa yod pa de yang tshad ma dang mi ldan pa mngon sum gyi rig pa ma yin pas mngon sum gyi yul ma yin pa'i shes pa yod pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi tha snyad gang dag yin pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa yod pa de yang tshad ma dang mi ldan pa mngon sum gyi rig pa ma yin pas mngon sum gyi yul ma yin pa'i shes pa yod pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi tha snyad gang dag yin pa ste /
translated: The object that exists is not the object of direct perception because it is not a valid cognition and it is not a direct cognition.

original: yul yod pa'i tha snyad 'di rig go zhes rig pa'i tha snyad dam /
analyzed: yul yod pa'i tha snyad 'di rig go zhes rig pa'i tha snyad dam /
translated: The convention ‚ÄúI know‚Äù is the convention of the knower, or the convention of the knower in which the self is the agent.

original: bdag gis rig go zhes bdag nyid byed pa por gyur pa'i rig pa'i tha snyad do //
analyzed: bdag gis rig go zhes bdag nyid byed pa por gyur pa'i rig pa'i tha snyad do //
translated: The convention ‚ÄúI know‚Äù is the convention of the knower in which the self is the agent.

original: mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi shes pa yod pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi tha snyad 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi shes pa yod pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi tha snyad 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The convention that has as its reason the existence of a cognition that has the nature of nonapprehension would not be engaged.

original: ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be reversed.

original: shes pa yod pa ni mi dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: shes pa yod pa ni mi dmigs pa yin la /
translated: The existence of cognition is nonapprehension.

original: de las kyang de'i dmigs pa ma grub na sngar bshad pa'i tha snyad can gyi yul yang yod pa'i tha snyad du rung ba nyid rab tu mi 'grub pa'i phyir shes pa dang shes bya thams cad kyi rang bzhin nub pa ste /
analyzed: de las kyang de'i dmigs pa ma grub na sngar bshad pa'i tha snyad can gyi yul yang yod pa'i tha snyad du rung ba nyid rab tu mi 'grub pa'i phyir shes pa dang shes bya thams cad kyi rang bzhin nub pa ste /
translated: Moreover, if its object is not established from that, then the object that has the convention explained earlier would not be established as suitable to be the convention of existence. Therefore the nature of all cognition and objects of cognition would disappear.

original: yod pa'i tha snyad las 'das par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ha cang thal ba'o //
analyzed: yod pa'i tha snyad las 'das par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ha cang thal ba'o //
translated: The consequence of this is that it would be beyond the conventional existence of consciousness.

original: 'di snyam du gal te shes pa mi dmigs pa de lta na yang don gyi yul can gyis dmigs pa'i tha snyad du byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gal te shes pa mi dmigs pa de lta na yang don gyi yul can gyis dmigs pa'i tha snyad du byed pa yin te /
translated: If you think that even though the consciousness is not observed, the object is the domain of the object-possessor, and so the conventional existence of the object is established,

original: dper na mig ma dmigs kyang gzugs 'dzin pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: dper na mig ma dmigs kyang gzugs 'dzin pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: just as, even though the eye is not observed, form is apprehended,

original: yod kyang zhes smos te /
analyzed: yod kyang zhes smos te /
translated: we reply that even if it exists,üîΩit is not established.

original: mdog tu zin kyang ma grub ste /üîΩma dmigs pa la dmigs bar yod pa @162a * //
analyzed: mdog tu zin kyang ma grub ste / ma dmigs pa la dmigs bar yod pa @162a * //
translated: Even if it exists, it is not established, because it is not observed.

original: de'i tha snyad de la mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tha snyad de la mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The conventional existence of the object is not tenable in the nonobservation of consciousness.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /üîΩgzugs la ni nyams su myong bas mig gi khyad par can gyi tha snyad bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te / gzugs la ni nyams su myong bas mig gi khyad par can gyi tha snyad bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: This is what is being said:üîΩThe conventional existence of the eye is not established by the experience of form.

original: 'on kyang mig gis dben par yul nyams su myong ba las rig pa'i khyad par can nyid kyi tha snyad bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang mig gis dben par yul nyams su myong ba las rig pa'i khyad par can nyid kyi tha snyad bya ba yin no //
translated: However, the conventional existence of consciousness is established by the experience of the object that is devoid of the eye.

original: rig pa ma dmigs na de'i khyad par can gyi don yang yin pas ji ltar rig pa'i tha snyad byed /
analyzed: rig pa ma dmigs na de'i khyad par can gyi don yang yin pas ji ltar rig pa'i tha snyad byed /
translated: If cognition is not observed, then the object that possesses that quality is also not observed. So how could the convention of ‚Äúcognition‚Äù be used?

original: tshig le'ur byas pa'i don mjug sdud pa ni de'i phyir rig pa 'ga' yang ma dmigs na de ma dmigs pa'i rtogs pa po 'ga' yang rig par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa'i don mjug sdud pa ni de'i phyir rig pa 'ga' yang ma dmigs na de ma dmigs pa'i rtogs pa po 'ga' yang rig par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of the verses is summarized: Therefore, if no cognition is observed, then no cognizer who does not observe it is a cognizer.

original: shes pa'i khyad par dang bral ba'i rig pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa'i khyad par dang bral ba'i rig pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a cognition that is devoid of the features of consciousness is untenable.üîΩIf it is thought, ‚ÄúEven though there is no reflexive awareness, is not consciousness that is observed by another object directly perceptible, like an object?‚Äù

original: rang rig pa ma yin yang dmigs pa gzhan gyis dmigs pa'i shes pa yul bzhin du mngon sum nyid ma yin nam zhes dogs pa la rtogs pa 'di la pha rol po'i don ji lta bur 'gyur ba de bstan pa'i don du bshad pa /
analyzed: rang rig pa ma yin yang dmigs pa gzhan gyis dmigs pa'i shes pa yul bzhin du mngon sum nyid ma yin nam zhes dogs pa la rtogs pa 'di la pha rol po'i don ji lta bur 'gyur ba de bstan pa'i don du bshad pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate what the opponent‚Äôs position is, the following is stated:

original: yul de rang gi yul can gyi shes pa'i dus su ni grub pa'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pa ma grub pa ste /
analyzed: yul de rang gi yul can gyi shes pa'i dus su ni grub pa'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pa ma grub pa ste /
translated: The object is not established as a reason for the existence of the consciousness that is its subject.

original: ma grub pa'i phyir ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i phyir ma grub pa'o //
translated: Because it is not established, it is not established.

original: gang gi phyir don grub pa ni grub pa'i khyad par can du brjod pa yin na de ma grub pa'i phyir sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis de'i khyad par can de yang mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don grub pa ni grub pa'i khyad par can du brjod pa yin na de ma grub pa'i phyir sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis de'i khyad par can de yang mi 'grub bo //
translated: Because the establishment of the object is said to be the special feature of establishment, and since that is not established, that special feature is not established, as was explained earlier.

original: gzhan te rang la dmigs pa'i shes pa'i dus su ni grub pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan te rang la dmigs pa'i shes pa'i dus su ni grub pa yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means that it is established at the time of the perception of itself.

original: de'i tshe rang gi shes pa grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gzhan gyi don 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe rang gi shes pa grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gzhan gyi don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is that at that time, the perception of itself is established.

original: don 'di la ji lta bur gnas pa de ston pa na pha rol po la bzhad gang du byed pa ni dmigs par gyur kyang dmigs pa yod pa'i dus de'i tshe ni ma grub la /
analyzed: don 'di la ji lta bur gnas pa de ston pa na pha rol po la bzhad gang du byed pa ni dmigs par gyur kyang dmigs pa yod pa'i dus de'i tshe ni ma grub la /
translated: When this meaning is presented, the opponent is ridiculed. The connection is that although the object exists at the time of the perception of the object, it is not established.

original: gzhan gyi tshe dmigs pa med pa'i dus su ni grub po zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe dmigs pa med pa'i dus su ni grub po zhes 'brel to //
translated: At another time, when there is no perception of the object, it is established.

original: phyin ci log tu shes pa med pa'i dus su grub po zhes legs par tha snyad byas so //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu shes pa med pa'i dus su grub po zhes legs par tha snyad byas so //
translated: ‚ÄúWhen there is no perception of the object‚Äù is a good way of putting it.

original: ma 'brel pa'i don brjod ces dpyad pa'o //
analyzed: ma 'brel pa'i don brjod ces dpyad pa'o //
translated: The meaning is not connected.

original: shes pa yod pa'i dus shes pa yod pa na ni don ma shes la /
analyzed: shes pa yod pa'i dus shes pa yod pa na ni don ma shes la /
translated: When consciousness exists, i.e., when consciousness is present, the object is not cognized.

original: shes pa med pa'i dus de log pa na ni shes so zhes bzhad gad kyi tshig go //
analyzed: shes pa med pa'i dus de log pa na ni shes so zhes bzhad gad kyi tshig go //
translated: When consciousness does not exist, i.e., when it has ceased, the object is cognized.

original: gzhan yang yul dmigs pa'i rig pa yang dmigs pa tha dad pa gzhan gyi dmigs par rtog na ni /üîΩyul gyi shes pa ma grub par yul grub par tha snyad byar mi 'dod pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang yul dmigs pa'i rig pa yang dmigs pa tha dad pa gzhan gyi dmigs par rtog na ni / yul gyi shes pa ma grub par yul grub par tha snyad byar mi 'dod pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Moreover, if you imagine that the cognition of the object is the cognition of another object,üîΩnot only do you not accept the convention that the object is established when the cognition of the object is not established,

original: yul dmigs pa'i dmigs pa de yang rang nyid ma grub pa rig pa grub pa'i tha snyad du byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yul dmigs pa'i dmigs pa de yang rang nyid ma grub pa rig pa grub pa'i tha snyad du byed pa ma yin no //
translated: but you also do not accept the convention that the object is established when the cognition of the object is established.

original: de'i phyir shes pa'i shes pa yang gzhan gyis khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa'i shes pa yang gzhan gyis khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the cognition of cognition should also be understood by another.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù is the reason.

original: re zhig zhes bya ba ni dang por te /
analyzed: re zhig zhes bya ba ni dang por te /
translated: ‚ÄúFirst‚Äù means initially.

original: 'di ni rim pa brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni rim pa brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the sequence is being stated.

original: @162b dmigs pa mthar thug pa ste yongs su gtugs pa la sdod pa'i skyes bu 'dis don cung zad kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @162b dmigs pa mthar thug pa ste yongs su gtugs pa la sdod pa'i skyes bu 'dis don cung zad kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This person who abides in the ultimate, the final object, would not observe even the slightest object.

original: 'di skad du ji srid dmigs pa mthar ma phyin pa de srid du dmigs pa phyi ma phyi ma la sdod pas na rang gi dmigs pa ma grub pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di skad du ji srid dmigs pa mthar ma phyin pa de srid du dmigs pa phyi ma phyi ma la sdod pas na rang gi dmigs pa ma grub pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
translated: This is what is being said: as long as the object is not completed, it abides in the subsequent object, and because the cause of the nonestablishment of its object is not established,

original: yul snga ma snga ma mi 'grub po zhes brjod ba yin no //
analyzed: yul snga ma snga ma mi 'grub po zhes brjod ba yin no //
translated: the prior object is not established.

original: 'di snyam du shes pa phyi ma ma skyes na ni shes pa snga ma mi 'grub na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du shes pa phyi ma ma skyes na ni shes pa snga ma mi 'grub na /
translated: If you think that if the subsequent cognition does not arise, the prior cognition is not established,

original: snga mas bskyed pa des na snga ma dang phyi ma'i yul grub pa nyid pas ci'i phyir don 'gal yang rtogs par mi 'gyur zhes brjod ces dogs pa la /
analyzed: snga mas bskyed pa des na snga ma dang phyi ma'i yul grub pa nyid pas ci'i phyir don 'gal yang rtogs par mi 'gyur zhes brjod ces dogs pa la /
translated: and if it is generated by the prior one, then because the objects of the prior and subsequent ones are established, why would the object not be understood even though it is contradictory?

original: bshad pa / shes pa gcig ma grub na yang thams cad mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / shes pa gcig ma grub na yang thams cad mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In response to this qualm, it is said: Because if one cognition is not established, all are not established.

original: gal te shes pa snga ma yod pas don 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na ni shes pa'i shes pa cung zad kyang mi rtog pa zhig na /
analyzed: gal te shes pa snga ma yod pas don 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na ni shes pa'i shes pa cung zad kyang mi rtog pa zhig na /
translated: If an object is perceived because a prior cognition exists, then a cognition of cognition would not be conceived in the least.

original: gang gi phyir shes pa ma grub par don mi 'grub pa de'i phyir shes pa'i shes pa tshol ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa ma grub par don mi 'grub pa de'i phyir shes pa'i shes pa tshol ba yin no //
translated: But since an object is not established without the establishment of a cognition, therefore a cognition of cognition is sought.

original: des na gcig ma grub na thams cad mi 'grub pas 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod do //
analyzed: des na gcig ma grub na thams cad mi 'grub pas 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod do //
translated: Thus, if one is not established, all are not established, and therefore nothing is cognized.

original: 'di snyam du gang gi tshe dmigs pas mthar thug pa de'i tshe thams cad dmigs so zhe na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gang gi tshe dmigs pas mthar thug pa de'i tshe thams cad dmigs so zhe na /
translated: If you think that when an object is perceived, then at that time all are perceived,

original: de skye ba la yang mthar thug pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de skye ba la yang mthar thug pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: then it is said that even in the arising of that, there is a final limit.

original: thams cad rang la dmigs pa'i shes pa skyed par rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad rang la dmigs pa'i shes pa skyed par rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all are suitable to generate a cognition that perceives itself.

original: gal te shes pa gcig rang gi yul can gyi shes pa gzhan skyed mi nus na ni thams cad mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te shes pa gcig rang gi yul can gyi shes pa gzhan skyed mi nus na ni thams cad mi 'gyur te /
translated: If one cognition is not able to generate another cognition that has it as its object, then all would not be so,

original: rang rig pa med pas thams cad la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang rig pa med pas thams cad la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there would be no difference between all, since there is no reflexive awareness.

original: gal te 'ga' zhig rang rig pa yin na ni //
analyzed: gal te 'ga' zhig rang rig pa yin na ni //
translated: If it were to be self-awareness,

original: mthar thug par yang 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: mthar thug par yang 'gyur gyi //
translated: it would be final,

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: but not otherwise.

original: mthar pa med na yang 'gro ba long ba dang lkugs par 'gyur ro zhes nyams su myong ba dang 'gal bar thal lo //
analyzed: mthar pa med na yang 'gro ba long ba dang lkugs par 'gyur ro zhes nyams su myong ba dang 'gal bar thal lo //
translated: If there were no final [awareness], then the world would be blind and mute. Thus, it would follow that it contradicts experience.

original: 'ga' zhig tu dmigs pa mthar thug par khas len na ni mthar thug pa'i dmigs pa de rang gi bdag nyid ces bya ba gzhan med par bdag dang yul gyi rnam pa dmigs par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu dmigs pa mthar thug par khas len na ni mthar thug pa'i dmigs pa de rang gi bdag nyid ces bya ba gzhan med par bdag dang yul gyi rnam pa dmigs par 'gyur zhing /
translated: If one accepts a final object of observation, then that final object of observation would be observed as the aspect of the self and the object, without what is called ‚Äúanother.‚Äù

original: gzhan te dmigs pa snga ma yang rang dang gzhan gyi rig pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan te dmigs pa snga ma yang rang dang gzhan gyi rig pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro //
translated: And the other, the previous object of observation, would be of the nature of the awareness of self and other.

original: gang gi phyir bye brag gi rgyu med par ni gcig de nyid dang gzhan rang rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba nyid du rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bye brag gi rgyu med par ni gcig de nyid dang gzhan rang rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba nyid du rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Because without a cause of distinction, it is not reasonable that one is just that and the other is devoid of the nature of self-awareness.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs grub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs grub po //
translated: Therefore, the reason is established.

original: gang gi phyir tha dad pa ni rim pa'i rgyu mtshan du bzhag go //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha dad pa ni rim pa'i rgyu mtshan du bzhag go //
translated: Because difference is posited as the reason for sequence.

original: gcig nyid kyis gnyis dmigs pa na ni gcig gi bya ba la rim pa mi 'thad de /
analyzed: gcig nyid kyis gnyis dmigs pa na ni gcig gi bya ba la rim pa mi 'thad de /
translated: If one thing is observed in two things, then the activity of one is not tenable in sequence.

original: gcig po de skad cig ma yin na gnyis pa'i byed pa'i dus su mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig po de skad cig ma yin na gnyis pa'i byed pa'i dus su mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If that one thing is momentary, it does not endure at the time of the activity of the second.

original: skad cig ma ma yin pa @163a * //
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin pa @163a * //
translated: If it is not momentary,

original: nyid na yang de la khyad par med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: nyid na yang de la khyad par med pa'i phyir te /
translated: then there is no difference in it.

original: bogs dbyung du med pa'i phyir rang gi rang bzhin dang 'brel pa'i bya ba thams cad cig car 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bogs dbyung du med pa'i phyir rang gi rang bzhin dang 'brel pa'i bya ba thams cad cig car 'gyur ro //
translated: Because there is no improvement, all activities connected with its own nature would occur simultaneously.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs 'grub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs 'grub po //
translated: Therefore, the reason is established.

original: gang zhig gang dang lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa de ni de las tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang dang lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa de ni de las tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is ascertained as observed together with something is not different from it,

original: dper na zla ba gcig las gnyis pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na zla ba gcig las gnyis pa bzhin no //
translated: like a second moon.

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pa yang shes pa dang lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pa yang shes pa dang lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa yin no //
translated: The apprehended aspects of blue, etc. are ascertained as observed together with consciousness.

original: tha dad pa ni lhan cig dmigs pa ma nges pas khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa ni lhan cig dmigs pa ma nges pas khyab pa yin te /
translated: Difference is pervaded by non-ascertainment of simultaneous observation,

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no connection.

original: de dang 'gal ba ni lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa yin te /
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba ni lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa yin te /
translated: The ascertainment of simultaneous observation that is contradictory with that is the ascertainment of simultaneous observation that is contradictory with that.

original: des na khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pas tha dad pa bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: des na khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pas tha dad pa bkag pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the observation of a contradictory pervasion refutes difference.

original: yang gi sgra ni gtan tshigs gzhan gsal ba ston pa ni rig pa zhes bya ba yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni gtan tshigs gzhan gsal ba ston pa ni rig pa zhes bya ba yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates that the other reason is also taught: ‚ÄúThe manifestation of awareness.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rig pa'i sgra 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rig pa'i sgra 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúof‚Äù is the subject of the word ‚Äúawareness.‚Äù

original: rig pa zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di'i don ni de ltar gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rig pa zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di'i don ni de ltar gsal ba'o //
translated: The meaning of this word ‚Äúawareness‚Äù is manifested in that way.

original: rig pa ni de ltar te rig pa'i rang bzhin du gsal bar rab tu snang ba yin gyi gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: rig pa ni de ltar te rig pa'i rang bzhin du gsal bar rab tu snang ba yin gyi gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Awareness is like that. The nature of awareness is manifested as clear, not otherwise.

original: yang ji ltar na rig pa rig pa'i rang bzhin du gsal ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na rig pa rig pa'i rang bzhin du gsal ba yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, how is awareness manifested as the nature of awareness?

original: de zhes smos te /üîΩrig pa de ni de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de zhes smos te / rig pa de ni de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù is mentioned.

original: gsal ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That awareness is of that nature because it is the nature of manifestation.

original: 'di skad du gang gi phyir rig ba ni gsal ba'i bdag nyid can yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di skad du gang gi phyir rig ba ni gsal ba'i bdag nyid can yin gyi /
translated: This is stated: ‚ÄúBecause awareness is the nature of manifestation.‚Äù

original: gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir rig pa ni rig pa'i bdag nyid du gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa de'i phyir rig pa ni rig pa'i bdag nyid du gsal ba yin no //
translated: Because it is not different, therefore awareness is clear in the nature of awareness.

original: rig pa gsal ba'i bdag nyid yin du chug mod /
analyzed: rig pa gsal ba'i bdag nyid yin du chug mod /
translated: Even if it is accepted that awareness is clear by nature,üîΩit is clear only in the nature of the experience of awareness, not in any other way.

original: rig pa myong ba'i bdag nyid kho nar gsal gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de dag nyid ga las she na /
analyzed: rig pa myong ba'i bdag nyid kho nar gsal gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de dag nyid ga las she na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de gzhan 'ga' zhig ni ma yin te zhes smos so //
analyzed: de gzhan 'ga' zhig ni ma yin te zhes smos so //
translated: It is not any other.

original: gang gi phyir gsal ba'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba'i rig pa de gzhan 'ga' zhig gi ngo bo ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gsal ba'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba'i rig pa de gzhan 'ga' zhig gi ngo bo ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Because the so-called clear nature of awareness is not the nature of anything else.

original: 'on kyang shes pa nyid yin pa des na rig pa ni myong ba'i bdag nyid kho nar gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang shes pa nyid yin pa des na rig pa ni myong ba'i bdag nyid kho nar gsal ba yin no //
translated: Rather, it is consciousness itself. Therefore awareness is clear only in the nature of experience.

original: gal te gsal ba zhes bya ba gsal bar byed pa las gzhan du gyur pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin yin na ni gsal ba gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid du gsal bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te gsal ba zhes bya ba gsal bar byed pa las gzhan du gyur pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin yin na ni gsal ba gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid du gsal bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the so-called clarity were the nature of an entity that is different from the act of illumination, then clarity would not be clear in the nature of the act of illumination.

original: dper na sgron ma dang lhan cig shes pa gcig gi yul du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i gsal ba'i gsal bar byed pa sgron ma las gzhan gyi ngo bo yin pa des na /
analyzed: dper na sgron ma dang lhan cig shes pa gcig gi yul du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i gsal ba'i gsal bar byed pa sgron ma las gzhan gyi ngo bo yin pa des na /
translated: For example, the clarity of a lamp is the nature of something other than the lamp, which is said to be the object of a single cognition that occurs simultaneously with the lamp.

original: bum pa'i gsal ba sgron ma'i bdag nyid du gsal ba yin gyi /
analyzed: bum pa'i gsal ba sgron ma'i bdag nyid du gsal ba yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the clarity of a pot is the clarity that has the nature of a lamp.

original: 'on kyang sgron ma las gzhan gyi rang bzhin yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang sgron ma las gzhan gyi rang bzhin yin pa bzhin no //
translated: However, it is not the nature of the lamp itself.

original: shes pas don gsal @163b bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni shes pa las gzhan gyi rang bzhin ma yin gyi /
analyzed: shes pas don gsal @163b bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni shes pa las gzhan gyi rang bzhin ma yin gyi /
translated: Whatever object is clarified by consciousness is not the nature of something other than consciousness.

original: 'on kyang shes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang shes pa kho na'o //
translated: However, it is consciousness itself.

original: bdag rig pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni dper na bdag nyid gsal ba ni gsal bar byed pa las rang bzhin gzhan ma yin pa des na /
analyzed: bdag rig pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni dper na bdag nyid gsal ba ni gsal bar byed pa las rang bzhin gzhan ma yin pa des na /
translated: It is like self-awareness. For example, the clarity of itself is not a nature that is different from the clarity that is produced.üîΩTherefore, the clarity of itself is clarity that has the nature of the clarity that is produced.

original: bdag nyid gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin kho nar gsal ba de bzhin du rig par bya ba'i gsal ba gang yin pa de yang rig par byed pa las /üîΩrang bzhin gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag nyid gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin kho nar gsal ba de bzhin du rig par bya ba'i gsal ba gang yin pa de yang rig par byed pa las /üîΩrang bzhin gzhan ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, whatever object is clarified by consciousness is not a nature that is different from the consciousness that is the clarifier.

original: des na rig par bya ba'i rig pa ni rig par byed pa'i rang bzhin kho nar gsal lo zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: des na rig par bya ba'i rig pa ni rig par byed pa'i rang bzhin kho nar gsal lo zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: Therefore, the awareness that is the object of awareness is clearly only the nature of the awareness that is the subject of awareness.

original: gang gi phyir rig pa ni rig pa'i rang bzhin kho nar gsal ba de'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rig pa ni rig pa'i rang bzhin kho nar gsal ba de'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: And because awareness is only clearly the nature of awareness, therefore,

original: lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa 'ba' zhig las ma yin gyi /
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa 'ba' zhig las ma yin gyi /
translated: it is not only from the certainty of simultaneous observationüîΩthat the awareness that is the object of awareness is not tenable as a different object.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir yang myong ba'i bdag nyid du gsal bka'i zhes bya ba'i rig pa ni don gzhan du mi 'thad do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir yang myong ba'i bdag nyid du gsal bka'i zhes bya ba'i rig pa ni don gzhan du mi 'thad do //
translated: Because of that reason, the awareness that is clearly the nature of experience is not tenable as a different object.

original: rig par bya ba rig pa'i rang bzhin du gsal ba gang yin pa de ni gsal ba rig pa'i rang bzhin las rang bzhin gzhan ma yin pa kho na yin la /
analyzed: rig par bya ba rig pa'i rang bzhin du gsal ba gang yin pa de ni gsal ba rig pa'i rang bzhin las rang bzhin gzhan ma yin pa kho na yin la /
translated: That which is clearly the nature of awareness as the object of awareness is only not a different nature from the nature of the clear awareness.

original: gsal ba ni shes pa'i rang bzhin du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba ni shes pa'i rang bzhin du brjod pa yin no //
translated: And the clear is said to be the nature of consciousness.

original: gzhan gyis ni de gzhan 'ga' zhig ni ma yin te zhes bya ba dang / de'i don gzhan du rig pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i ngag 'di gnyis kyi don tha dad par bstan par mi nus so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni de gzhan 'ga' zhig ni ma yin te zhes bya ba dang / de'i don gzhan du rig pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i ngag 'di gnyis kyi don tha dad par bstan par mi nus so //
translated: The other is not that other, and the meaning of that is not known otherwise. The meaning of these two statements cannot be shown to be different.

original: bdag nyid rig pa bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di'i bar gyi gzhung sngar gyi tshig le'ur byas pa nyid kyi lhag mar byas nas 'di'i don 'di ltar 'chad do //
analyzed: bdag nyid rig pa bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di'i bar gyi gzhung sngar gyi tshig le'ur byas pa nyid kyi lhag mar byas nas 'di'i don 'di ltar 'chad do //
translated: Up to ‚Äúlike the awareness of itself,‚Äù this text is taken as a supplement to the earlier verses. Its meaning is explained as follows.

original: gal te lhan cig dmigs pa'i nges pa'i phyir tha dad pa med na ji ltar sngon po'i rig pa zhes tha dad pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur zhes dogs pa bsu nas rig pa zhes bya ba yang zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'god de /
analyzed: gal te lhan cig dmigs pa'i nges pa'i phyir tha dad pa med na ji ltar sngon po'i rig pa zhes tha dad pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur zhes dogs pa bsu nas rig pa zhes bya ba yang zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'god de /
translated: If, because of the certainty of simultaneous observation, there is no difference, how could there be the expression ‚Äúawareness of blue‚Äù as a difference? Anticipating this doubt, the text presents the passage beginning ‚ÄúAwareness, too.‚Äù

original: myong ba'i bdag nyid du gsal ba ni sngon po'i rig pa yin gyi /
analyzed: myong ba'i bdag nyid du gsal ba ni sngon po'i rig pa yin gyi /
translated: The clarity in the nature of experience is the awareness of blue.

original: tha dad pa mthong ba ni ma yin no zhes so //
analyzed: tha dad pa mthong ba ni ma yin no zhes so //
translated: But it is not seeing a difference.

original: don 'di ni sngon po la sogs pa nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba yang de'i rang bzhin nyams su myong ba'o zhes bya ba 'di'i nang du brjod zin pas zlos bu 'dis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: don 'di ni sngon po la sogs pa nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba yang de'i rang bzhin nyams su myong ba'o zhes bya ba 'di'i nang du brjod zin pas zlos bu 'dis ci zhig bya /
translated: This point has already been expressed in the statement, ‚ÄúThe so-called experience of blue and so on is the experience of its nature,‚Äù so what is the point of this repetition?

original: gzhan yang de'i phyir yang zhes bya ba 'dis bshad ma thag pa'i don gzung ba yin na /
analyzed: gzhan yang de'i phyir yang zhes bya ba 'dis bshad ma thag pa'i don gzung ba yin na /
translated: Moreover, if this phrase ‚Äúfor that reason‚Äù refers to the point just explained,

original: bshad ma thag pa'i don de yang phyi'i don bzlog nas gnas pa yin pas de ji ltar de'i phyir yang de'i don gzhan du rig pa ma yin zhes de nyid kyi phyir don sel bar 'gyur /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i don de yang phyi'i don bzlog nas gnas pa yin pas de ji ltar de'i phyir yang de'i don gzhan du rig pa ma yin zhes de nyid kyi phyir don sel bar 'gyur /
translated: then since the point just explained is that external objects are refuted and do not exist, how could it not be known that the meaning of ‚Äúfor that reason‚Äù is different?

original: ngag 'di gnyis ni don tha dad par bstan pa nyid de /
analyzed: ngag 'di gnyis ni don tha dad par bstan pa nyid de /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the two statements is taught to be different.

original: dag snga ma'i don gang yin pa de ni phyi'i don smras pas kyang 'dod pa nyid do //
analyzed: dag snga ma'i don gang yin pa de ni phyi'i don smras pas kyang 'dod pa nyid do //
translated: The meaning of the former statement is accepted by the proponents of external objects.

original: rig par bya ba gsal ba ni pha rol gyi rnam par shes pa las gzhan du mi 'dod la /
analyzed: rig par bya ba gsal ba ni pha rol gyi rnam par shes pa las gzhan du mi 'dod la /
translated: The manifestation that is to be cognized is not asserted to be other than the consciousness of the other.

original: pha rol gyi 'dod pa'i @164a * //
analyzed: pha rol gyi 'dod pa'i @164a * //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs assertion is as follows.

original: don de nyid la brten nas de'i phyir yang zhes gtan tshigs 'di 'god de /
analyzed: don de nyid la brten nas de'i phyir yang zhes gtan tshigs 'di 'god de /
translated: Based on that very fact, the reason is stated: ‚ÄúFor that reason.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir gsal ba zhes bya ba ni gsal byed shes pa las rang bzhin gzhan du khyed mi 'dod pa de'i phyir don gsal bya ni rig pa las gzhan ma yin no zhes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gsal ba zhes bya ba ni gsal byed shes pa las rang bzhin gzhan du khyed mi 'dod pa de'i phyir don gsal bya ni rig pa las gzhan ma yin no zhes so //
translated: Since you do not assert that the so-called manifest is a different nature from the consciousness that manifests it, therefore the object that is manifested is not different from cognition.

original: gal te myong ba'i bdag nyid ma yin pa gang yin pa de las myong ba'i bdag nyid du gsal ba'i rig pa med pa de'i phyir shes pa las tha dad pa'i don mi rig na /
analyzed: gal te myong ba'i bdag nyid ma yin pa gang yin pa de las myong ba'i bdag nyid du gsal ba'i rig pa med pa de'i phyir shes pa las tha dad pa'i don mi rig na /
translated: If that which is not of the nature of experience does not have a cognition that is of the nature of experience, then because of that, if the object that is different from consciousness is not cognized,

original: de lta na 'o na myong ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i brdzun pa yang rig par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na myong ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i brdzun pa yang rig par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: then in that case, how could that which is false, not of the nature of experience, be cognized?

original: don gzhan ma yin na zhes smos te /
analyzed: don gzhan ma yin na zhes smos te /
translated: The response to that is, ‚ÄúIf it is not a different object.‚Äù

original: don gzhan yin na skyon 'dir 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: don gzhan yin na skyon 'dir 'gyur gyi /
translated: This fault would arise if it were a different object.

original: don gzhan ma yin pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don gzhan ma yin pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not a different object.

original: gang gi phyir sngon po dang dkar po la sogs pa myong ba las gzhan ma yin pa nyid na sngon po la sogs pa ni nyams su myong ba de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngon po dang dkar po la sogs pa myong ba las gzhan ma yin pa nyid na sngon po la sogs pa ni nyams su myong ba de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa ste /
translated: Because it is not different from the experience of blue, white, etc., blue, etc. become the nature of that experience.

original: bdag nyid du gyur pa lta bu de ltar te /
analyzed: bdag nyid du gyur pa lta bu de ltar te /
translated: It is like becoming the nature of that.

original: myong ba'i bdag nyid du rang gsal te /
analyzed: myong ba'i bdag nyid du rang gsal te /
translated: It is self-illuminating in the nature of experience.

original: rab tu snang ba'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin pa'i sngon po la sogs pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab tu snang ba'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin pa'i sngon po la sogs pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it appears clearly, blue, etc. that are not different are experienced.

original: nyams su myong ba de yang de'i bdag nyid de sngon po la sogs pa gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de ltar te sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba gsal ba na yang ngo //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba de yang de'i bdag nyid de sngon po la sogs pa gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de ltar te sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba gsal ba na yang ngo //
translated: That experience is also of the nature of that, because it is the nature of the clarity of blue, etc. Thus, when it appears as the nature of blue, etc., it is clear.

original: bya ba gzhan 'dzin pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bya ba gzhan 'dzin pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that another action is apprehended,

original: 'on kyang de ltar gsal ba na rang dang gzhan gsal bar brjod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang de ltar gsal ba na rang dang gzhan gsal bar brjod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: but rather, when it is clear in that way, it is simply said to be the clarity of itself and others.

original: dper na sgron ma la sogs pa'i gsal ba rang bzhin gzhan dang 'brel pa'i bdag nyid kho na gsal ba na rang dang gzhan gsal bar brjod kyi /
analyzed: dper na sgron ma la sogs pa'i gsal ba rang bzhin gzhan dang 'brel pa'i bdag nyid kho na gsal ba na rang dang gzhan gsal bar brjod kyi /
translated: For example, when a lamp and so on is illuminating, it is said to illuminate itself and others, but it is not that it illuminates itself and others in the manner of being related to itself and others.üîΩ

original: rang sal ba na rang dang gzhan gsal bar brjod kyi /
analyzed: rang sal ba na rang dang gzhan gsal bar brjod kyi /
translated: For example, when a lamp and so on is illuminated, it is said that it illuminates itself and others,

original: rang gsal bar byed pa las gzhan ni gsal ba'i bya ba yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: rang gsal bar byed pa las gzhan ni gsal ba'i bya ba yod pa ma yin la /
translated: but apart from the act of illuminating itself, there is no other act of illuminating others.

original: gang gi phyir gsal ba'i rang bzhin de dmigs pa na gzhan yang dmigs pa de'i phyir yul gnyig gsal ba'i bya ba dang ldan par brtags pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gsal ba'i rang bzhin de dmigs pa na gzhan yang dmigs pa de'i phyir yul gnyig gsal ba'i bya ba dang ldan par brtags pa yin no //
translated: And because when the nature of illumination is observed, others are also observed, it is imagined that both objects are engaged in the act of illumination.

original: gang gi phyir dus mtshungs pa'i sgron ma dang gzugs dag ni gsal bya gsal byed kyi dngos po yin zhing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dus mtshungs pa'i sgron ma dang gzugs dag ni gsal bya gsal byed kyi dngos po yin zhing /
translated: Because the lamp and the form that are simultaneous are the entities that illuminate and are illuminated,

original: de yang rgyu dang 'bras bu sngon du song ba can yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de yang rgyu dang 'bras bu sngon du song ba can yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: and that is preceded by cause and effect.

original: rnam 'grel las kyang /üîΩrang nyid shes pas gzhan blo yi //
analyzed: rnam 'grel las kyang / rang nyid shes pas gzhan blo yi //
translated: And the Pramii(laviirttikam) says:üîΩThe cause of the cognition of others

original: rgyu ni gsal byed ces bshad do //
analyzed: rgyu ni gsal byed ces bshad do //
translated: Is said to be the illumination of itself.

original: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid myong yang ma rig pas bslad pa la rnam par phye ba lta bur gzung ba'i rnam pa yod pa nyid ma yin yang dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid myong yang ma rig pas bslad pa la rnam par phye ba lta bur gzung ba'i rnam pa yod pa nyid ma yin yang dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, although the nature of consciousness is to experience, it is as if it were divided by the contamination of ignorance, and although the aspect of the object does not exist, it is perceived.

original: mi bden pa'i don gsal ba'i nus pa'i rang bzhin ma rig pa ni bden pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa yang ston par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mi bden pa'i don gsal ba'i nus pa'i rang bzhin ma rig pa ni bden pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa yang ston par byed pa yin no //
translated: Ignorance, which has the nature of the capacity to manifest unreal objects, causes the appearance of unreal aspects.

original: de'i phyir @164b de'i dbang gis shes pa rang dang gzhan rig par byed par brjod kyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir @164b de'i dbang gis shes pa rang dang gzhan rig par byed par brjod kyi /
translated: Therefore, it is said that consciousness, by its power, causes the awareness of itself and others.

original: don dam par ni rig pa'i rang bzhin du ma gyur pa'i don 'ga' zhig rig par bya ba yod pa ma yin no //üîΩdes na ji ltar sgron ma bdag nyid gsal ba'i bya ba dang ldan na yang gnyi ga gsal ba'i bya ba brjod pa de bzhin du shes pa yang bdag gcig pu gsal ba'i bya ba byed pa na ma rig pas bslad pas gnyi ga gsal bar byed par
analyzed: don dam par ni rig pa'i rang bzhin du ma gyur pa'i don 'ga' zhig rig par bya ba yod pa ma yin no // des na ji ltar sgron ma bdag nyid gsal ba'i bya ba dang ldan na yang gnyi ga gsal ba'i bya ba brjod pa de bzhin du shes pa yang bdag gcig pu gsal ba'i bya ba byed pa na ma rig pas bslad pas gnyi ga gsal bar byed par
translated: But in reality, there is no object that is not of the nature of awareness that can be made an object of awareness.

original: snang ba yin no //
analyzed: snang ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as a lamp, although it performs the action of illuminating itself, is said to perform the action of illuminating both, so also consciousness, although it performs the action of illuminating itself alone, appears to perform the action of illuminating both, because it is contaminated by ignorance.

original: yang 'di la don dam pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang 'di la don dam pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the ultimate in this regard?

original: kha cig na re re zhig shes pa'i bdag nyid rang gsal ba la ni gdon mi za ste de med na myong ba thams cad med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kha cig na re re zhig shes pa'i bdag nyid rang gsal ba la ni gdon mi za ste de med na myong ba thams cad med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Some say: It is the self-illumination of cognition, which is certainly not nonexistent, because if it were, then all experience would be nonexistent.

original: bdag nyid myong ba gang yin pa de yang ji ltar gzhan gyi yin te /
analyzed: bdag nyid myong ba gang yin pa de yang ji ltar gzhan gyi yin te /
translated: And how could that which is experienced by oneself be that of another?

original: bdag dang bdag ma yin pa ni phan tshun spangs nas gnas pa'i phyir de dag ni nyams su myong ba yang phan tshun 'gal bar rigs te /
analyzed: bdag dang bdag ma yin pa ni phan tshun spangs nas gnas pa'i phyir de dag ni nyams su myong ba yang phan tshun 'gal bar rigs te /
translated: Because self and non-self are mutually exclusive, it is reasonable that their experience is mutually exclusive.

original: yul tha dad kyang yul can tha mi dad par ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes zer ro //üîΩgal te de ltar na mi bden pa'i rnam pa dang shas pa'i rang bzhin 'gal ba yin te ;
analyzed: yul tha dad kyang yul can tha mi dad par ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes zer ro // gal te de ltar na mi bden pa'i rnam pa dang shas pa'i rang bzhin 'gal ba yin te ;
translated: It is not reasonable that the objects be different and the subject be non-different.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa phan tshun spangs nas gnas pa'i phyir yod pa dang med pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa phan tshun spangs nas gnas pa'i phyir yod pa dang med pa bzhin no //
translated: If that is so, then the aspect and the nature of consciousness are mutually exclusive, because real and unreal are mutually exclusive, like existent and nonexistent, because they are mutually exclusive.

original: de'i phyir 'di la de yang snang bar mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di la de yang snang bar mi 'gyur na /
translated: Therefore, that is not even apparent in this regard.

original: ji ltar 'khrul pas mthong 'gyur ba //
analyzed: ji ltar 'khrul pas mthong 'gyur ba //
translated: ‚ÄúThe way things are seen is through delusion.‚Äù

original: zhes gsungs pa na slob dpon nyid kyis snang ba ni gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa na slob dpon nyid kyis snang ba ni gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the master himself has stated that there is appearance.

original: gzhan yang rang dang gzhan rig pa gnyis kyi 'gal ba ji lta bu zhig yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang rang dang gzhan rig pa gnyis kyi 'gal ba ji lta bu zhig yin /
translated: Moreover, what is the contradiction between the two, the awareness of self and the awareness of other?

original: rig pa de gnyis gzhan du bdag dang bdag ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin na gcig par gsal bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: rig pa de gnyis gzhan du bdag dang bdag ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin na gcig par gsal bar 'gyur na /
translated: If those two awarenesses were of the nature of self and other, they would be manifest as one.

original: rig pa ni gnyi ga'i rang bzhin ma yin gyi 'on kyang shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rig pa ni gnyi ga'i rang bzhin ma yin gyi 'on kyang shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: But awareness is not of the nature of both; rather, it is of the nature of consciousness.

original: gang yang gang zhig gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni gsal ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di bzhed pa yin par smra ba de la yang mi bden pa'i rnam par mi gsal bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang yang gang zhig gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni gsal ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di bzhed pa yin par smra ba de la yang mi bden pa'i rnam par mi gsal bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And for one who maintains that the meaning of ‚Äúthat which is not of the nature of manifestation is not manifest‚Äù is accepted, it follows that the unreal is not manifest.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni don gzhan yin no zhes rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni don gzhan yin no zhes rig par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, this is to be understood as having a different meaning.

original: rig par bya ba gang yin pa'i rig pa gang zhig gang dang 'brel par snang ba'i rig pa de ni de las tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rig par bya ba gang yin pa'i rig pa gang zhig gang dang 'brel par snang ba'i rig pa de ni de las tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: The awareness that is the awareness of whatever is to be known is not different from that, because it appears as if it were connected to that.

original: dper na bdag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bdag nyid bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the self.

original: gzhan dang 'brel par snang ba'i rig pa nyid la ni de dang 'brel pas khyab ste /
analyzed: gzhan dang 'brel par snang ba'i rig pa nyid la ni de dang 'brel pas khyab ste /
translated: The awareness that appears as if it were connected to another is pervaded by being connected to that,

original: 'brel pa med pa de ltar snang na ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa de ltar snang na ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if it appeared as if it were not connected, it would follow that anything could appear as anything.

original: tha dad pa nyid yin na dus mtshungs par snang ba de gnyis la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po med la /
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid yin na dus mtshungs par snang ba de gnyis la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po med la /
translated: If they were different, the two that appear at the same time would not be in a causal relation.

original: yod kyang de ni 'brel par snang ba'i rgyu mtshan yang ma yin te /üîΩmed dang du ba bzhin no //
analyzed: yod kyang de ni 'brel par snang ba'i rgyu mtshan yang ma yin te / med dang du ba bzhin no //
translated: Even if they were, that would not be the reason that they appear as if they were connected,
because they would be like a nonexistent and smoke.

original: dang yul can gyi dngos por 'brel pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dang yul can gyi dngos por 'brel pa yang ma yin te /
translated: They are not related as object and apprehender,

original: gang gi phyir rnam pa med pa'i phyogs la 'brel par snang ba nyid yul dang yul can gyi dngos po yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam pa med pa'i phyogs la 'brel par snang ba nyid yul dang yul can gyi dngos po yin la /
translated: because in the position that is devoid of aspects, the appearance of being connected is the state of being object and apprehender.

original: de nyid la yang rgyu mtshan du 'brel pa tshol ba yin te /
analyzed: de nyid la yang rgyu mtshan du 'brel pa tshol ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, one seeks a relation of cause and effect in that cognition.

original: 'brel pa med na rig pa thams cad dang 'brel par snang bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med na rig pa thams cad dang 'brel par snang bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If there were no relation, it would follow, absurdly, that all cognitions would appear to be related.

original: des na 'dir tha dad pa la ni 'dres par snang ba'i rgyu 'brel par mi 'thad pa'i phyir khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa na /
analyzed: des na 'dir tha dad pa la ni 'dres par snang ba'i rgyu 'brel par mi 'thad pa'i phyir khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa na /
translated: Therefore, in this case, it is not tenable that a relation is the cause of the appearance of difference as undifferentiated because of the nonobservation of a pervader, which is the opposite of the dissimilar class.

original: 'dres par snang ba la tha mi dad pas khyab la /
analyzed: 'dres par snang ba la tha mi dad pas khyab la /
translated: The appearance of difference as undifferentiated is pervaded by nondifference.

original: tha mi dad pa dang tha dad pa 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa dang tha dad pa 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'o //
translated: The observation of that pervasion is the nonobservation of a pervader, which is the opposite of the dissimilar class.

original: mi bden pa'i rnam pa yang rig pa dang lhan cig 'brel pa med pa yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: mi bden pa'i rnam pa yang rig pa dang lhan cig 'brel pa med pa yin nam zhe na /
translated: Also, is the unreal aspect not related to cognition?

original: med mod dngos po la med pa'i 'brel pa bsams pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: med mod dngos po la med pa'i 'brel pa bsams pas ci zhig bya /
translated: It is not, but what is the point of thinking about a relation that does not exist in reality?

original: ji ltar gsal bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gsal bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does it appear?

original: ma rig pa'i dbang gis so zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i dbang gis so zhes bshad zin to //
translated: It is said that it is through the power of ignorance.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sngon po la sogs pa snang ba la rang bzhin tha dad pa med pa'i phyir sngon po la sogs pa de de'i bdag nyid du yin pa'i phyir zhes snang ba'i rang bzhin nyid du tha snyad du byas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sngon po la sogs pa snang ba la rang bzhin tha dad pa med pa'i phyir sngon po la sogs pa de de'i bdag nyid du yin pa'i phyir zhes snang ba'i rang bzhin nyid du tha snyad du byas so //
translated: Therefore, since there is no difference in the nature of the appearance of blue, etc., it is conventionally said that blue, etc. are the nature of the appearance, because they are of the nature of that.

original: rna pa med pa'i phyogs la dmigs pa'i don ni 'dres par snang ba'i don yin zhing /
analyzed: rna pa med pa'i phyogs la dmigs pa'i don ni 'dres par snang ba'i don yin zhing /
translated: In the position that there is no difference, the meaning of the object of observation is the meaning of the appearance of a mixture.

original: de yang de ltar gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang de ltar gsal ba yin no //
translated: And that is clear in that way.

original: des na dmigs pa'i don gzhan yin la /
analyzed: des na dmigs pa'i don gzhan yin la /
translated: Therefore, it is clear that it is said that the meaning of the object of observation is one thing,

original: rig pa'i don kyang gzhan yin no zhes gang brjod pa de gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: rig pa'i don kyang gzhan yin no zhes gang brjod pa de gsal ba yin no //
translated: and the meaning of the awareness is another.

original: de'i phyir de ltar rnam pa med pa'i phyogs la dus mnyam par snang ba'i don gsal ba'i don du lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa dang / rig pa gtan tshigs su brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar rnam pa med pa'i phyogs la dus mnyam par snang ba'i don gsal ba'i don du lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa dang / rig pa gtan tshigs su brjod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, in the position that there is no aspect, the certainty of simultaneous observation of the object of observation and the object of awareness is clear, and awareness is stated as the reason.

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs la ni gzung ba'i rnam par snang ba tha dad par mi 'dod de /
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs la ni gzung ba'i rnam par snang ba tha dad par mi 'dod de /
translated: In the position that there is an aspect, the appearance of the apprehended aspect is not asserted to be different.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa dang bcas par smras pa la yang /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa dang bcas par smras pa la yang /
translated: Therefore, even though the existence of aspects is asserted,üîΩthe Acarya

original: slob dpon gyis ;
analyzed: slob dpon gyis ;
translated: has said,üîΩ‚ÄúTherefore, the mind that has the object of appearance . . .‚Äù

original: de'i phyir snang don de blo dag / ces bya ba la sogs pas rnam pa med pa'i phyogs sel ba gnyis po 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir snang don de blo dag / ces bya ba la sogs pas rnam pa med pa'i phyogs sel ba gnyis po 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: and so forth, and he teaches this very second refutation of the position of non-aspected cognition.

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i smra ba'i tshul la 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni rang rang rig pa'i sgrub par byed par 'dod de /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i smra ba'i tshul la 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni rang rang rig pa'i sgrub par byed par 'dod de /
translated: Therefore, in the system of the Vijfiaptimatra, the nature of the conceptualization of the apprehending subject is asserted to be the proof of reflexive awareness.

original: rtog pa'i rang bzhin de las bdag nyid rig pa 'di bdag nyid rig pa'i rang bzhin de'i dngos po rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa'i rang bzhin de las bdag nyid rig pa 'di bdag nyid rig pa'i rang bzhin de'i dngos po rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: From that nature of conceptualization, the reflexive awareness of itself is posited as the nature of reflexive awareness.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: rnam par gzhag 'jog gi dngos po las bsgrub bya dang bsgrub byed kyi tha snyad yin te /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag 'jog gi dngos po las bsgrub bya dang bsgrub byed kyi tha snyad yin te /
translated: The convention of probandum and probans is based on the thing to be posited.

original: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa de'i phyir khyad par can gyi bdag nyid @165b rig pa'i tha snyad du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa de'i phyir khyad par can gyi bdag nyid @165b rig pa'i tha snyad du byed pa yin no //
translated: Because consciousness has the nature of awareness, it is conventionally said to be aware of itself.

original: des na rnam par shes par smra la 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni bdag nyid rig pa rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu'i tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rnam par shes par smra la 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni bdag nyid rig pa rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu'i tshad ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, for the Proponents of Consciousness, the aspect of apprehending is the valid knowledge that establishes the existence of reflexive awareness.

original: phyi rol gyi don la 'dra ba tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don la 'dra ba tshad ma yin la /
translated: For Proponents of External Objects, the aspect of similarity is the valid knowledge.

original: de yang 'khrul pas tha dad pa nyid du nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'khrul pas tha dad pa nyid du nges pa yin no //
translated: And that is ascertained to be different from the object due to error.

original: dga' ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba rig pa'i rang bzhin yang 'bras bu yin pa des na de la tshad ma dang 'bras bu rnam par gzhag par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: dga' ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba rig pa'i rang bzhin yang 'bras bu yin pa des na de la tshad ma dang 'bras bu rnam par gzhag par 'gyur gyi /
translated: The appearance of the nature of pleasure and so on is also the effect of reflexive awareness. Therefore the valid knowledge and the effect are posited in that way.

original: rnam par shes par smra ba la ni 'bras bu dang tshad ma dag gi rnam par dbye bar mi 'grub po zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par shes par smra ba la ni 'bras bu dang tshad ma dag gi rnam par dbye bar mi 'grub po zhe na /
translated: But for the Proponents of Consciousness, the distinction between valid knowledge and effect is not established.

original: bshad pa dper na 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyi 'dis rig pas na tshor ba ste /
analyzed: bshad pa dper na 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyi 'dis rig pas na tshor ba ste /
translated: For example, it is said that feeling is so called because it feels pleasure and so on.

original: tshor bar byed pa rtogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: tshor bar byed pa rtogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: The nature of the cognition of the cognition of the object.

original: phyi rol gyi don der ro //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don der ro //
translated: The external object is the object.

original: bdag yul du zhes bya ba ni rang gi rang bzhin yul yin par ro //
analyzed: bdag yul du zhes bya ba ni rang gi rang bzhin yul yin par ro //
translated: The self is the object in the sense that it is the intrinsic nature of the self.

original: gzhag pa ni rig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bur gzhag par bya na'o //
analyzed: gzhag pa ni rig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bur gzhag par bya na'o //
translated: It is posited as the effect of the nature of cognition.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi rang rig pa'i mngon sum la /
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi rang rig pa'i mngon sum la /
translated: In the case of the self-awareness of mind and mental factors,

original: bdag nyid rig par bya ba rig par byed pa rtogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni tshad ma /
analyzed: bdag nyid rig par bya ba rig par byed pa rtogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni tshad ma /
translated: the nature of the cognition of the object of cognition is the valid cognition,

original: bdag nyid rtogs par byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni 'bras bu yin zhing der chad ma dang 'bras bu dag tha dad par snang ba yang ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: bdag nyid rtogs par byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni 'bras bu yin zhing der chad ma dang 'bras bu dag tha dad par snang ba yang ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: and the nature of the cognition of the self is the effect. And the object and the effect do not appear separately.

original: rnam par shes par smra ba la shes pa thams cad la gzhal bya dang / 'jal byed dang / 'bras bu gnas pa 'di ni kun la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes par smra ba la shes pa thams cad la gzhal bya dang / 'jal byed dang / 'bras bu gnas pa 'di ni kun la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, in the case of the proponents of consciousness, this triad of object of comprehension, means of comprehension, and effect should be applied to all forms of cognition.

original: phyi rol gyi don gyi tshul de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i don du bshad pa /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don gyi tshul de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i don du bshad pa /
translated: In order to clarify the meaning of external objects, he explains:

original: phyi'i don de las nyams su myong ba bdag nyid de /
analyzed: phyi'i don de las nyams su myong ba bdag nyid de /
translated: The experience of external objects is of the nature of self-experience.

original: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa de dag rang bzhin myong ba ste /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa de dag rang bzhin myong ba ste /
translated: Because it is of the nature of realization, those attachments, etc. are self-experience,

original: myong bar byed nus pa yin no //
analyzed: myong bar byed nus pa yin no //
translated: that is, they are capable of experience.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir de dag gi rung ba nyid de ni tshad ma /
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir de dag gi rung ba nyid de ni tshad ma /
translated: For that reason, their validity is valid cognition.

original: bdag nyid gzhal bya /
analyzed: bdag nyid gzhal bya /
translated: The object of comprehension is the self.üîΩSelf-awareness is the result.

original: rang rig pa 'bras bu yin pa de bzhin du //üîΩrnam pa shes par smra ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: rang rig pa 'bras bu yin pa de bzhin du // rnam pa shes par smra ba la yang ngo //
translated: In the same way,üîΩit is also for the Proponents of Consciousness.

original: de yang na de la yang zhes bya ba rnam par shes par smras pa la'o //
analyzed: de yang na de la yang zhes bya ba rnam par shes par smras pa la'o //
translated: And also there means also for the Proponents of Consciousness.

original: tshig le'ur byas pa snga mas gzhag pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa 'dis bstan pa yin gyi //
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa snga mas gzhag pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa 'dis bstan pa yin gyi //
translated: This verse teaches what was set forth in the earlier verse.

original: phyir rol gyi don gyi tshul gsal bar byas ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyir rol gyi don gyi tshul gsal bar byas ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not a clarification of the meaning of external objects.

original: rnam par shes par smra ba la tshad ma'i sgra'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: rnam par shes par smra ba la tshad ma'i sgra'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to teach the synonyms of valid cognition to the Proponents of Consciousness, he says:

original: yongs su gcod pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa zhes brjod cing bsnyad la /
analyzed: yongs su gcod pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa zhes brjod cing bsnyad la /
translated: That which has the nature of determining is called and described as the aspect of apprehending.

original: bdag nyid la rung ba zhes kyang brjod pa ni rnam par shes par smra ba la tshad mar brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: bdag nyid la rung ba zhes kyang brjod pa ni rnam par shes par smra ba la tshad mar brjod pa yin te /
translated: That which is called and described as the nature of being suitable with respect to itself is called valid cognition by the Proponents of Consciousness.

original: rang bdag nyid rig pa ni tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bdag nyid rig pa ni tshad ma yin no //
translated: Self-awareness is valid cognition.

original: @166a * // 'dis rig pas rig pa ste /
analyzed: @166a * // 'dis rig pas rig pa ste /
translated: It is awareness because it is aware of itself.

original: rtogs pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin khyad par can gang zhig byed par 'gyur bas rang gi bdag nyid pa byed par 'gyur ba de nyid rig pa'i sgras brjod do //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin khyad par can gang zhig byed par 'gyur bas rang gi bdag nyid pa byed par 'gyur ba de nyid rig pa'i sgras brjod do //
translated: The word ‚Äúawareness‚Äù refers to that which has the nature of realization, a special nature that is to be produced, and it is produced with respect to itself.

original: rig pas rig pa zhes de ltar dngos po bsgrub pa'i phyogs yongs su bzung na ni 'bras bu nyid brjod par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: rig pas rig pa zhes de ltar dngos po bsgrub pa'i phyogs yongs su bzung na ni 'bras bu nyid brjod par 'gyur ro ;
translated: If one accepts the position that it is established as a thing in that way, by saying ‚Äúawareness is aware,‚Äù then it would be said to be the effect.

original: / slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos rang gi bdag nyid rig pa tshad ma'o zhes gsungs pa de la /
analyzed: / slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos rang gi bdag nyid rig pa tshad ma'o zhes gsungs pa de la /
translated: The master Dignaga has said that one's own awareness is a valid cognition.

original: rig pa'i sgra dngos po sgrub par bsams nas dog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig pa'i sgra dngos po sgrub par bsams nas dog par 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the word 'awareness' is taken to mean the establishment of an entity, and so there is a problem.

original: rig pas rig pa ste 'bras bu la brjod pa rnams yin nam /
analyzed: rig pas rig pa ste 'bras bu la brjod pa rnams yin nam /
translated: Is it that awareness is aware, that is, that the effect is expressed?

original: gal te de nyid tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: gal te de nyid tshad ma yin la /
translated: If that itself is a valid cognition,üîΩthen the effect and the valid cognition would not be different.

original: 'o na ni 'bras bu dang tshad ma dag tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su gcod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kho na chad ma yin la /
analyzed: 'o na ni 'bras bu dang tshad ma dag tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su gcod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kho na chad ma yin la /
translated: In order to eliminate that doubt, it is explained that it is itself a valid cognition because it determines,

original: de nyid kyi rang rig par brjod do zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi rang rig par brjod do zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: and that is called 'awareness of itself.'

original: tshig le'ur byas pa snga mas ma bzhag pa rig pas thob pa'i don ston pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa snga mas ma bzhag pa rig pas thob pa'i don ston pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This verse shows the meaning of what was not established by the previous verse, which is about awareness.

original: lhan cig dmigs pa dang rig pa dag gis rnam pa med pa'i phyogs la phyi rol gyi don bkag pa nyid do //
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs pa dang rig pa dag gis rnam pa med pa'i phyogs la phyi rol gyi don bkag pa nyid do //
translated: By the simultaneity of the object and the awareness, and by awareness, the position of no aspect is refuted, and external objects are denied.

original: de nyid kyi phyir phyi rol gyi don yod kyang snang ba'i don dang de'i blo dag tha dad pa med par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir phyi rol gyi don yod kyang snang ba'i don dang de'i blo dag tha dad pa med par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, although external objects exist, the object that appears and the cognition of it should be regarded as non-different.

original: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: lhan cig dmigs pa dang rig pa dag gis sngon po la sogs pa gzung ba dang de rig pa tha dad pa med par grub par blta'o //
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs pa dang rig pa dag gis sngon po la sogs pa gzung ba dang de rig pa tha dad pa med par grub par blta'o //
translated: It should be understood that the non-difference of the apprehended blue, etc., and the cognition of it is established by the simultaneity of the object and cognition and by the awareness of the object.

original: rig pa ni myong ba'i rang bzhin nyid yin la /
analyzed: rig pa ni myong ba'i rang bzhin nyid yin la /
translated: Awareness is the nature of experience.

original: lhan cig dmigs pa yang tha dad pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs pa yang tha dad pa med pa nyid do //
translated: The simultaneity of the object and cognition is also non-difference.

original: 'dis ni 'dir lhag pa'i don gzhan nyid do //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'dir lhag pa'i don gzhan nyid do //
translated: Here, the additional meaning is as follows:

original: phan 'dogs pa dang phan gdags pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir dus gcig tu lhan cig dmigs pa gnyis po dag ni yongs su gcod pa dang yongs su gcod pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa dang phan gdags pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir dus gcig tu lhan cig dmigs pa gnyis po dag ni yongs su gcod pa dang yongs su gcod pa med pa nyid do //
translated: Because there is no relation of benefactor and beneficiary, the two simultaneous objects are either both ascertained or both not ascertained.
