analyzed: de la yang rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin 'gal ba med pa'i phyir 'di tshad mar rigs pa yin no //
translated: And because there is no contradiction in the nature of subtle particles, it is reasonable that this is valid cognition.

original: mthong ba'i sngon po ni rdul phra rab du ma'i rang bzhin gyi rags pa nyid yin no //üîΩde'i phyir ji ltar chu mthong ba smig rgyu rang gi mtshan nyid mthong ba na /
analyzed: mthong ba'i sngon po ni rdul phra rab du ma'i rang bzhin gyi rags pa nyid yin no // de'i phyir ji ltar chu mthong ba smig rgyu rang gi mtshan nyid mthong ba na /
translated: The blue that is seen is the coarseness that is the nature of many subtle particles.

original: rnam par 'byed par byed mi nus pa la chos mthun pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi chur 'khrul ba skye ba de bzhin du nor bu mthong bas bu ga na gnas pa'i 'ong zlum po gzung ba na /
analyzed: rnam par 'byed par byed mi nus pa la chos mthun pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi chur 'khrul ba skye ba de bzhin du nor bu mthong bas bu ga na gnas pa'i 'ong zlum po gzung ba na /
translated: Therefore, just as when one sees water, one sees the mirage, and because of the similarity of the characteristics, the error of water arises, in the same way, when one sees a gem, one apprehends the round shape that is located in the hole,üîΩand because of the similarity of the characteristics, the error of a pearl arises.

original: chos mthun pa'i rgyu mtshan can gnyi ga'i rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la rag las pa can yid kyis 'khrul pa 'dir 'gyur ba yin no //üîΩ'on kyang 'dir yul gang la skyes pa de nor bu dang 'brel pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos mthun pa'i rgyu mtshan can gnyi ga'i rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la rag las pa can yid kyis 'khrul pa 'dir 'gyur ba yin no // 'on kyang 'dir yul gang la skyes pa de nor bu dang 'brel pa'i phyir /
translated: This is because the error of the mind depends on the apprehension of the intrinsic identity of both, which is the reason for the similarity of phenomena.üîΩHowever, in this case, the cognition that arises in regard to the object is the cause of the cognition of the gem, because it is related to the gem.

original: dngos po dang 'brel pas nor bu thob pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi shes ba gzhan gyi rgyur 'gyur ba na brgyud pas byas pa'i rgyu nyid kyis na /
analyzed: dngos po dang 'brel pas nor bu thob pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi shes ba gzhan gyi rgyur 'gyur ba na brgyud pas byas pa'i rgyu nyid kyis na /
translated: Since it is the cause of the cognition of the gem indirectly,

original: cig shos sgron ma'i 'od la nor bu 'dzin pa las khyad par yod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi /
analyzed: cig shos sgron ma'i 'od la nor bu 'dzin pa las khyad par yod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi /
translated: the cognition of the gem is different from the cognition of the light of the lamp.

original: rang gi yul la ltos na ni gzhan las khyad par yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir bshad pa snga ma nyid skyon med pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi yul la ltos na ni gzhan las khyad par yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir bshad pa snga ma nyid skyon med pa yin no //
translated: But in regard to its own object, it is not different from the other, so the previous explanation is faultless.

original: gal te rjes su dpag par rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag par rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba ma yin na /
translated: If the intrinsic identity does not appear to inference,

original: 'o na 'di de la tshad mar ci ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'o na 'di de la tshad mar ci ltar 'gyur //
translated: how can it be a valid cognition in regard to it?

original: 'dis gzung ba sgro btags pa'am yod pa'i spyi 'dzin pa'i bya ba'i yul du gyur pa gang yin pa de nyid la 'di mngon sum bzhin du tshad ma yin par rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: 'dis gzung ba sgro btags pa'am yod pa'i spyi 'dzin pa'i bya ba'i yul du gyur pa gang yin pa de nyid la 'di mngon sum bzhin du tshad ma yin par rigs so zhe na /
translated: If you say that this is a valid cognition in regard to that which is the object of the action of apprehending a superimposed or existent universal, just as it is a direct perception,

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes smos te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes smos te /
translated: then we say that is precisely whyüîΩ.

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: don byed pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don byed pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is related to the performance of an object‚Äôs function.

original: dngos po ni @177a * //
analyzed: dngos po ni @177a * //
translated: An entity

original: don byed nus pa yin no //
analyzed: don byed nus pa yin no //
translated: is that which is able to perform a function.

original: don byed pa dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir tshad ma 'di'i yul ni dngos po yin gya /
analyzed: don byed pa dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir tshad ma 'di'i yul ni dngos po yin gya /
translated: Because it is related to the performance of an object‚Äôs function, the object of this valid cognition is an entity,

original: gzung ba tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: not a mere object of apprehension.

original: yang ci'i phyir gzung ba la ltos nas ni tshad ma ma yin gyi /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir gzung ba la ltos nas ni tshad ma ma yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, why is it that in dependence on an object of apprehension a valid cognition is not produced,

original: 'on kyang don byed par nus pa'i yul can yin zhe na bshad pa /
analyzed: 'on kyang don byed par nus pa'i yul can yin zhe na bshad pa /
translated: but rather it is a cognition that is able to perform a function?

original: tshad ma la sogs pa dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni don de don du gnyer bar bya ba sreg pa la sogs pa byed pa bsgrub pa der rung ba'i yul can te /
analyzed: tshad ma la sogs pa dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni don de don du gnyer bar bya ba sreg pa la sogs pa byed pa bsgrub pa der rung ba'i yul can te /
translated: The analysis of valid cognition and so on is a cognition that is suitable as the means of accomplishing the activity of burning and so on, which is the purpose of that object.

original: yul gang la yod pa'o //
analyzed: yul gang la yod pa'o //
translated: It is the object of that.

original: 'di la don byed pa don du gnyer bas me la sogs pa don du gnyer ba tsam gyis bsgrub bya yin par ni ma mthong ste /üîΩde bsgrub par nus pa don du gnyer ba na tshad ma'am /
analyzed: 'di la don byed pa don du gnyer bas me la sogs pa don du gnyer ba tsam gyis bsgrub bya yin par ni ma mthong ste / de bsgrub par nus pa don du gnyer ba na tshad ma'am /
translated: One who seeks to achieve an object does not see that the mere seeking of fire, etc. is to be achieved.

original: gzhan dpyod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dpyod pa yin no //
translated: When one seeks to achieve that, one seeks a valid cognition or another investigation.

original: de'i phyir shes pa'i rang bzhin gang zhig skyes bu'i don sgrub par byed pa rnam par dpyod pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa de ni tshad mar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa'i rang bzhin gang zhig skyes bu'i don sgrub par byed pa rnam par dpyod pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa de ni tshad mar brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, that nature of cognition which is a branch of investigation that accomplishes the purpose of a person is called valid cognition.

original: gang gis bzung ba tsam gyis yul can tshad mar 'gyur ba bzung ba tsam ston pa ni skye bu'i don sgrub par byed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gis bzung ba tsam gyis yul can tshad mar 'gyur ba bzung ba tsam ston pa ni skye bu'i don sgrub par byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The mere indication of the mere apprehension by which the subject becomes valid cognition does not accomplish the purpose of a person.

original: 'on kyang 'jug pa'i yul rang gi mtshan nyid ston par byed pa'i mi slu ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'jug pa'i yul rang gi mtshan nyid ston par byed pa'i mi slu ba yin no //
translated: However, it is non-deceptive in indicating the object of engagement, the intrinsic nature.

original: des na dngos po'i yul can de nyid tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: des na dngos po'i yul can de nyid tshad ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, that itself, which has an object that is a thing, is valid cognition.

original: gal te dpyod pa don byed par rung ba'i yul can yin na /
analyzed: gal te dpyod pa don byed par rung ba'i yul can yin na /
translated: If investigation has an object that is suitable for accomplishing a purpose,

original: 'o na ni rtog pa dang ldan pas shes pas dpyad par mi bya ste /
analyzed: 'o na ni rtog pa dang ldan pas shes pas dpyad par mi bya ste /
translated: But if so, then the cognition of one who has a concept does not analyze,üîΩbecause it does not establish the establishment of the function of an external object.

original: de ni phyi rol gyi don bsgrub par bya ba'i don byed pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: de ni phyi rol gyi don bsgrub par bya ba'i don byed pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs pa la /
translated: In response to this doubt, he says, ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it,‚Äù and ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it‚Äù and ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it‚Äù in order to show that both the analysis and the function of an object are taught by a single engagement.üîΩHe says, ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it,‚ÄùüîΩand ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it‚Äù in order to show that both the analysis and the function of an object are taught by a single engagement.üîΩHe says, ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it,‚Äù

original: ji ltar don byed pa don du gnyer bas de dpyad par bya ba dang / ji ltar don byed pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba de gnyi ga 'jug pa gcig gis bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar don byed pa don du gnyer bas de dpyad par bya ba dang / ji ltar don byed pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba de gnyi ga 'jug pa gcig gis bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: and ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it‚Äù in order to show that both the analysis and the function of an object are taught by a single engagement.

original: rtog pa sngon du gtong ba zhes smos so //üîΩbde ba dang sdug bsngal smos pas ni 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i mtshon ba ste /
analyzed: rtog pa sngon du gtong ba zhes smos so // bde ba dang sdug bsngal smos pas ni 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i mtshon ba ste /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it,‚ÄùüîΩand ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it‚Äù in order to show that both the analysis and the function of an object are taught by a single engagement.üîΩHe says, ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it,‚Äù

original: 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it‚Äù in order to show that both the analysis and the function of an object are taught by a single engagement.üîΩHe says, ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it,‚Äù

original: 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i bsgrub pa'i byed pa gang yin pa de bsgrub par te /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i bsgrub pa'i byed pa gang yin pa de bsgrub par te /
translated: and ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it‚Äù in order to show that both the analysis and the function of an object are taught by a single engagement.

original: nan tan du bya bar 'dod pas so //
analyzed: nan tan du bya bar 'dod pas so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it,‚ÄùüîΩand ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it‚Äù in order to show that both the analysis and the function of an object are taught by a single engagement.

original: ci ltar bsgrub par 'dod ce na /üîΩci ltar 'os par ro //
analyzed: ci ltar bsgrub par 'dod ce na / ci ltar 'os par ro //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it,‚ÄùüîΩand ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it‚Äù in order to show that both the analysis and the function of an object are taught by a single engagement.

original: bsgrub pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: bsgrub pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúOne who is intent on the function of an object analyzes it,‚Äù

original: spong ba'i bdag nyid dang len pa'i rang bzhin no ;
analyzed: spong ba'i bdag nyid dang len pa'i rang bzhin no ;
translated: The nature of the thing is to be rejected, and the nature of the other is to be accepted.

original: / de la dngos po ni sdug bsngal gyi sgrub par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: / de la dngos po ni sdug bsngal gyi sgrub par byed pa yin la /
translated: The thing is the means of accomplishing suffering,

original: gzhan ni bde ba bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni bde ba bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: and the other is the means of accomplishing happiness.

original: 'di ltar dngos po yod pa tsam gyis ni rang gis bsgrub par bya ba'i don bya ba mi byed kyi 'on kyang thob pas yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po yod pa tsam gyis ni rang gis bsgrub par bya ba'i don bya ba mi byed kyi 'on kyang thob pas yin no //
translated: For, the mere existence of the thing does not accomplish its own purpose, but rather its acquisition.

original: de'i phyir don du gnyer bas 'dod pa bsgrub pa thob par bya ba dang / cig shos spang bar bya ba yin no//
analyzed: de'i phyir don du gnyer bas 'dod pa bsgrub pa thob par bya ba dang / cig shos spang bar bya ba yin no//
translated: Therefore, the one should be acquired, and the other should be rejected.

original: @177b 'jug pa las ji ltar 'os par bsgrub par nus pa yang shes pas bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: @177b 'jug pa las ji ltar 'os par bsgrub par nus pa yang shes pas bstan pa yin no //
translated: The means of accomplishing them is taught by the knowledge of what is possible and impossible.

original: de smras pa ni shes nas zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de smras pa ni shes nas zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The statement ‚Äúhaving understood‚Äù refers to that.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar don du gnyer ba don byed pa bsgrub pas don du gnyer bar byed pa de bzhin du de ston par byed pa'i shes pas kyang yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar don du gnyer ba don byed pa bsgrub pas don du gnyer bar byed pa de bzhin du de ston par byed pa'i shes pas kyang yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as the one who seeks the means of accomplishing the purpose is engaged in the means of accomplishing the purpose, so too is the one who teaches the means of accomplishing the purpose.

original: log pa'i shes pas zhugs pa las ni mngon par 'dod pa cung zad 'grub pa ni med do //
analyzed: log pa'i shes pas zhugs pa las ni mngon par 'dod pa cung zad 'grub pa ni med do //
translated: But nothing is accomplished by engaging in a wrong cognition.

original: des na ji ltar med pa bsgrub pa len cing gzhan spong ba de bzhin du de dag rab tu ston pa'i mi slu ba ni blang bar bya ba yin la gzhan ni spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des na ji ltar med pa bsgrub pa len cing gzhan spong ba de bzhin du de dag rab tu ston pa'i mi slu ba ni blang bar bya ba yin la gzhan ni spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as one accepts and rejects in order to establish what does not exist, in the same way, one should accept the non-deceptive teaching that shows the object of engagement for the sake of accomplishing the goal, and reject the other.

original: des na don byed pa'i don du gnyer ba 'jug pa'i yul gyi dngos po ston pa mi slu ba blang bar bya ba dang / gzhan spangs pa'i don du rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: des na don byed pa'i don du gnyer ba 'jug pa'i yul gyi dngos po ston pa mi slu ba blang bar bya ba dang / gzhan spangs pa'i don du rtog pa yin no //
translated: Thus, one should conceive of the non-deceptive teaching that shows the object of engagement for the sake of accomplishing the goal, and reject the other.

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi sgrub par byad pa sngar shes pa dang rjes su mthun par bsgrub par 'dod pa yin gyi /üîΩzhen pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi sgrub par byad pa sngar shes pa dang rjes su mthun par bsgrub par 'dod pa yin gyi / zhen pas ni ma yin no //
translated: One desires to establish happiness and suffering in accordance with prior knowledge, not out of attachment.

original: zhen pa ni don med pa la chags pa yin la rtog pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ni dgos pa dang ldan pas yin gyi chags pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zhen pa ni don med pa la chags pa yin la rtog pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ni dgos pa dang ldan pas yin gyi chags pas ni ma yin no //
translated: Attachment is clinging to what is meaningless, while engagement with conceptual thought is meaningful, not out of attachment.

original: de'i phyir nus pa med pa gzung bar bya ba tsam rab tu ston pa brgyud pas kyang don byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa don du gnyer ba brtags par ni ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i phyir nus pa med pa gzung bar bya ba tsam rab tu ston pa brgyud pas kyang don byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa don du gnyer ba brtags par ni ltar 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, even the teaching of mere apprehended objects that lack the ability to perform a function is not a limb that performs a function.

original: 'jug pa'i yul ni mi slu ba'i rab tu ston par byed pa ni brgyud nas don byed pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul ni mi slu ba'i rab tu ston par byed pa ni brgyud nas don byed pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The object of engagement is the teaching that is nondeceptive. It becomes a limb that performs a function indirectly.

original: 'di ltar shes pa las ni 'jug pa yin la de las ni don sgrub par byed pa bsgrub pa nyams su len pa dang mthun par 'gyur zhing de las don grub pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar shes pa las ni 'jug pa yin la de las ni don sgrub par byed pa bsgrub pa nyams su len pa dang mthun par 'gyur zhing de las don grub pa yin te /
translated: Thus engagement is from consciousness, and from that, the practice of the means of accomplishing the object to be accomplished is compatible. From that, the object is accomplished.

original: de'i phyir don sgrub par byed pa rab tu ston pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo don byed pa'i yan lag yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir don sgrub par byed pa rab tu ston pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo don byed pa'i yan lag yin no //
translated: Therefore the nature of the consciousness that teaches the means of accomplishing the object is a limb that performs a function.

original: gang cung zhig don du gnyer bas rnam par dpyad par bya ba de thams cad ni dngos su don byed pa'i yan lag ma yin te /
analyzed: gang cung zhig don du gnyer bas rnam par dpyad par bya ba de thams cad ni dngos su don byed pa'i yan lag ma yin te /
translated: Whatever is analyzed by those who seek an object is not a limb that directly performs a function.

original: dngos su don byed pa ni skad cig ma nyid kyis dpyod pa 'jug pa'i sngar don byas pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: dngos su don byed pa ni skad cig ma nyid kyis dpyod pa 'jug pa'i sngar don byas pa'i phyir ro /
translated: The actual performance of a function is the performance of a function prior to the engagement of analysis, because of momentariness.

original: de'i phyir brgyud pas kyang don byed pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa bshad par bya ba'i shes pa'i rang bzhin don byed nus pa rab tu ston pa de nyid bstan bcos su dpyad pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir brgyud pas kyang don byed pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa bshad par bya ba'i shes pa'i rang bzhin don byed nus pa rab tu ston pa de nyid bstan bcos su dpyad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the treatise analyzes that very capacity for the performance of a function, which is the nature of consciousness, which is taught to be the indirect performance of a function, which is the cause of the engagement of analysis.

original: gal te dngos po nyid du nges pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas gzung bar bya ba de nyid dngos po ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po nyid du nges pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas gzung bar bya ba de nyid dngos po ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: If it is ascertained as an entity, is it not an entity that is to be apprehended by inference?

original: rjes su dpag pa'i snang ba zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i snang ba zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said to be the appearance of inference.

original: gang zhig don nyid du nges pa ji ltar don ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig don nyid du nges pa ji ltar don ma yin zhe na /
translated: If it is ascertained as an object, how can it not be an object?

original: don sgrub par byed pa zhes smos so //
analyzed: don sgrub par byed pa zhes smos so //
translated: It is said to be the establishment of an object.

original: don nyid du nges pa'i snang ba de don las skyes ba'i phyir don du 'gyur te /üîΩdper na mngon sum gyis @178a * //
analyzed: don nyid du nges pa'i snang ba de don las skyes ba'i phyir don du 'gyur te / dper na mngon sum gyis @178a * //
translated: The appearance that is ascertained as an object is an object because it arises from an object.üîΩFor example, it is like the appearance of direct perception.

original: snang ba lta bu 'am /
analyzed: snang ba lta bu 'am /
translated: It is like an appearance.

original: de nyid don bya ba byed pas don du 'gyur grang na re zhig don las skyes pa'i phyir ni don ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid don bya ba byed pas don du 'gyur grang na re zhig don las skyes pa'i phyir ni don ma yin te /
translated: If you say that it is meaningful because it performs the function of meaning, then it is not meaningful because it is produced from meaning.

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not the effect of that.

original: de bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de bshad pa ni /
translated: This is explained.

original: don byed nus pa'i dngos po 'gags kyang rjes su dpag pa'i snang ba mi 'gag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don byed nus pa'i dngos po 'gags kyang rjes su dpag pa'i snang ba mi 'gag pa'i phyir /
translated: Even though the thing that is able to perform a function has ceased, the appearance of inference does not cease.

original: rang nyid don byed pa yang ma yin no zhes 'chad pa ni de las sreg pa la sogs pa'i don cung zad 'grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid don byed pa yang ma yin no zhes 'chad pa ni de las sreg pa la sogs pa'i don cung zad 'grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not itself the performance of a function, because it does not accomplish even the slightest purpose such as burning.

original: gal te shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis snang ba'i don nyid yin yang /
analyzed: gal te shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis snang ba'i don nyid yin yang /
translated: Even though the appearance of an object is the nature of consciousness itself,

original: ji ltar me'i bzhin du nges pa de ltar don bya ba cung zad kyang sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar me'i bzhin du nges pa de ltar don bya ba cung zad kyang sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not accomplish even the slightest purpose, just like fire.

original: bzhed ma thag pa'i gtan tshigs gnyis po de nyid kyi phyir yod kyang yod pa'i spyi'i don ma yin no zhes 'brel te /
analyzed: bzhed ma thag pa'i gtan tshigs gnyis po de nyid kyi phyir yod kyang yod pa'i spyi'i don ma yin no zhes 'brel te /
translated: Because of those two reasons that were just stated, it is connected that even though it exists, it is not the general meaning of existence.

original: don ma yin te me ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don ma yin te me ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not meaningful, it is not fire. This is the meaning.

original: brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir zhes 'chad par 'gyur bas re zhig spyi yod pa ni ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir zhes 'chad par 'gyur bas re zhig spyi yod pa ni ma yin mod kyi /
translated: because it is not an object of expression.

original: 'on kyang de ni yod du chug kyang de ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni kyang gi sgra'i don yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de ni yod du chug kyang de ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni kyang gi sgra'i don yin no //
translated: But even if it were to exist, it is not that.

original: de ni dngos po log kyang gnas pa dang sreg pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don cung zad kyang de las 'grub pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni dngos po log kyang gnas pa dang sreg pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don cung zad kyang de las 'grub pa med pa yin no //
translated: That is, even if the universal were to exist, it is not that, because it does not accomplish the slightest purpose, such as abiding or burning, even when the thing is destroyed.

original: ci'i phyir yod pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir yod pa nyid yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it existent?

original: rang gi shes pa skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi shes pa skyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it produces its own cognition.

original: me'i bsgrub par bya ba byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: me'i bsgrub par bya ba byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It does not perform the function of fire.

original: des na me rjes su dpag pa ni spyi yod pa'i yul can du yang mi rigs so zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na me rjes su dpag pa ni spyi yod pa'i yul can du yang mi rigs so zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable to say that the inference of fire has a universal as its object.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir rjes su dpag pa'i snang ba ni don ma yin la /
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir rjes su dpag pa'i snang ba ni don ma yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means because the appearance of inference is not an object.

original: rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa ni dngos po'i yul can yin pa de'i phyir don byed nus pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin la mi slu ba ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du thob par byed pa gang yin pa de nyid ni rjes su dpag pa 'di'i yang tshad
analyzed: rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa ni dngos po'i yul can yin pa de'i phyir don byed nus pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin la mi slu ba ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du thob par byed pa gang yin pa de nyid ni rjes su dpag pa 'di'i yang tshad
translated: The analysis that is associated with thought is an object of an entity. Therefore, the very thing that is non-deceptive with regard to the nature of an entity that is able to perform a function, and that obtains it just as it is taught, is the valid knowledge of this inference.

original: ma yin gyi mngon sum 'ba' zhig gi yin par ni ma zad do zhes bya ba ni yang gi sgra yin no //
analyzed: ma yin gyi mngon sum 'ba' zhig gi yin par ni ma zad do zhes bya ba ni yang gi sgra yin no //
translated: But it is not only the valid knowledge of direct perception. This is the meaning of the word ‚Äúalso.‚Äù

original: 'di ni tshad ma gnyi ga dngos po'i yul can zhes bya ba de bkral ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni tshad ma gnyi ga dngos po'i yul can zhes bya ba de bkral ba yin no //
translated: This is the commentary on ‚ÄúBoth valid knowledges have an entity as their object.‚Äù

original: dpyod pa ni don byed par rung ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma dngos po'i yul can du sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dpyod pa ni don byed par rung ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma dngos po'i yul can du sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: The reason, ‚Äúbecause analysis has an object that is able to perform a function,‚Äù proves that direct perception and inference are valid knowledges that have an entity as their object.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni tshad ma dngos po'i yul can gyi rgyu mtshan can du mtshungs par bstan pa'i phyir gnyi ga zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni tshad ma dngos po'i yul can gyi rgyu mtshan can du mtshungs par bstan pa'i phyir gnyi ga zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, he says ‚Äúboth‚Äù in order to show that they are similar in being based on a cause that has a real object.

original: de lta ma yin na rjes su dpag pa'i yul dpyod pa na mngon sum nye bar bkod pa mi rigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rjes su dpag pa'i yul dpyod pa na mngon sum nye bar bkod pa mi rigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, when the object of inference is being investigated, it would be unreasonable to cite perception.

original: da ni rjes su dpag @178b pa'i nges pa'i gtan tshigs 'chad de dngos po de dang 'brel ba'i dngos po 'brel pa nges pa gang yin pa de nyid rtags yin no //
analyzed: da ni rjes su dpag @178b pa'i nges pa'i gtan tshigs 'chad de dngos po de dang 'brel ba'i dngos po 'brel pa nges pa gang yin pa de nyid rtags yin no //
translated: Now, he explains the proof of inference: ‚ÄúThat very thing which is the definite relation of a thing to a related thing is the reason.‚Äù

original: gzhan ni go bar byed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir rtags smos so //
analyzed: gzhan ni go bar byed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir rtags smos so //
translated: Since the other is not the cause of understanding, therefore he mentions the reason.

original: rtags de la ltos pa'i phyir na rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma ni dngos po'i yul can yin no //
analyzed: rtags de la ltos pa'i phyir na rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma ni dngos po'i yul can yin no //
translated: Since it depends on that reason, the valid knowledge of inference has a real object.

original: 'brel pa gtan la phebs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid med na mi 'byung ba nges par rtogs pa med na mi 'byung ba gnyis pa rtogs pa ni rjes su dpag pa yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa gtan la phebs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid med na mi 'byung ba nges par rtogs pa med na mi 'byung ba gnyis pa rtogs pa ni rjes su dpag pa yin te /
translated: Inference is the realization of the second, which is the definite relation that is ascertained as the invariable concomitance of the nature of the ascertained relation.

original: des na de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba dag gis rtags gang du 'brel pa srid pa de nyid rjes su dpag par nges par byas pa ni rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa'i yul yin no //
analyzed: des na de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba dag gis rtags gang du 'brel pa srid pa de nyid rjes su dpag par nges par byas pa ni rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa'i yul yin no //
translated: Therefore, the object of inferential cognition is that which is ascertained as the locus of the evidence, by virtue of its identity with or derivation from the evidence.

original: don gang rtogs pa de nyid rtogs pa'i yul yin no //
analyzed: don gang rtogs pa de nyid rtogs pa'i yul yin no //
translated: The object of cognition is that very object which is cognized.

original: rnam 'grel las /üîΩnges pa rnams kyi ma nges gang //
analyzed: rnam 'grel las / nges pa rnams kyi ma nges gang //
translated: As it is said in the PramaÃÑnÔ¨Å avaÃÑrtika:üîΩHow can that which is not ascertained

original: de ni ji ltar de dag yul //üîΩzhes gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar de dag yul // zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: For those who are certain be their object?

original: rtogs pa'i don yang mthong ba'i rtags dang 'brel ba can yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i don yang mthong ba'i rtags dang 'brel ba can yin te /
translated: The object of cognition is also related to the evidence of perception, because it is the object of perception.

original: de'i phyir de nyid yul yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid yul yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the object of cognition.

original: gang gis ma rtogs pa yang tshad ma'i yul du 'gyur ba rtogs pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i ston pa las tshad ma'i bya ba gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis ma rtogs pa yang tshad ma'i yul du 'gyur ba rtogs pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i ston pa las tshad ma'i bya ba gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And that which is not cognized is also the object of valid cognition, because the activity of valid cognition is to engage its object through the medium of cognition.

original: don 'di ni 'di dag gis don yongs su bcad nas zhes bya ba de nyid du gtan la phab zin to //
analyzed: don 'di ni 'di dag gis don yongs su bcad nas zhes bya ba de nyid du gtan la phab zin to //
translated: This point has already been established in the section on ‚Äúhaving ascertained the object.‚Äù

original: mthong ba'i dngos po dang 'brel pa can rtogs pa'i don de yang rang gi mtshan nyid de kho na yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba'i dngos po dang 'brel pa can rtogs pa'i don de yang rang gi mtshan nyid de kho na yin te /
translated: The object of realization that is related to the seen thing is just its own character.

original: kun brtags pa'i ngo bo ni rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan dag gis rang bzhin nam rgyur 'gyur bas ma yin no //
analyzed: kun brtags pa'i ngo bo ni rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan dag gis rang bzhin nam rgyur 'gyur bas ma yin no //
translated: The imagined nature is not the cause or essence of other things, because it is not their own character.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gal te yang de dang 'brel ba'i dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo nyid rtags yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gal te yang de dang 'brel ba'i dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo nyid rtags yin mod kyi /
translated: Therefore, even though the nature of the thing that is related to it is indeed the sign,

original: 'on kyang de dang 'brel ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin smos pas khyad par du byas pa ni rang gi ro bos sam sgro btags pas kyang rung ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang de dang 'brel ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin smos pas khyad par du byas pa ni rang gi ro bos sam sgro btags pas kyang rung ste /
translated: the nature of the thing that is related to it is specified by the term ‚Äúnature.‚Äù

original: shes pa'i snang ba ni 'di 'dra ba'i dngos po'i rtags kyi 'brel pa can du rnam pa ji ltar yang mi 'thad pa de'i phyir 'di tshad ma'i yul ni rtogs par gyur pa rang dang 'brel ba can gyi dngos po gang yin pa de yin no zhes ci
analyzed: shes pa'i snang ba ni 'di 'dra ba'i dngos po'i rtags kyi 'brel pa can du rnam pa ji ltar yang mi 'thad pa de'i phyir 'di tshad ma'i yul ni rtogs par gyur pa rang dang 'brel ba can gyi dngos po gang yin pa de yin no zhes ci
translated: The appearance in consciousness is not tenable in any way as the sign of a thing that is related to it. Therefore, the object of valid knowledge is that thing that is related to it and is realized.

original: nas kyang shes par bya ba'i ched du yin no //
analyzed: nas kyang shes par bya ba'i ched du yin no //
translated: and it is also for the sake of understanding that.

original: des na snang ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid la ltos nas /
analyzed: des na snang ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid la ltos nas /
translated: Therefore, in dependence on the nature of the appearance of the object,

original: med na med pa rtogs pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i yul ni rtogs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: med na med pa rtogs pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i yul ni rtogs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: the object of inferential valid knowledge is the nature of the object that is understood when it does not exist.

original: gal te mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gi yul rang gi mtshan nyid gcig nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gi yul rang gi mtshan nyid gcig nyid yin na /
translated: If the object of direct perception and inference is the same, the nature of the object,

original: 'o na slob dpon gyis ji ltar mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag yul tha dad par gsungs she na /
analyzed: 'o na slob dpon gyis ji ltar mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag yul tha dad par gsungs she na /
translated: then why did the master say that the objects of direct perception and inference are different?üîΩIn response, it is said:

original: bshad pa / snang ba rnam pa tha dad pas @179a * //
analyzed: bshad pa / snang ba rnam pa tha dad pas @179a * //
translated: Because the appearance is different,

original: na gzung ba'i dngos po gcig la don byed par nus pa la 'khrul pa dang mi 'khrul pa can gsal bar snang ba dang mi gsal bar snang ba rnam pa 'gal ba gnyis po de mi 'thad pa'i phyir na med pa'i phyir na'o //
analyzed: na gzung ba'i dngos po gcig la don byed par nus pa la 'khrul pa dang mi 'khrul pa can gsal bar snang ba dang mi gsal bar snang ba rnam pa 'gal ba gnyis po de mi 'thad pa'i phyir na med pa'i phyir na'o //
translated: it is not tenable that a single object of apprehension has two contradictory aspects, one that appears clearly and is capable of performing a function and one that appears unclearly and is not capable of performing a function.

original: gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dag gis tha dad pa'i snang ba ni dngos po gcig la mi ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dag gis tha dad pa'i snang ba ni dngos po gcig la mi ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: The appearance of a single thing as different due to being clear or unclear is not tenable.

original: thag nye ring gi bye brag gis dngos po gcig la yang rnam pa tha dad par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thag nye ring gi bye brag gis dngos po gcig la yang rnam pa tha dad par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a single thing is seen as having different aspects due to the difference of near and far.

original: 'on kyang don byed bar nus pa la mi 'khrul pa'i rnam pa gsal ba dang nus pa la 'khrul pa'i mi gsal ba'i rnam pa gang yin pa de dag ni tha dad par byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'on kyang don byed bar nus pa la mi 'khrul pa'i rnam pa gsal ba dang nus pa la 'khrul pa'i mi gsal ba'i rnam pa gang yin pa de dag ni tha dad par byed pa nyid de /
translated: However, the clear aspect that is undeceiving with respect to the ability to perform a function and the unclear aspect that is deceiving with respect to the ability to perform a function are different.

original: des na lta bur gyur pa dag gcig la mi 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: des na lta bur gyur pa dag gcig la mi 'thad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable that the clear and unclear are the same.

original: de nyid rnam par 'grel par bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid rnam par 'grel par bshad pa ni /
translated: To explain that very point, he says:

original: phan tshun rnam pa mi mthun pa de dag ni gcig par 'thad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun rnam pa mi mthun pa de dag ni gcig par 'thad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThose that are mutually incompatible aspects are not tenable as the same.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir dmigs pa nyid ni yul te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dmigs pa nyid ni yul te /
translated: Therefore, the object is the very object of observation.

original: de tha dad pas na slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos tshad ma'i yul tha dad du bshad kyi tshad ma'i bya ba 'jug pa'i yul rab tu ston pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa'i bya ba de'i yul tha dad pa las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de tha dad pas na slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos tshad ma'i yul tha dad du bshad kyi tshad ma'i bya ba 'jug pa'i yul rab tu ston pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa'i bya ba de'i yul tha dad pa las ni ma yin no //
translated: The master Dignaga explains that the objects of the two valid cognitions are different, but he does not explain that the objects of the two activities of engaging in the object are different.

original: shes pa rnams kyi yul ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: shes pa rnams kyi yul ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The objects of consciousnesses are of two types:

original: gzung ba dang zhen pa'o //
analyzed: gzung ba dang zhen pa'o //
translated: the apprehended and the conceived.

original: rnam par rtog pas ni sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin cing de dang 'dra ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid ni nges par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas ni sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin cing de dang 'dra ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid ni nges par byed pa yin no //
translated: Conceptual consciousnesses apprehend the nature that is superimposed and ascertain the similar own characteristic.

original: dbang po'i shes pas skad cig ma 'dzin cing de'i stobs kyis skyes pa'i nges pa ni skad cig ma de'i cha shas rgyun mthong ngo snyam du nges pa yin no //üîΩde la gzung ba yul tha dad kyi 'jug pa'i yul ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pas skad cig ma 'dzin cing de'i stobs kyis skyes pa'i nges pa ni skad cig ma de'i cha shas rgyun mthong ngo snyam du nges pa yin no // de la gzung ba yul tha dad kyi 'jug pa'i yul ni ma yin te /
translated: Sense consciousnesses apprehend the moment and ascertain the continuum of the parts of that moment through the power of that.

original: gnyi gas kyang der zhen pas rang gi mtshan nyid kho na la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi gas kyang der zhen pas rang gi mtshan nyid kho na la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The apprehended is not the object of engagement of the difference of objects because both ascertain only the own characteristic.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mngon sum gyi gzung ba'i yul gang yin pa de ni thob par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mngon sum gyi gzung ba'i yul gang yin pa de ni thob par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the object that is the object of apprehension of direct perception is not to be obtained,

original: skad cig ma de ni thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma de ni thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that moment cannot be obtained.

original: 'on kyang mngon sum gyi stobs las skyes ba'i yul nges pa'i gzung ba'i skad cig ma gang yin ba de'i rgyun yul du byed la /
analyzed: 'on kyang mngon sum gyi stobs las skyes ba'i yul nges pa'i gzung ba'i skad cig ma gang yin ba de'i rgyun yul du byed la /
translated: However, the object that is the object of apprehension of the moment that arises from the power of direct perception is taken as the object of the continuum.

original: de yang nges par byas pa'i don yin pa des na mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis zhen par bya ba'i 'jug pa'i yul khyad bar med pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang nges par byas pa'i don yin pa des na mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis zhen par bya ba'i 'jug pa'i yul khyad bar med pa yin no //
translated: And since that is the object that is ascertained, there is no difference in the engaged object that is to be ascertained by direct perception and inference.

original: des mngon sum bzhin du rjes su dpag pa yang gzung ba'i yul can du rigs so zhes gang smras pa de la gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: des mngon sum bzhin du rjes su dpag pa yang gzung ba'i yul can du rigs so zhes gang smras pa de la gsal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is clear that what was said, that inference is also reasonable as having an apprehended object, just like direct perception, is refuted.

original: gang gi phyir mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i yul yang gzung ba'i skad cig nyid ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i yul yang gzung ba'i skad cig nyid ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Because the object of a valid cognition of direct perception is not the moment of the apprehended object,

original: 'on kyang zhen pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhen pa yin no //
translated: but rather the object of ascertainment.

original: gal te tha dad pa ni dngos po'i yul can ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa ni dngos po'i yul can ma yin nam /
translated: If it is different, is it not the object of a thing?

original: rjes @179b su dpag pa'i gzung ba'i don ni sgro btags pa yin pas de la tha dad ba ga la yod ce na /
analyzed: rjes @179b su dpag pa'i gzung ba'i don ni sgro btags pa yin pas de la tha dad ba ga la yod ce na /
translated: Since the object apprehended by inference is a superimposition, how can it be different?

original: tha dad ces bya ba yang zhes smras so //
analyzed: tha dad ces bya ba yang zhes smras so //
translated: ‚Äú Different‚Äù is said.

original: tha dad pa'i sgras ni gnyi ga'i gzung ba'i don gcig yin par mi 'thad do zhes rjes su dpag pa'i yul 'di tha mi dad pa yin pa bkag pa'i nyid byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i sgras ni gnyi ga'i gzung ba'i don gcig yin par mi 'thad do zhes rjes su dpag pa'i yul 'di tha mi dad pa yin pa bkag pa'i nyid byed pa yin gyi /
translated: The word ‚Äúdifferent‚Äù is used to refute the possibility that the object apprehended by both is the same. The object of inference is not different.

original: don dam pa'i yul tha dad pa yin par ni brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa'i yul tha dad pa yin par ni brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not said that the ultimate object is different.

original: des na tha dad pa'i tshig ni 'dir tha mi dad pa 'gog pa lhur byed pa yin gyi du ma nyid ni las bsgrubs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na tha dad pa'i tshig ni 'dir tha mi dad pa 'gog pa lhur byed pa yin gyi du ma nyid ni las bsgrubs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúdifferent‚Äù here emphasizes the refutation of non-difference, but multiplicity is not established as the object.

original: yang ci'i phyir yul du ma nyid du mi brjod ce na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir yul du ma nyid du mi brjod ce na /
translated: Why then is multiplicity not stated as the object?

original: smras pa / rjes su dpag pa nyid rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: smras pa / rjes su dpag pa nyid rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: It is said: Inference itself is conceptual.
